answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because OA = OC, and ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠OCA = ∠A = 30°, thus ∠COB = ∠A + ∠ACO = 60°. Since PC is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠PCO = 90°, and ∠P = 30°. Given that PC = 3, therefore OC = PC • tan30° = √3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,BC是⊙O的弦,CD切⊙O于点C,∠D=90°,∠A=60°,则∠C等于()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OC,∵CD切⊙O于点C,∴OC⊥CD,又∵AD⊥CD,∴OC∥AD,∴∠BOC=∠BAD=60°,∵OB=OC,在△OBC中,∠BCO=\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠BOC)=60°,∴∠BCD=∠BCO+∠OCD=60°+90°=150°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, BC is a chord of ⊙O, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point C, ∠D = 90°, ∠A = 60°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OC. Because CD is tangent to circle O at point C, therefore OC ⊥ CD. Also, since AD ⊥ CD, therefore OC ∥ AD, thus ∠BOC = ∠BAD = 60°. Since OB = OC, in △OBC, ∠BCO = 1/2(180° - ∠BOC) = 60°, therefore ∠BCD = ∠BCO + ∠OCD = 60° + 90° = 150°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C为⊙O上一点,AD和过点C的切线互相垂直,垂足为D．若∠DAB=70°,则∠DCA的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O, AD and the tangent line passing through point C are perpendicular to each other, with the foot of the perpendicular being D. If ∠DAB = 70°, then the degree of ∠DCA is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is a tangent, therefore OC ⊥ CD. Since AD ⊥ CD, therefore AD ∥ CO, thus ∠1 = ∠3. Since ∠2 = ∠3, therefore ∠1 = ∠2. Because ∠DAB = 70°, therefore ∠DAC = 35°, thus ∠ACD = 55°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,MN切⊙O于点A,若∠BAN=50°,则∠ACB的度数为()
answer_cot: 连接AO并延长交⊙O于D,连接BD,则∠D=∠C,∠ABD=90°,∴∠D+∠DAB=∠C+∠DAB=90°,∵MN切⊙O于点A,∴∠DAN=90°,∵∠NAB=50°,∴∠DAB=40°,∴∠ACB=∠D=50°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, MN is tangent to ⊙O at point A, if ∠BAN = 50°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend AO to intersect circle O at D, connect BD, then ∠D = ∠C, ∠ABD = 90°, therefore ∠D + ∠DAB = ∠C + ∠DAB = 90°. Since MN is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore ∠DAN = 90°. Given that ∠NAB = 50°, therefore ∠DAB = 40°, thus ∠ACB = ∠D = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,以AB为直径的⊙O,与BC切于点B,AC与⊙O交于点D,E是⊙O上的一点,若∠E=40°,则∠C等于()
answer_cot: 连接BD,如图,∵BC为切线,AB为直径,∴AB⊥BC,∴∠ABC=90°,∵AB为直径,∴∠ADB=90°,∵∠ABD=∠E=40°,∴∠BAD=90°-40°=50°,∴∠C=90°-∠BAC=40°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O with AB as the diameter, is tangent to BC at point B, AC intersects ⊙O at point D, E is a point on ⊙O, if ∠E = 40°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD as shown, because BC is a tangent and AB is a diameter, therefore AB ⊥ BC, therefore ∠ABC = 90°. Since AB is a diameter, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Because ∠ABD = ∠E = 40°, therefore ∠BAD = 90° - 40° = 50°, therefore ∠C = 90° - ∠BAC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA、PB、AB都与⊙O相切,∠P=40°,则∠AOB等于()
answer_cot: 设PA、PB、AB与⊙O相切于E、D、C,连接OE、OD、OC,如图,∴PA、PB、AB都与⊙O相切,∴OE⊥AB,OD⊥PB,OC⊥PA,∴∠COD=180°-∠P=140°,在Rt△AOC和Rt△AOE中\begin{cases}OA=OA\\0C=OE\end{cases},∴Rt△AOC≌Rt△AOE,同理可得△OBD≌△OBE,∴∠AOC=∠AOE,∠BOD=∠BOE,∴∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}∠COD=70°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, and AB are all tangent to ⊙O, ∠P = 40°, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Let PA, PB, and AB be tangent to circle O at points E, D, and C, respectively, and connect OE, OD, OC, as shown in the diagram. Therefore, PA, PB, and AB are all tangent to circle O, thus OE ⊥ AB, OD ⊥ PB, OC ⊥ PA, therefore ∠COD = 180° - ∠P = 140°. In right triangles AOC and AOE, we have \begin{cases}OA=OA\\OC=OE\end{cases}, therefore right triangle AOC is congruent to right triangle AOE. Similarly, it can be deduced that triangle OBD is congruent to triangle OBE, therefore ∠AOC = ∠AOE, ∠BOD = ∠BOE, thus ∠AOB = 1/2 ∠COD = 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别是⊙O的两条切线,切点是A、B,点C在⊙O上,若∠P=50°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 连接OA、OB．在四边形PAOB中,由于PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,则∠OAP=∠OBP=90°；由四边形的内角和定理,知∠APB+∠AOB=180°；又∵∠APB=50°,∴∠AOB=130°；又∵∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB(同弧所对的圆周角是所对的圆心角的一半),∴∠ACB=65°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are two tangents of ⊙O, with A and B being the tangent points, and point C is on ⊙O. If ∠P = 50°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB. In quadrilateral PAOB, since PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B, then ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°; by the theorem of the sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral, we know ∠APB + ∠AOB = 180°; given that ∠APB = 50°, therefore ∠AOB = 130°; since ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB (the angle at the circumference is half the angle at the center for the same arc), therefore ∠ACB = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,过点A作⊙O的切线,交BO的延长线于点C．若∠B=28°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, a tangent to ⊙O is made through point A, intersecting the extension of BO at point C. If ∠B = 28°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is a tangent, therefore OA ⊥ AC, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠OAB = ∠B = 28°, thus ∠AOC = ∠OAB + ∠B = 56°, therefore ∠C = 90° - 56° = 34°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD各边与⊙O相切,AB=10,BC=7,CD=8,则AD的长度为()
answer_cot: 如图,E,F,G,H是切点∵四边形ABCD各边与⊙O相切∴AH=AE,DH=DG,CG=CF,BE=BF∴AH+DH+CF+BF=AE+DG+CG+BE∴AD+BC=CD+AB∵AB=10,BC=7,CD=8∴AD=11故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the four sides of quadrilateral ABCD are tangent to ⊙O, AB = 10, BC = 7, CD = 8, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, E, F, G, and H are points of tangency. Because quadrilateral ABCD is tangent to circle O at each side, therefore AH = AE, DH = DG, CG = CF, BE = BF. Thus, AH + DH + CF + BF = AE + DG + CG + BE. Therefore, AD + BC = CD + AB. Since AB = 10, BC = 7, CD = 8, therefore AD = 11. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△BC的边AC与⊙O相交于C、D两点,且经过圆心O,边AB与⊙O相切,切点为B,如果∠C=26°,那么∠A等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side AC of △BC intersects ⊙O at points C and D, and passes through the center O, side AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, if ∠C = 26°, then ∠A equals ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OB. Because AB is tangent to circle O, therefore OB ⊥ AB, therefore ∠ABO = 90°. Since OB = OC and ∠C = 26°, therefore ∠OBC = ∠C = 26°. Thus ∠COB = 180° - 26° - 26° = 128°. Therefore, ∠A = 128° - 90° = 38°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC的边AC与⊙O相交于C,D两点,且经过圆心O,边AB与⊙O相切,切点为B．如果∠A=40°,那么∠C等于()
answer_cot: 连接OB,如图,∵边AB与⊙O相切,切点为B,∴OB⊥AB,∴∠ABO=90°,∴∠AOB=90°-∠A=90°-40°=50°,∵OB=OC,∴∠OBC=∠C,∴∠AOB=∠OBC+∠C=2∠C,∴∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=25°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side AC of △ABC intersects ⊙O at points C and D, and passes through the center O, side AB is tangent to ⊙O, with the tangent point at B. If ∠A = 40°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, as shown in the diagram, because side AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, therefore ∠ABO = 90°, thus ∠AOB = 90° - ∠A = 90° - 40° = 50°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠C, thus ∠AOB = ∠OBC + ∠C = 2∠C, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线l是⊙O的切线,A为切点,B为直线l上一点,连接OB交⊙O于点C．若AB=12,OA=5,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, B is a point on line l, and OB intersects ⊙O at point C. If AB = 12, OA = 5, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: By the Pythagorean theorem, OB = √(OA² + AB²) = 13, CB = OB - OC = 13 - 5 = 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB,过点C作⊙O的切线与AB的延长线交于点P．若∠BCD=32°,则∠CPD的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵CD⊥AB,∠BCD=32°,∴∠OBC=58°,∵OC=OB,∴∠OCB=∠OBC=58°,∴∠COP=64°,∵PC是⊙O的切线,∴∠OCP=90°,∴∠CPO=26°,∵AB⊥CD,∴AB垂直平分CD,∴PC=PD,∴∠CPD=2∠CPO=52°故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, chord CD ⊥ AB, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn from point C and intersects the extended line of AB at point P. If ∠BCD = 32°, then the degree of ∠CPD is ()
answer_cot_en: Join OC, because CD ⊥ AB, ∠BCD = 32°, therefore ∠OBC = 58°. Since OC = OB, therefore ∠OCB = ∠OBC = 58°, thus ∠COP = 64°. Since PC is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OCP = 90°, thus ∠CPO = 26°. Because AB ⊥ CD, therefore AB is the perpendicular bisector of CD, thus PC = PD, therefore ∠CPD = 2∠CPO = 52°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的弦,过点B作⊙O的切线交AC的延长线于点D,点E是弧AC的中点,连接AE,若∠EAB=65°,则∠D的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接OB,OE,BE,∵∠EAB=65°,∴∠BOE=130°,∵OE=OB,∴∠OEB=25°,∵点E是弧AC的中点,∴OE⊥CA,∴∠EFA=65°,∵BD是⊙O的切线,∴∠BDE=∠BAE=65°,∵∠DFB=∠EFA=65°,∴∠D=50°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are chords of ⊙O, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn through point B and intersects the extension line of AC at point D, point E is the midpoint of arc AC, connect AE, if ∠EAB = 65°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, OE, BE. Because ∠EAB = 65°, therefore ∠BOE = 130°. Since OE = OB, therefore ∠OEB = 25°. Because point E is the midpoint of arc AC, therefore OE ⊥ CA, thus ∠EFA = 65°. Since BD is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠BDE = ∠BAE = 65°. Because ∠DFB = ∠EFA = 65°, thus ∠D = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知⊙O的直径AB与弦AC的夹角为30°,过C点的切线PC与AB的延长线于P．若圆半径等于5,则线段CP的长度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the angle between the diameter AB of ⊙O and the chord AC is 30°, the tangent PC through point C intersects the extended line of AB at P. If the radius of the circle is equal to 5, then the length of the line segment CP is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, as shown in the diagram. Because PC is a tangent, therefore OC ⊥ PC. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠OCA = ∠A = 30°. Thus ∠POC = ∠A + ∠OCA = 60°. In right triangle △OCP, PC = √{3}OC = 5√{3}. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,圆内接四边形ABCD的边AB过圆心O,过点C的切线与边AD所在直线垂直于点M,若∠ABC=55°,则∠ACD等于()
answer_cot: ∵圆内接四边形ABCD的边AB过圆心O,∴∠ADC+∠ABC=180°,∠ACB=90°,∴∠ADC=180°-∠ABC=125°,∠BAC=90°-∠ABC=35°,∵过点C的切线与边AD所在直线垂直于点M,∴∠MCA=∠ABC=55°,∠AMC=90°,∵∠ADC=∠AMC+∠DCM,∴∠DCM=∠ADC-∠AMC=35°,∴∠ACD=∠MCA-∠DCM=55°-35°=20°；故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side AB of the cyclic quadrilateral ABCD passes through the center O, the tangent at point C is perpendicular to the line containing side AD at point M, if ∠ABC = 55°, then ∠ACD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because in the cyclic quadrilateral ABCD, the side AB passes through the center O, therefore ∠ADC + ∠ABC = 180°, ∠ACB = 90°, thus ∠ADC = 180° - ∠ABC = 125°, ∠BAC = 90° - ∠ABC = 35°. Since the tangent at point C is perpendicular to the line containing AD at point M, therefore ∠MCA = ∠ABC = 55°, ∠AMC = 90°. Because ∠ADC = ∠AMC + ∠DCM, therefore ∠DCM = ∠ADC - ∠AMC = 35°, thus ∠ACD = ∠MCA - ∠DCM = 55° - 35° = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AP为⊙O的切线,P为切点,若∠A=30°,C、D为圆周上两点,且∠PDC=70°,则∠OBC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AP is the tangent of ⊙O, P is the tangent point, if ∠A = 30°, C and D are two points on the circumference, and ∠PDC = 70°, then ∠OBC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OP and OC. Because AP is tangent to circle O at P, therefore ∠APO = 90°. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠POB = 60°. Given that ∠PDC = 70°, therefore ∠POC = 2∠PDC = 140°. Thus ∠BOC = 140° - 60° = 80°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = 1/2 × (180° - 80°) = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AC是⊙O的切线,A为切点,BC经过圆心,若∠C=50°,则∠ABC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, BC passes through the center, if ∠C = 50°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, because AC is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since ∠C = 50°, therefore ∠AOC = 90° - 50° = 40°. Because OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB. Since ∠AOC = ∠B + ∠OAB = 40°, therefore ∠B = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点c是⊙O的直径AB延长线上一点,CD切⊙O于点D,DE为⊙O的弦,若∠AED=60°,⊙O的半径是2．则CD的长()
answer_cot: 如图,∵OA=OB,∠E=60°,∴△OAE为等边三角形,∴∠1=60°,∴∠2=60°,∵CD切⊙O于点D,∴OD⊥CD,∴∠ODC=90°,在Rt△ODC中,tan∠2=\frac{CD}{OD},∴CD=2tan60°=2√{3}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is on the extended line of diameter AB of ⊙O, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point D, DE is a chord of ⊙O. If ∠AED = 60°, and the radius of ⊙O is 2, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the figure, because OA = OB and ∠E = 60°, therefore △OAE is an equilateral triangle, thus ∠1 = 60°, and ∠2 = 60°. Since CD is tangent to circle O at point D, therefore OD ⊥ CD, thus ∠ODC = 90°. In right triangle ODC, tan∠2 = CD/OD, therefore CD = 2tan60° = 2√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,直线DA与⊙O相切于点A,DO交⊙O于点C,连接BC,若∠ABC=21°,则∠ADC的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵OB=OC,∴∠B=∠BCO=21°,∴∠AOD=∠B+∠BCO=21°+21°=42°,∵AB是⊙O的直径,直线DA与⊙O相切与点A,∴∠OAD=90°,∴∠ADC=90°-∠AOD=90°-42°=48°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, line DA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, DO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC, if ∠ABC = 21°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OB = OC, therefore ∠B = ∠BCO = 21°, thus ∠AOD = ∠B + ∠BCO = 21° + 21° = 42°. Since AB is the diameter of circle O, and line DA is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore ∠OAD = 90°, thus ∠ADC = 90° - ∠AOD = 90° - 42° = 48°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知BC是⊙O的直径,AB是⊙O的弦,切线AD交BC的延长线于D,若∠D=40°,则∠B的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that BC is the diameter of ⊙O, AB is a chord of ⊙O, the tangent AD intersects the extension of BC at D, if ∠D = 40°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA as shown. Because AD is a tangent, therefore OA ⊥ AD, therefore ∠OAD = 90°. Since ∠D = 40°, therefore ∠AOD = 50°. Because OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB, therefore ∠B = 1/2 ∠AOD = 25°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC与⊙O相切于点A,连接OC交⊙O于D,作DE∥AB交⊙O于E,连接AE,若∠C=40°,则∠E等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is tangent to ⊙O at point A, connect OC and intersect ⊙O at D, draw DE ∥ AB and intersect ⊙O at E, connect AE, if ∠C = 40°, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is tangent to circle O, therefore AC ⊥ AB. In right triangle AOC, ∠C = 40°, therefore ∠AOC = 50°. Since ∠AOC and ∠AED are corresponding angles, therefore ∠E = 1/2 ∠AOC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,过⊙O外一点P引⊙O的两条切线PA、PB,切点分别是A、B,OP交⊙O于点C,点D是优弧AB上不与点A、点B重合的一个动点,连接AD、CD,若∠APB=76°,则△ADC的度数为()
answer_cot: 解；如图,连接OB、OA．∵PA、PB是⊙O的切线,∴∠PBO=∠PAO=90°由四边形的内角和定理,得∠BOA=360°-90°-90°-76°=104°,∵∠OPB=∠OPA,∠OPB+∠POB=90°,∠OPA+∠POA=90°,∴∠POB=∠POA=52°．∵∠ADC=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=26°,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, two tangents PA and PB are drawn from a point P outside ⊙O, with the tangent points being A and B respectively. OP intersects ⊙O at point C, and point D is a moving point on the major arc AB that does not coincide with points A and B. Connect AD and CD. If ∠APB = 76°, then the degree of △ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Solution: As shown in the diagram, connect OB and OA. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠PBO = ∠PAO = 90°. By the theorem of the sum of interior angles in a quadrilateral, we get ∠BOA = 360° - 90° - 90° - 76° = 104°. Since ∠OPB = ∠OPA, and ∠OPB + ∠POB = 90°, ∠OPA + ∠POA = 90°, therefore ∠POB = ∠POA = 52°. Because ∠ADC = 1/2 ∠AOC = 26°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,AO与⊙O交于点C,若∠BAO=40°,则∠CBA的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, B is the tangent point, AO intersects ⊙O at point C. If ∠BAO = 40°, then the degree of ∠CBA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the tangent to circle O with B as the point of tangency, therefore OB ⊥ BA, therefore ∠ABO = 90°. Since ∠BAO = 40°, therefore ∠O = 50°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = (180° - 50°) / 2 = 65°, thus ∠CBA = 90° - ∠OBC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知直线AD是⊙O的切线,点A为切点,OD交⊙O于点B,点C在⊙O上,且∠ODA=36°,则∠ACB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line AD is the tangent of ⊙O, point A is the tangent point, OD intersects ⊙O at point B, point C is on ⊙O, and ∠ODA = 36°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD is the tangent to circle O, therefore AD ⊥ OA, that is ∠OAD = 90°. Since ∠ODA = 36°, therefore ∠AOD = 54°. Because ∠AOD and ∠ACB both subtend arc AB, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOD = 27°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB,AC是⊙O的两条弦,∠A=28°,过点C的切线与OB的延长线交于点D,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are two chords of ⊙O, ∠A = 28°, the tangent through point C intersects the extension of OB at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because ∠A = 28°, therefore ∠O = 2∠A = 56°. Since CD is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OCD = 90°, thus ∠D = 90° - 56° = 34°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,⊙O与AB相切于点A,BO与⊙O交于点C,∠BAC=30°,则∠B等于()
answer_cot: ∵AB为圆O的切线,∴OA⊥AB,∴∠OAB=90°,又∠BAC=30°,∴∠OAC=90°-30°=60°又∵OA=OC,∴△OAC为等边三角形,∴∠AOB=60°,则∠B=90°-60°=30°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is tangent to AB at point A, BO intersects ⊙O at point C, ∠BAC = 30°, then ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the tangent to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ AB, therefore ∠OAB = 90°. Also, ∠BAC = 30°, therefore ∠OAC = 90° - 30° = 60°. Since OA = OC, therefore △OAC is an equilateral triangle, therefore ∠AOB = 60°, then ∠B = 90° - 60° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在⊙O的内接四边形ABCD中,AB是直径,∠BCD=115°,过D点的切线PD与射线BA交于点P,则∠ADP的度数为()
answer_cot: 延长DO交⊙O于E,连接AC、AE．∵AB是直径,∴∠ACB=90°,∵∠DCB=115°,∴∠DCE=∠E=25°,∵DE是直径,∴∠DAE=90°,∴∠ADE=90°-25°=65°,∵PD是⊙O的切线,∴∠PDO=90°,∴∠PDA=90°-∠ADO=25°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the inscribed quadrilateral ABCD of ⊙O, AB is the diameter, ∠BCD = 115°, the tangent PD passing through point D intersects ray BA at point P, then the degree of ∠ADP is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend DO to intersect circle O at E, connect AC and AE. Because AB is the diameter, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠DCB = 115°, therefore ∠DCE = ∠E = 25°. Because DE is the diameter, therefore ∠DAE = 90°. Thus ∠ADE = 90° - 25° = 65°. Since PD is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠PDO = 90°. Thus ∠PDA = 90° - ∠ADO = 25°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,直线l与以线段AB为直径的圆相切于点C,AB=6,AC=3,点P是直线l上一个动点．当∠APB的度数最大时,线段BP的长度为()
answer_cot: 连接BC,∵直线l与以线段AB为直径的圆相切于点C,∴∠ACB=90°,当∠APB的度数最大时,则P和C重合,∴∠APB=90°,∵AB=6,AC=3,由勾股定理得:BP=BC=√{6^{2}-3^{2}}=3√{3},故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l is tangent to the circle with segment AB as the diameter at point C, AB = 6, AC = 3, point P is a moving point on line l. When the degree of ∠APB is at its maximum, the length of segment BP is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC. Because line l is tangent to the circle with diameter AB at point C, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. When the measure of ∠APB is at its maximum, then P coincides with C, therefore ∠APB = 90°. Since AB = 6, AC = 3, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: BP = BC = √{6² - 3²} = 3√{3}. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,圆O是Rt△ABC的外接圆,∠ACB=90°,∠A=25°,过点C作圆O的切线,交AB的延长线于点D,则∠D的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, circle O is the circumcircle of Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠A = 25°, a tangent to circle O is drawn passing through point C, intersecting the extension of AB at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is a tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CD, thus ∠OCD = 90°. Since OC = OA and ∠A = 25°, therefore ∠OCA = ∠A = 25°, thus ∠DOC = ∠A + ∠OCA = 25° + 25° = 50°, therefore ∠D = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=10,BC=12,点D为线段BC上一动点．以CD为⊙O直径,作AD交⊙O于点E,连BE,则BE的最小值为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接CE,∴∠CED=∠CEA=90°,∴点E在以AC为直径的⊙Q上,∵AC=10,∴QC=QE=5,当点Q、E、B共线时BE最小,∵BC=12,∴QB=√{BC^{2}+QC^{2}}=13,∴BE=QB-QE=8,故选:B．
question_en: In Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, AC = 10, BC = 12, point D is a moving point on segment BC. Taking CD as the diameter of ⊙O, construct AD to intersect ⊙O at point E, connect BE, then the minimum value of BE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect CE, therefore ∠CED = ∠CEA = 90°, thus point E lies on circle Q with AC as the diameter. Since AC = 10, therefore QC = QE = 5. When points Q, E, and B are collinear, BE is the smallest. Since BC = 12, therefore QB = √(BC² + QC²) = 13, thus BE = QB - QE = 8. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O上的点,∠DCB=30°,过点D作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于E,若AB=4,则DE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is a point on ⊙O, ∠DCB = 30°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn from point D and intersects the extension of AB at E. If AB = 4, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OD. Because ∠DCB = 30°, therefore ∠BOD = 60°. Since DE is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠ODE = 90°. Thus ∠DEO = 30°. Therefore OE = 2OD = AB = 4. In right triangle △ODE, DE = √{OE² - OD²} = √{4² - 2²} = 2√{3}.

question: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条弦,∠A=25°,过点C的切线与OB的延长线交于点D,则∠D的度数()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are two chords of ⊙O, ∠A = 25°, the tangent through point C intersects the extension of OB at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is a tangent, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since ∠A = 25°, therefore ∠COD = 2∠A = 50°, thus ∠D = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,BD、CD分别是过⊙O上点B、C的切线,且∠BDC=100°,连接AC,则∠A的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵BD、CD分别是过⊙O上点B、C的切线,∴OB⊥BD,OC⊥CD,∵∠BDC=100°,∴在四边形OBDC中,∠BOC=360°-90°-90°-100°=80°,∴∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC=40°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, BD and CD are tangents passing through points B and C on ⊙O, respectively, and ∠BDC = 100°. Connect AC, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because BD and CD are tangents to the circle O at points B and C respectively, therefore OB ⊥ BD, OC ⊥ CD. Since ∠BDC = 100°, therefore in quadrilateral OBDC, ∠BOC = 360° - 90° - 90° - 100° = 80°, thus ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOC = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,过⊙O外一点P引⊙O的两条切线PA、PB,切点分别是A、B,OP交⊙O于点C,点D是⁀{AEB}上不与点A、点C重合的一个动点,连接AD、CD,若∠APB=60°,则∠ADC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, two tangents PA and PB are drawn from a point P outside ⊙O, with the tangent points being A and B respectively. OP intersects ⊙O at point C, and point D is a moving point on arc AEB that does not coincide with points A and C. Connect AD and CD. If ∠APB = 60°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA. Because PA and PB are two tangents to circle O, therefore ∠APO = 1/2 ∠APB = 1/2 × 60° = 30°. Since OA ⊥ PA, therefore ∠AOP = 90° - ∠APO = 60°. Thus, ∠ADC = 1/2 ∠AOP = 30°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC的边AC与⊙O相交于C,D两点,且经过圆心O,边AB与⊙O相切,切点为B．如果∠A=34°,那么∠C等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side AC of △ABC intersects ⊙O at points C and D, and passes through the center O, side AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B. If ∠A = 34°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB as shown in the diagram. Because AB is tangent to circle O, therefore OB ⊥ AB, thus ∠ABO = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB = 90° - ∠A = 90° - 34° = 56°. Since ∠AOB = ∠C + ∠OBC, therefore ∠C + ∠OBC = 56°. Given that OB = OC, therefore ∠C = ∠OBC, thus ∠C = 1/2 × 56° = 28°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C在⊙O上,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点D,连接OC,AC．若∠D=50°,则∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point C is on ⊙O, a tangent to ⊙O passing through point C intersects the extended line of AB at point D, connect OC and AC. If ∠D = 50°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD is tangent to circle O at C, therefore OC ⊥ CD, thus ∠OCD = 90°. Since ∠D = 50°, therefore ∠COD = 180° - 90° - 50° = 40°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠OCA. Given that ∠A + ∠OCA = ∠COD = 40°, therefore ∠A = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,AC是⊙O的直径,∠P=62°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠P = 62°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, and ∠P = 62°, thus ∠AOB = 360° - 90° - 90° - 62° = 118°. Since AC is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - 118° = 62°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,切点分别是A,B,如果∠P=60°,那么∠AOB等于()
answer_cot: ∵PA是圆的切线．∴∠OAP=90°同理∠OBP=90°根据四边形内角和定理可得:∠AOB=360°-∠OAP-∠OBP-∠P=360°-90°-90°-60°=120°故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, with the tangent points being A and B, respectively. If ∠P = 60°, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is a tangent to the circle, therefore ∠OAP = 90°. Similarly, ∠OBP = 90°. According to the theorem of the sum of interior angles in a quadrilateral, we have: ∠AOB = 360° - ∠OAP - ∠OBP - ∠P = 360° - 90° - 90° - 60° = 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,PA是⊙O的切线,点C在⊙O上,AC⊥OP,BC=2,AC=4,则PA长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, point C is on ⊙O, AC ⊥ OP, BC = 2, AC = 4, then the length of PA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°, thus AB = √(2² + 4²) = 2√5, therefore OA = √5. Since OP ⊥ AC, therefore OP ∥ BC, ∠AOP = ∠B, thus right triangle AOP ∼ right triangle CBA, therefore PA/AC = OA/BC, that is PA/4 = √5/2, therefore PA = 2√5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 一个定点与圆上各点之间距离的最小值称为这个点与这个圆之间的距离,如图,矩形ABCD中,AB=28cm,BC=24cm,⊙K与矩形的边AB、BC、CD分别相切于点E、F、G,则点A与⊙K的距离为()
answer_cot: 连KE,KG,KF,连AK交⊙K于M点,如图,∵AB、CD、BC与⊙K相切,∴KE⊥AB,KG⊥CD,KF⊥BC,而AB∥CD,∴点E、K、G共线,∴EG=BC=24cm,∴EK=KF=12cm,∴BE=12cm,∴AE=AB-BE=28-12=16(cm),在Rt△AEK中,AK2=AE2+KE2,∴AK=√{12^{2}+16^{2}}=20,∴AM=20-12=8(cm),∴点A与⊙K的距离为8cm．故选:B．
question_en: The minimum distance between a fixed point and each point on a circle is called the distance between the point and the circle. As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 28 cm, BC = 24 cm, ⊙K is tangent to the sides AB, BC, and CD at points E, F, and G, respectively, then the distance between point A and ⊙K is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect KE, KG, KF, and extend AK to intersect circle K at point M, as shown in the diagram. Because AB, CD, BC are tangent to circle K, therefore KE ⊥ AB, KG ⊥ CD, KF ⊥ BC, and since AB ∥ CD, therefore points E, K, G are collinear. Thus, EG = BC = 24cm, therefore EK = KF = 12cm, hence BE = 12cm. Therefore, AE = AB - BE = 28 - 12 = 16(cm). In right triangle △AEK, AK^2 = AE^2 + KE^2, therefore AK = √(12^2 + 16^2) = 20, thus AM = 20 - 12 = 8(cm). Therefore, the distance from point A to circle K is 8cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB、BC、CD、DA都是⊙O的切线,已知AD=3,BC=6,则AB+CD的值是()
answer_cot: ∵AB、BC、CD、DA都是⊙O的切线,∴可以假设切点分别为E、H、G、F,∴AF=AE,BE=BH,CH=CG,DG=DF,∴AD+BC=AF+DF+BH+CH=AE+BE+DG+CG=AB+CD,∵AD=3,BC=6,∴AB+CD=AD+BC=9,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB, BC, CD, and DA are all tangents of ⊙O. It is known that AD = 3, BC = 6, then the value of AB + CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB, BC, CD, and DA are all tangents to circle O, we can assume the points of tangency are E, H, G, and F, respectively. Therefore, AF = AE, BE = BH, CH = CG, DG = DF. Thus, AD + BC = AF + DF + BH + CH = AE + BE + DG + CG = AB + CD. Since AD = 3, BC = 6, therefore AB + CD = AD + BC = 9. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AC是⊙O的切线,A为切点,BC经过圆心．若∠C=50°,则∠B的大小等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, and BC passes through the center. If ∠C = 50°, then the size of ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, because AC is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since ∠C = 50°, therefore ∠AOC = 90° - 50° = 40°. Because OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB. Since ∠AOC = ∠B + ∠OAB = 40°, therefore ∠B = 20°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O半径为4,BC是直径,AC是⊙O的切线,且AC=6,那么AB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 4, BC is the diameter, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, and AC = 6, then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is the tangent to circle O, therefore AC ⊥ BC, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since BC = 8, AC = 6, therefore AB = √{BC² + AC²} = √{8² + 6²} = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,直线PA与⊙O相切于点A,PO交⊙O于点C,连接BC．若∠ABC=25°,则∠P的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, line PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC. If ∠ABC = 25°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ABC = 25°, therefore ∠AOP = 2∠ABC = 50°. Since PA is the tangent to circle O, therefore PA ⊥ AB, thus ∠PAO = 90°. Therefore, ∠P = 90° - ∠AOP = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AD,CD是弦,连接OC并延长,交过点A的切线于点B,若∠ADC=30°,则∠ABO的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AD and CD are chords. Connect OC and extend it to intersect the tangent through point A at point B. If ∠ADC = 30°, then the degree of ∠ABO is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA. Because ∠ADC = 30°, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠ADC = 60°. Since AB is tangent to circle O at A, therefore ∠OAB = 90°. Thus, ∠ABO = 90° - ∠AOC = 30°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,BC与⊙O相切于点B,连接OA,OB,若∠ABC=65°,则∠A等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, BC is tangent to ⊙O at point B, connect OA and OB, if ∠ABC = 65°, then ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ BC, therefore ∠OBC = 90°, thus ∠OBA = 90° - ∠ABC = 90° - 65° = 25°, and since OA = OB, therefore ∠A = ∠OBA = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB、AB都与⊙O相切,∠P=60°,则∠AOB等于()
answer_cot: 设PA、PB、AB与⊙O相切于E、D、C,连接OE、OD、OC,如图,∴PA、PB、AB都与⊙O相切,∴OE⊥AB,OD⊥PB,OC⊥PA,∴∠COD=180°-∠P=120°,在Rt△AOC和Rt△AOE中\begin{cases}OA=OA\\0C=OE\end{cases},∴Rt△AOC≌Rt△AOE,同理可得△OBD≌△OBE,∴∠AOC=∠AOE,∠BOD=∠BOE,∴∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}∠COD=60°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, and AB are all tangent to ⊙O, ∠P = 60°, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Let PA, PB, and AB be tangent to circle O at points E, D, and C, respectively, and connect OE, OD, and OC, as shown in the diagram. Therefore, PA, PB, and AB are all tangent to circle O, thus OE ⊥ AB, OD ⊥ PB, OC ⊥ PA. Therefore, ∠COD = 180° - ∠P = 120°. In right triangles AOC and AOE, we have \begin{cases}OA = OA\\OC = OE\end{cases}, therefore right triangle AOC is congruent to right triangle AOE. Similarly, it can be deduced that triangle OBD is congruent to triangle OBE, therefore ∠AOC = ∠AOE, ∠BOD = ∠BOE, thus ∠AOB = 1/2 ∠COD = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为2,点O到直线l距离为3,点P是直线l上的一个动点,PQ切⊙O于点Q,则PQ的最小值为()
answer_cot: 过点O作直线l的垂线,垂足为P,过P作⊙O的切线PQ,切点为Q,连接OQ,此时PQ为最小,∴OP=3,OQ=2,∵PQ切⊙O于点Q,∴∠OQP=90°,由勾股定理得:PQ=√{3^{2}-2^{2}}=√{5},则PQ的最小值为√{5},故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 2, the distance from point O to straight line l is 3, point P is a moving point on straight line l, PQ is tangent to ⊙O at point Q, then the minimum value of PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct a perpendicular from point O to line l, with the foot of the perpendicular being P, and draw a tangent PQ to circle O at point P, with Q being the point of tangency. Connect OQ; at this time, PQ is the shortest, therefore OP = 3, OQ = 2. Since PQ is tangent to circle O at point Q, therefore ∠OQP = 90°. By the Pythagorean theorem, we get: PQ = √{3^2 - 2^2} = √{5}, thus the minimum value of PQ is √{5}. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D在⊙O上,∠CDB=20°,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点E,则∠E等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O, ∠CDB = 20°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn through point C and intersects the extended line of AB at point E, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, as shown in the diagram. Because CE is a tangent, therefore OC ⊥ CE, thus ∠COE = 90°. Since ∠A = ∠CDB = 20°, therefore ∠COB = 2∠A = 40°. In right triangle △OCE, ∠E = 90° - ∠COE = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,P为⊙O外一点,PA、PB分别切⊙O于A、B,CD切⊙O于点E,分别交PA、PB于点C、D,若PA=15,则△PCD的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B respectively, CD is a tangent to ⊙O at point E, and intersects PA and PB at points C and D respectively. If PA = 15, then the perimeter of △PCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD, PA, and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore CA = CE, BD = ED, PB = PA = 15, thus PC + CD + PD = PC + CE + PD + DE = PC + AC + PD + BD = PA + PB = 2PA = 30, meaning the perimeter of △PCD is 30. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD为圆内接四边形,AB是直径,MN切⊙O于C点,∠BCM=38°,那么∠ABC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral in a circle, AB is the diameter, MN is tangent to ⊙O at point C, ∠BCM = 38°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, as shown in the diagram. Because MN is a tangent to circle O at point C, therefore OC ⊥ MN, thus ∠OCM = 90°. Therefore, ∠OCB = 90° - ∠BCM = 90° - 38° = 52°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠ABC = ∠OCB = 52°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,过⊙O上一点E作圆的切线,交直径AC的延长线于点B,再取⊙O上一点D,连接AE、ED和CD,若⊙O的半径为2,∠EDC=30°,则CB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a tangent to ⊙O at point E intersects the extended line of diameter AC at point B. Another point D is taken on ⊙O, and AE, ED, and CD are connected. If the radius of ⊙O is 2, and ∠EDC = 30°, then the length of CB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OE. Because ∠A = ∠EDC and ∠EDC = 30°, therefore ∠A = 30°. Since OA = OE, therefore ∠A = ∠AEO = 30°. Thus ∠EOB = ∠A + ∠AEO = 60°. Since BE is a tangent, therefore ∠BEO = 90°. Therefore ∠B = 30°. In right triangle △BOE, because ∠OEB = 90°, OE = 2, and ∠B = 30°, therefore OB = 2OE = 4. Since OC = 2, therefore BC = OB - OC = 4 - 2 = 2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知AB是⊙O的直径,AC是弦,CD切⊙O于点C,交AB的延长线于点D,∠ACD=120°,BD=10cm,则⊙O的半径为()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵CD切⊙O于点C,∴∠OCD=90°,∵∠ACD=120°,∴∠ACO=30°,∵OA=OC,∴∠A=∠ACO=30°,∴∠OCD=∠A+∠ACO=60°,∴∠D=30°,∴OD=2OC,∵BD=10cm,∴OC=OB=10cm,即⊙O的半径为10cm,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is a chord, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point C, and intersects the extension of AB at point D, ∠ACD = 120°, BD = 10 cm, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is a tangent to circle O at point C, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since ∠ACD = 120°, therefore ∠ACO = 30°. Because OA = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠ACO = 30°. Thus ∠OCD = ∠A + ∠ACO = 60°. Therefore, ∠D = 30°. Hence, OD = 2OC. Since BD = 10cm, therefore OC = OB = 10cm, which means the radius of circle O is 10cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,AO与⊙O交于点C,若∠BAO=30°,则∠OCB的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,∴∠OBA=90°,∵∠BAO=30°,∴∠O=60°,∵OB=OC,∴△OBC是等边三角形,∴∠OCB=60°,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, B is the tangent point, AO intersects ⊙O at point C, if ∠BAO = 30°, then the degree of ∠OCB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the tangent to circle O with B as the point of tangency, therefore ∠OBA = 90°. Since ∠BAO = 30°, therefore ∠O = 60°. Since OB = OC, therefore △OBC is an equilateral triangle, thus ∠OCB = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为5,点O到直线l的距离为7,点P是直线l上的一个动点,PQ与⊙O相切于点Q,则PQ的最小值为()
answer_cot: ∵PQ切⊙O于点Q,∴∠OQP=90°,∴PQ²=OP²-OQ²,而OQ=5,∴PQ²=OP²-5²,即PQ=√{0P^{2}-5^{2}},当OP最小时,PQ最小,∵点O到直线l的距离为7,∴OP的最小值为7,∴PQ的最小值=√{7^{2}-5^{2}}=2√{6}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5, the distance from point O to line l is 7, point P is a moving point on line l, PQ is tangent to ⊙O at point Q, then the minimum value of PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PQ is a tangent to circle O at point Q, therefore ∠OQP = 90°, thus PQ² = OP² - OQ², and since OQ = 5, therefore PQ² = OP² - 5², which means PQ = √{OP² - 5²}. When OP is at its minimum, PQ is also at its minimum. Since the distance from point O to line l is 7, the minimum value of OP is 7, therefore the minimum value of PQ = √{7² - 5²} = 2√{6}. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,过⊙O外一点P引⊙O的两条切线PA、PB,切点分别是A、B,OP交⊙O于点C,点D是⁀{ABC}上不与点A、点C重合的一个动点,连接AD、CD,若∠APB=80°,则∠ADC的度数是()
answer_cot: 解；如图,由四边形的内角和定理,得∠BOA=360°-90°-90°-80°=100°,由⁀{AC}=⁀{BC},得∠AOC=∠BOC=50°．由圆周角定理,得∠ADC=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=25°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, two tangents PA and PB are drawn from a point P outside ⊙O, with the tangent points being A and B respectively. OP intersects ⊙O at point C, and point D is a moving point on arc ABC that does not coincide with points A or C. Connect AD and CD. If ∠APB = 80°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Solution: As shown in the diagram, by the theorem of the sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral, we have ∠BOA = 360° - 90° - 90° - 80° = 100°. Since arc AC equals arc BC, we get ∠AOC = ∠BOC = 50°. By the inscribed angle theorem, we have ∠ADC = 1/2 ∠AOC = 25°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB和⊙O相切于点B,∠AOB=60°,则∠A的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, ∠AOB = 60°, then the size of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore ∠ABO = 90°, thus ∠A = 90° - ∠AOB = 90° - 60° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图1,⊙O的直径AB=2,⊙O的切线CD与AB的延长线交于点C,D为切点,∠C=30°,则AD等于()
answer_cot: 连接OD,∵⊙O的切线CD,D为切点,∴∠ODC=90°,∵∠C=30°,⊙O的直径AB=2,∴CO=2DO=2,∠DOC=60°,∵AO=DO,∴∠DAO=∠ODA=30°,∴∠DAC=∠C=30°,∴AD=DC=CO•cos30°=2×\frac{√{3}}{2}=√{3}．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in Figure 1, the diameter AB of ⊙O is 2, the tangent CD of ⊙O intersects the extended line of AB at point C, D is the tangent point, ∠C = 30°, then AD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD, because CD is a tangent to circle O at point D, therefore ∠ODC = 90°. Since ∠C = 30° and the diameter AB of circle O is 2, therefore CO = 2DO = 2, ∠DOC = 60°. Because AO = DO, therefore ∠DAO = ∠ODA = 30°, thus ∠DAC = ∠C = 30°, therefore AD = DC = CO•cos30° = 2×(√3/2) = √3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,直线PA与⊙O相切于点A,PO交⊙O于点C,连接BC．若∠P=40°,则∠ABC的度数为()
answer_cot: 如图,∵AB是⊙O的直径,直线PA与⊙O相切于点A,∴∠PAO=90°．又∵∠P=40°,∴∠POA=50°,∴∠ABC=\frac{1}{2}∠POA=25°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, line PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC. If ∠P = 40°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because AB is the diameter of circle O, and line PA is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore ∠PAO = 90°. Also, because ∠P = 40°, therefore ∠POA = 50°, thus ∠ABC = 1/2 ∠POA = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别是⊙O的切线,A,B分别为切点,点E是⊙O上一点,且∠AEB=50°,则∠P为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points respectively, point E is a point on ⊙O, and ∠AEB = 50°, then ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and BO. Because ∠AEB = 50°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠E = 100°. Since PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Thus, ∠P = 180° - ∠AOB = 80°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA切⊙O于点A,PB切⊙O于点B,CD切⊙O于E,若∠APB=50°,则∠COD的度数是()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OA,OB,OE,∵PA、PB、CD分别切⊙O于A、B、E,∴∠AOC=∠EOC,同理∠BOD=∠DOE,∴∠COD=∠COE+∠DOE=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB,∵∠APB=50°,∴∠AOB=130°,∴∠COD=65°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point E, if ∠APB = 50°, then the degree of ∠COD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA, OB, OE. Because PA, PB, and CD are tangents to circle O at points A, B, and E respectively, therefore ∠AOC = ∠EOC. Similarly, ∠BOD = ∠DOE, thus ∠COD = ∠COE + ∠DOE = 1/2 ∠AOB. Since ∠APB = 50°, therefore ∠AOB = 130°, thus ∠COD = 65°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AC是⊙O的切线,A为切点,BC经过圆心,∠B=20°,则∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, BC passes through the center, ∠B = 20°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Join OA. Because OA = OB, therefore ∠BAO = ∠B = 20°, thus ∠AOC = ∠BAO + ∠B = 40°. Since AC is a tangent to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ AC, that is ∠OAC = 90°, thus ∠C = 90° - ∠AOC = 90° - 40° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 已知⊙O的直径AB与弦AC的夹角为30°,过C点的切线PC与AB延长线交P,⊙O的半径为5,则BP的长为()
question_en: As known, the angle between the diameter AB of ⊙O and the chord AC is 30°, the tangent PC through point C intersects the extension of AB at P, the radius of ⊙O is 5, then the length of BP is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OC. Because PC is a tangent to the circle, therefore ∠OCP = 90°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠ACO = ∠A = 30°. Thus ∠COP = 60°, therefore ∠P = 30°. Therefore, OP = 2OC = 10, therefore BP = OP - OB = 10 - 5 = 5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C是⊙O上的点,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点E,若∠A=30°,则sin∠E的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O. A tangent to ⊙O is drawn through point C and intersects the extended line of AB at point E. If ∠A = 30°, then the value of sin∠E is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CE is the tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CE. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠A = 60°, thus ∠E = 90° - ∠BOC = 30°, therefore sin∠E = sin30° = 1/2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AD是⊙O的切线,A为切点．点C在⊙O上,连接BC并延长交AD于点D,若∠AOC=70°,则∠ADB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point. Point C is on ⊙O, connect BC and extend it to intersect AD at point D, if ∠AOC = 70°, then ∠ADB = ()
answer_cot_en: Because OB = OC, ∠AOC = 70°, and ∠AOC = ∠B + ∠OCB, therefore ∠B = ∠OCB = 35°. Since AD is a tangent to circle O, therefore AB ⊥ AD, thus ∠BAD = 90°, and ∠ADB = 90° - ∠B = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上一点,四边形ABCD是平行四边形,CD与⊙O相切,AD与⊙O交于点E,∠D=70°,则∠BEC=()
answer_cot: 证明:连接AC,∵CD是圆⊙O的切线,∴∠ABC=∠ACD,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,∠ABC=∠D=70°∴∠BAC=∠ACD,∴∠ABC=∠BAC=70°,∵∠BEC=∠BAC,∴∠BEC=70°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are points on ⊙O, quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, CD is tangent to ⊙O, AD intersects ⊙O at point E, ∠D = 70°, then ∠BEC = ()
answer_cot_en: Proof: Connect AC. Since CD is the tangent to circle ⊙O, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACD. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ CD, and ∠ABC = ∠D = 70°. Thus ∠BAC = ∠ACD, therefore ∠ABC = ∠BAC = 70°. Since ∠BEC = ∠BAC, therefore ∠BEC = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如果,过圆O外一点P引圆O的切线PA,PB,切点为A,B,C为圆上一点,若∠APB=50°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 连结OA,如图所示:∵PA、PB是⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°,∴∠AOB+∠P=180°,∴∠AOB=180°-50°=130°,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=65°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, if a tangent PA and PB are drawn to circle O from a point P outside the circle, with A and B being the points of tangency, and C is a point on the circle, if ∠APB = 50°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA as shown: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, therefore ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°, thus ∠AOB + ∠P = 180°, thus ∠AOB = 180° - 50° = 130°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA与⊙O相切于点A,PO交⊙O于点C,点B是优弧CBA上一点,若∠P=26°,则∠ABC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PO intersects ⊙O at point C, point B is a point on the major arc CBA, if ∠P = 26°, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA. Therefore, ∠PAO = 90°. Since ∠O = 90° - ∠P = 64°, therefore ∠B = 1/2 ∠O = 32°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,PD是⊙O的切线,点C为切点,PD与AB的延长线相交于点D,连接AC,若∠D=2∠CAD,CD=2,则BD的长为()
answer_cot: 连接CO,∵PD是⊙O的切线,点C为切点,∴∠OCD=90°,∵AO=CO,∴∠OAC=∠ACO,∴∠COD=2∠CAD,∵∠D=2∠CAD,∴∠COD=∠D,∴CO=DO=2,∴DO=2√{2},∴BD=2√{2}-2．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, PD is a tangent of ⊙O, point C is the tangent point, PD intersects the extension line of AB at point D, connect AC, if ∠D = 2∠CAD, CD = 2, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect CO. Because PD is a tangent to circle O with point C as the point of tangency, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since AO = CO, therefore ∠OAC = ∠ACO. Thus, ∠COD = 2∠CAD. Because ∠D = 2∠CAD, therefore ∠COD = ∠D. Hence, CO = DO = 2. Therefore, DO = 2√2, and BD = 2√2 - 2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA为⊙O的切线,A为切点,PO交⊙O于点B,PA=4,OA=3,则cos∠APO的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, PO intersects ⊙O at point B, PA = 4, OA = 3, then the value of cos∠APO is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is the tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ AP. Also, since PA = 4 and OA = 3, therefore OP = 5. Thus, cos∠APO = 4/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC是⊙O的切线,连接OC交⊙O于点D,连接BD,∠C=45°,则∠ABD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is the tangent of ⊙O. Connect OC and intersect ⊙O at point D, connect BD, ∠C = 45°, then the degree of ∠ABD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is the tangent to circle O, therefore AC ⊥ AB, therefore ∠BAC = 90°. Since ∠C = 45°, therefore ∠AOC = 45°. Since OB = OD, therefore ∠ABD = ∠ODB = 22.5°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,AB是⊙O的直径,EC与⊙O相切于点C,∠ECB=35°,则∠D的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, EC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, ∠ECB = 35°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BD. Because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Since EC is tangent to circle O, ∠ECB = 35°, therefore ∠BDC = 35°. Thus, ∠D = ∠ADB + ∠BDC = 90° + 35° = 125°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,如果直线AB与半径为2的⊙O相切于点C,D是⊙O上一点,且∠EDC=30°,弦EF∥AB,则EF的长是()
answer_cot: 连接OE和OC,且OC与EF的交点为M．∵∠EDC=30°,∴∠COE=60°．∵AB与⊙O相切,∴OC⊥AB,又∵EF∥AB,∴OC⊥EF,即△EOM为直角三角形．在Rt△EOM中,EM=sin60°×OE=\frac{√{3}}{2}×2=√{3},∵EF=2EM,∴EF=2√{3}．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, if the straight line AB is tangent to ⊙O with a radius of 2 at point C, D is a point on ⊙O, and ∠EDC = 30°, chord EF ∥ AB, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OE and OC, and let the intersection point of OC and EF be M. Because ∠EDC = 30°, therefore ∠COE = 60°. Since AB is tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ AB, and since EF ∥ AB, therefore OC ⊥ EF, which means △EOM is a right-angled triangle. In right-angled triangle EOM, EM = sin60° × OE = (√3/2) × 2 = √3. Since EF = 2EM, therefore EF = 2√3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC的边AC与⊙O相交于C、D两点,且经过圆心O,边AB与⊙O相切,切点是B,已知∠A=30°,则∠C等于()
answer_cot: 连结OB,如图,∵边AB与⊙O相切于点B,∴OB⊥AB,∴∠ABO=90°,∴∠AOB=90°-∠A=90°-30°=60°,∵OB=OC,∴∠OBC=∠C,∵∠AOB=∠OBC+∠C,∴∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=30°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side AC of △ABC intersects ⊙O at points C and D, and passes through the center O, side AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, it is known that ∠A = 30°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB as shown in the diagram. Because side AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, thus ∠ABO = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB = 90° - ∠A = 90° - 30° = 60°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠C. Because ∠AOB = ∠OBC + ∠C, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,直线CD与以线段AB为直径的圆相切于点D并交BA的延长线于点C,且AB=2,AD=1,P点在切线CD的延长线上移动时,则△PBD的外接圆的半径的最小值为()
answer_cot: 连接DO．∵AB是直径,∴∠ADB=90°,∵AB=2,AD=1,∴AB=2AD,∴∠ABD=30°,∵OD=OB,∴∠ODB=∠OBD=30°,∵CD是切线,∴∠PDO=90°,∴∠PDB=60°,由题意当BD为△PBD外接圆直径时,△PBD的外接圆半径最小．∵BD=√{AB^{2}-AD^{2}}=√{3},∴△PBD外接圆的半径为\frac{√{3}}{2}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line CD is tangent to the circle with segment AB as the diameter at point D and intersects the extension of BA at point C, and AB = 2, AD = 1. When point P moves on the extension of the tangent CD, then the minimum value of the radius of the circumcircle of △PBD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect DO. Because AB is the diameter, ∠ADB = 90°. Since AB = 2 and AD = 1, therefore AB = 2AD, thus ∠ABD = 30°. Since OD = OB, therefore ∠ODB = ∠OBD = 30°. Because CD is a tangent, ∠PDO = 90°, thus ∠PDB = 60°. According to the problem, when BD is the diameter of the circumcircle of △PBD, the radius of the circumcircle of △PBD is the smallest. Since BD = √{AB² - AD²} = √{3}, the radius of the circumcircle of △PBD is \frac{√{3}}{2}. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,CD与⊙O相切于点A,若∠BAD=66°,则∠B等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point A, if ∠BAD = 66°, then ∠B is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because CD is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ CD, therefore ∠OAD = 90°. Since ∠BAD = 66°, therefore ∠OAB = 90° - ∠BAD = 24°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB = 24°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,⊙O的直径AB=2,点D在AB的延长线上,DC与⊙O相切于点C,连接AC．若∠A=30°,则CD长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diameter AB of ⊙O is 2, point D is on the extension of AB, DC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, connect AC. If ∠A = 30°, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the right figure, connect BC and OC. Because AB is the diameter, therefore ∠BCA = 90°. Also, since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠CBA = 90° - 30° = 60°. Since DC is a tangent, therefore ∠BCD = ∠A = 30°, ∠OCD = 90°. Thus, ∠D = ∠CBA - ∠BCD = 60° - 30° = 30°. Because AB = 2, therefore OC = 1, and OD = 2. Therefore, CD = √{OD² - OC²} = √{2² - 1²} = √{3}. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,若∠P=70°,则∠C的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B, respectively. If ∠P = 70°, then the size of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B, respectively, therefore OA ⊥ PA and OB ⊥ PB, that is ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB = 360° - ∠PAO - ∠P - ∠PBO = 360° - 90° - 70° - 90° = 110°. Therefore, ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=8,AB=10,点O为BC上的点,⊙O的半径OC=1,点D是AB边上的动点,过点D作⊙O的一条切线DE(点E为切点),则线段DE的最小值为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OE、OD,在Rt△ABC中,∵∠C=90°,AC=8,AB=10,∴BC=6,∵DE为⊙O的切线,∴∠DEO=90°,∴DE²+OE²=OD²,∵OE=1,∴DE²=OD²-1,即DE=√{OD^{2}-1},要使DE最小,则OD最小即可,∵D为AB边上的动点,∴当OD⊥AB时,OD最小,∵BC=6,OC=1,∴BO=5,∵∠ODB=∠ACB=90°,∠B=∠B,∴△BDO∽△BCA,∴\frac{OD}{AC}=\frac{B0}{AB},即\frac{OD}{8}=\frac{5}{10},解得:OD=4,∴DE=√{4^{2}-1}=√{15},故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, AC = 8, AB = 10, point O is a point on BC, the radius of ⊙O is OC = 1, point D is a moving point on side AB, passing point D is a tangent DE of ⊙O (Point E is the tangent point), then the minimum value of the line segment DE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OE and OD. In right triangle △ABC, because ∠C = 90°, AC = 8, AB = 10, therefore BC = 6. Since DE is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠DEO = 90°, thus DE² + OE² = OD². Given that OE = 1, therefore DE² = OD² - 1, which means DE = √{OD² - 1}. To minimize DE, OD must be minimized. Since D is a moving point on side AB, OD is minimized when OD ⊥ AB. Given that BC = 6, OC = 1, therefore BO = 5. Since ∠ODB = ∠ACB = 90°, and ∠B = ∠B, therefore △BDO ∼ △BCA, thus OD/AC = BO/AB, which means OD/8 = 5/10. Solving this gives: OD = 4, therefore DE = √{4² - 1} = √{15}. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图．已知AB为⊙O的直径,AB=2,AD和BE是⊙O的两条切线,A、B为切点,过圆上一点C作⊙O的切线CF,分别交AD、BE于点M、N,连接AC、CB．若∠ABC=30°,则AM的长是()
answer_cot: 连接OM,OC,∵OB=OC,且∠ABC=30°,∴∠BCO=∠ABC=30°,∵∠AOC为△BOC的外角,∴∠AOC=2∠ABC=60°,∵MA,MC分别为圆O的切线,∴MA=MC,且∠MAO=∠MCO=90°,在Rt△AOM和Rt△COM中,\begin{cases}MA=MC\\OM=OM\end{cases},∴Rt△AOM≌Rt△COM(HL),∴∠AOM=∠COM=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=30°,在Rt△AOM中,OA=\frac{1}{2}AB=1,∠AOM=30°,∴tan30°=\frac{AM}{OA},即\frac{√{3}}{3}=\frac{AM}{1},解得:AM=\frac{√{3}}{3}．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AB = 2, AD and BE are two tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, a tangent CF of ⊙O is made through a point C on the circle, intersecting AD and BE at points M and N, respectively. Connect AC and CB. If ∠ABC = 30°, then the length of AM is ()
answer_cot_en:
Connect OM and OC. Because OB = OC, and ∠ABC = 30°, therefore ∠BCO = ∠ABC = 30°. Since ∠AOC is an exterior angle of △BOC, therefore ∠AOC = 2∠ABC = 60°. Because MA and MC are tangents to circle O, therefore MA = MC, and ∠MAO = ∠MCO = 90°. In right triangles △AOM and △COM, we have:
\begin{cases}
MA = MC \\
OM = OM
\end{cases},
therefore right △AOM ≅ right △COM (HL), thus ∠AOM = ∠COM = 1/2 ∠AOC = 30°. In right △AOM, OA = 1/2 AB = 1, and ∠AOM = 30°, therefore tan30° = AM/OA, which means √3/3 = AM/1. Solving this, we get: AM = √3/3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,直线AB、AD分别与⊙O切于点B、D,C为⊙O上一点,且∠BCD=132°,则∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines AB and AD are tangent to ⊙O at points B and D respectively, C is a point on ⊙O, and ∠BCD = 132°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw diameter BE through point B, and connect OD and DE. Because B, C, D, and E are concyclic, ∠BCD = 140°, therefore ∠E = 180° - 132° = 48°, thus ∠BOD = 96°. Since AB and AD are tangent to circle O at points B and D, therefore ∠OBA = ∠ODA = 90°, thus ∠A = 360° - 90° - 90° - 96° = 84°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,点E是⊙O上一点,且∠AEB=50°,则∠P=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B, point E is a point on ⊙O, and ∠AEB = 50°, then ∠P = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, BO; because ∠AOB = 2∠E = 100°, and since PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, thus ∠P = 180° - ∠AOB = 80°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AO的延长线交过点B的⊙O的切线于点C,如果∠ABO=25°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, the extension of AO intersects the tangent of ⊙O at point B at point C. If ∠ABO = 25°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OA = OB, therefore ∠A = ∠ABO = 25°, thus ∠COB = ∠A + ∠ABO = 50°. Since BC is a tangent, therefore OB ⊥ BC, then ∠OBC = 90°, thus ∠C = 90° - ∠COB = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、A是⊙O上的点,∠CAB=20°,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点D,则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and A are points on ⊙O, ∠CAB = 20°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn through point C and intersects the extension of AB at point D, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because OC = OA and ∠CAB = 20°, therefore ∠ACO = ∠A = 20°, thus ∠COD = ∠A + ∠ACO = 40°. Since DC is tangent to circle O at C, therefore OC ⊥ CD, thus ∠OCD = 90°, therefore ∠D = 180° - ∠COD - ∠OCD = 180° - 40° - 90° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,BC是⊙O的直径,点D在⊙O上,AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,连接CD并延长交AB于点A,若∠BOD=100°,则∠BAC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BC is the diameter of ⊙O, point D is on ⊙O, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, B is the tangent point, connect CD and extend it to intersect AB at point A. If ∠BOD = 100°, then the degree of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BA is the tangent to circle O with B as the point of tangency, therefore BC ⊥ BA. Therefore ∠CBA = 90°. Because ∠BOD = 100°, therefore ∠C = 50°. Therefore ∠A = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,AO与⊙O交于点C,若∠BCA=115°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, B is the tangent point, AO intersects ⊙O at point C. If ∠BCA = 115°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the tangent to circle O with B as the point of tangency, therefore ∠OBA = 90°. Since ∠BCA = 115°, therefore ∠OCB = 180° - 115° = 65°. Because OB = OC, therefore ∠OBC = ∠OCB = 65°. Thus ∠O = 180° - ∠OBC - ∠OCB = 50°. Since ∠OBA = 90°, therefore ∠A = 180° - 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA,PB是⊙O的切线,A,B为切点,连结OA,OB,AB,若∠P=60°,则∠OAB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points. Connect OA, OB, and AB. If ∠P = 60°, then the degree of ∠OAB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, with A and B as the points of tangency, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, thus ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 120°. Since AO = OB, therefore ∠OAB = ∠OBA = (180° - ∠AOB) ÷ 2 = 30°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为5,直线l是⊙O的切线,A为切点,则点O到直线l的距离是()
answer_cot: ∵直线l是⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥l,∵⊙O的半径为5,∴点O到直线l的距离是:5．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5, straight line l is a tangent to ⊙O, A is the tangent point, then the distance from point O to straight line l is ()
answer_cot_en: Because line l is the tangent to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ l. Since the radius of circle O is 5, the distance from point O to line l is: 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA切⊙O于点A,弦AB⊥OP,垂足为M,AB=4,OM=1,则PA的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, chord AB ⊥ OP at the foot M, AB = 4, OM = 1, then the length of PA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ⊥ OP, therefore AM = BM = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 4 = 2. In right triangle AOM, OA = √(OA² + AM²) = √(1² + 2²) = √5. Since PA is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ PA, thus ∠OAP = 90°, which means ∠PAM + ∠OAM = 90°, and ∠PAM + ∠P = 90°, therefore ∠P = ∠OAM. Hence, right triangle PAM ∼ right triangle AOM, therefore PA/OA = AM/OM, which means PA/√5 = 2/1, therefore PA = 2√5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O直径,C是AB延长线上一点,CD是⊙O的切线,D为切点,∠A=30°,AB=2cm,则CD的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OD．∵OA=OD,∴∠A=∠ADO=30°,∴∠DOC=60°,∵CD是⊙O的切线,D为切点,∴∠ODC=90°,∴∠C=90°-∠DOC=90°-60°=30°．又∵OD=\frac{1}{2}AB=1cm．∴CD=√{3}cm．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on the extension of AB, CD is a tangent of ⊙O, D is the tangent point, ∠A = 30°, AB = 2 cm, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD. Because OA = OD, therefore ∠A = ∠ADO = 30°, thus ∠DOC = 60°. Since CD is a tangent to circle O at point D, therefore ∠ODC = 90°, thus ∠C = 90° - ∠DOC = 90° - 60° = 30°. Also, since OD = 1/2 AB = 1cm, therefore CD = √3 cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,点E、C都在圆上,连接AE,CE,BC,过点A作⊙O的切线交BC的延长线于点D,若∠AEC=25°,则∠D的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵过点A作⊙O的切线交BC的延长线于点D,∴∠BAD=90°,∵∠AEC=25°,∴∠B=∠AEC=25°,∴∠D=180°-90°-25°=65°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points E and C are on the circle. Connect AE, CE, BC, and draw a tangent to ⊙O at point A, which intersects the extension of BC at point D. If ∠AEC = 25°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a tangent to circle O is drawn through point A and intersects the extension of BC at point D, therefore ∠BAD = 90°. Since ∠AEC = 25°, therefore ∠B = ∠AEC = 25°, thus ∠D = 180° - 90° - 25° = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,P是⊙O外一点,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,∠APB=50°,点C在⊙O上,则∠ACB=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, ∠APB = 50°, point C is on ⊙O, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB as shown in the diagram. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, therefore ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB + ∠P = 180°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 50° = 130°, therefore ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 65°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点C是半圆O的直径AB的延长线上一点．CD与半圆O相切,D为切点,过点D作DE∥AB交半圆O于点E．若四边形OCDE是平行四边形,CD=4,则ED的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OD,∴OD=OE,∵CD与半圆O相切,∴∠CDO=90°,∵四边形OCDE是平行四边形,∴CD=OE,CD∥OE,∴∠DOE=90°,OD=OE=CD=4,∴DE=4√{2}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on the extension line of the diameter AB of the semicircle O. CD is tangent to the semicircle O at point D, and DE is drawn parallel to AB intersecting the semicircle O at point E. If quadrilateral OCDE is a parallelogram, and CD = 4, then the length of ED is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD, therefore OD = OE. Since CD is tangent to the semicircle O, therefore ∠CDO = 90°. Since quadrilateral OCDE is a parallelogram, therefore CD = OE, CD ∥ OE, thus ∠DOE = 90°. OD = OE = CD = 4, therefore DE = 4√2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为3,PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,OP=6,则PB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 3, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B respectively, OP = 6, then the length of PB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B, respectively, therefore PA = PB, ∠OPA = 90°. In right triangle OAP, because OA = 3 and OP = 6, therefore PA = √{6² - 3²} = √{36 - 9} = 3√{3}, thus PB = PA = 3√{3}. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B,点C在劣弧AB上(不与A,B重合),若∠APB=70°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 连结OB,∠ADB为弧AB所对的圆周角,如图∵PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A,B两点,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB+∠P=180°,∴∠AOB=180°-70°=110°,∴∠D=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=55°,∴∠ACB=180°-∠D=125°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B, respectively, point C is on the minor arc AB (not coinciding with A or B). If ∠APB = 70°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, ∠ADB is the angle subtended by arc AB on the circumference of the circle, as shown in the diagram. Because PA and PB are tangent to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°, thus ∠AOB + ∠P = 180°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 70° = 110°, therefore ∠D = 1/2 ∠AOB = 55°, therefore ∠ACB = 180° - ∠D = 125°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,P为⊙O外一点,PA切⊙O于点A,⊙O的半径为6,且PA=8,则cos∠APO等于()
answer_cot: 连接OA,如图所示:∵AP为圆O的切线,∴OA⊥AP,∴∠OAP=90°,在直角三角形OPA中,OA=6,PA=8,根据勾股定理得:OP²=OA²+AP²=6²+8²=100,∴OP=10,∴cos∠APO=\frac{AP}{OP}=\frac{4}{5}．A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, the radius of ⊙O is 6, and PA = 8, then cos∠APO is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA as shown: Because AP is the tangent to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ AP, therefore ∠OAP = 90°. In the right-angled triangle OPA, OA = 6, PA = 8, according to the Pythagorean theorem: OP² = OA² + AP² = 6² + 8² = 100, therefore OP = 10, therefore cos∠APO = AP / OP = 4/5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AC是⊙O切线,A为切点,BC经过圆心．若∠B=20°,则∠C的大小等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, and BC passes through the center. If ∠B = 20°, then the size of ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA. Because AC is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB = 20°, thus ∠AOC = 40°, therefore ∠C = 50°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AO的延长线交过点B的⊙O的切线于点C,如果∠ABO=20°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, the extension of AO intersects the tangent of ⊙O at point B at point C. If ∠ABO = 20°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC is the tangent to circle O, and OB is the radius of circle O, therefore ∠OBC = 90°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠A = ∠ABO = 20°, thus ∠BOC = 40°, therefore ∠C = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,以点O为圆心的两个圆中,大圆的弦AB切小圆于点C,OA交小圆于点D,若OD=2,tan∠OAB=\frac{1}{2},则AB的长是()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵大圆的弦AB切小圆于点C,∴OC⊥AB,∴AB=2AC,∵OD=2,∴OC=2,∵tan∠OAB=\frac{1}{2},∴AC=4,∴AB=8,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, among the two circles with point O as the center, the chord AB of the larger circle is tangent to the smaller circle at point C, OA intersects the smaller circle at point D, if OD = 2, tan∠OAB = \(\frac{1}{2}\), then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC. Because the chord AB of the larger circle is tangent to the smaller circle at point C, therefore OC ⊥ AB, thus AB = 2AC. Since OD = 2, therefore OC = 2. Because tan∠OAB = 1/2, therefore AC = 4, thus AB = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA和PB是⊙O的切线,点A和点B是切点,AC是⊙O的直径,已知∠P=40°,则∠ACB的大小是()
answer_cot: 连接OB,∵AC是直径,∴∠ABC=90°,∵PA、PB是⊙O的切线,A、B为切点,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=140°,由圆周角定理知,∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=70°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, points A and B are the tangent points, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, it is known that ∠P = 40°, then the size of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Join OB, because AC is the diameter, therefore ∠ABC = 90°. Since PA and PB are tangents to circle O, with A and B as the points of tangency, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Thus ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 140°. By the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点,若∠C=65°,则∠P的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B, respectively. If ∠C = 65°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ AP, OB ⊥ BP, thus ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Also, since ∠AOB = 2∠C = 130°, then ∠P = 360° - (90° + 90° + 130°) = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C,D是⊙O上的点,∠CDB=30°,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于E,则sinE的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are points on ⊙O, ∠CDB = 30°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn from point C and intersects the extended line of AB at E, then the value of sinE is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because EC is tangent to circle O at C, therefore ∠OCE = 90°. Since ∠CDB = 30°, therefore ∠A = ∠CDB = 30°. Because OA = OC, therefore ∠ACO = ∠A = 30°, thus ∠COE = 30° + 30° = 60°, therefore ∠E = 180° - 90° - 60° = 30°, hence sinE = 1/2. Therefore, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA为⊙O的切线,A为切点,B是OP与⊙O的交点,C是优弧AB上一点(不与点A、B重合)．若∠P=36°,则∠ACB的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, B is the intersection point of OP with ⊙O, C is a point on the major arc AB (not coinciding with points A or B). If ∠P = 36°, then the size of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAP = 90°. Since ∠P = 36°, therefore ∠O = 90° - ∠P = 90° - 36° = 54°, thus ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠O = 1/2 × 54° = 27°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的切线,切点为A,BO交⊙O于点C,点D在⊙O上,若∠ABO的度数是32°,则∠ADC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, with the point of tangency at A, BO intersects ⊙O at point C, point D is on ⊙O. If the degree of ∠ABO is 32°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ AB. Since ∠ABO = 32°, therefore ∠AOB = 90° - 32° = 58°, thus ∠ADC = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 58° = 29°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,同心圆中的大圆半径为5,小圆半径为3,若大圆的弦AB与小圆有公共点,则AB的最小长度是()
answer_cot: 如图,当AB与小圆相切时有一个公共点D,此时AB取最小值,连接OA,OD,可得OD⊥AB,∴D为AB的中点,即AD=BD,在Rt△ADO中,OD=3,OA=5,∴AD=4,∴AB=2AD=8,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the larger concentric circle is 5, the radius of the smaller circle is 3. If the chord AB of the larger circle has a common point with the smaller circle, then the minimum length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, when AB is tangent to the smaller circle at a single common point D, AB is at its minimum value. Connect OA and OD, it can be concluded that OD ⊥ AB, therefore D is the midpoint of AB, which means AD = BD. In the right triangle ADO, OD = 3, OA = 5, therefore AD = 4, thus AB = 2AD = 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AB为直径,BC为弦,CD为切线,连接OC．若∠BCD=50°,则∠AOC的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵在⊙O中,AB为直径,BC为弦,CD为切线,∴∠OCD=90°,∵∠BCD=50°,∴∠OCB=40°,∴∠AOC=80°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, BC is a chord, CD is a tangent, connect OC. If ∠BCD = 50°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in circle O, AB is the diameter, BC is a chord, and CD is a tangent, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since ∠BCD = 50°, therefore ∠OCB = 40°, thus ∠AOC = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 已知AB是⊙O的直径,点P是AB延长线上的一个动点,过P作⊙O的切线,切点为C,∠APC的平分线交AC于点D．若∠CPD=20°,则∠CAP等于()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OC,∵OC=OA,PD平分∠APC,∴∠CPD=∠DPA=20°,∠A=∠ACO,∵PC为⊙O的切线,∴OC⊥PC,∵∠CPO+∠COP=90°,∴(∠CPD+∠DPA)+(∠A+∠ACO)=90°,∴∠DPA+∠A=45°,∴∠CDP=45°,∴∠CAP=25°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point P is a moving point on the extension line of AB, passing through P is a tangent of ⊙O, the tangent point is C, the bisector of ∠APC intersects AC at point D. If ∠CPD = 20°, then ∠CAP is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OC. Because OC = OA and PD bisects ∠APC, therefore ∠CPD = ∠DPA = 20°, ∠A = ∠ACO. Since PC is a tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ PC. Because ∠CPO + ∠COP = 90°, therefore (∠CPD + ∠DPA) + (∠A + ∠ACO) = 90°, thus ∠DPA + ∠A = 45°, therefore ∠CDP = 45°, thus ∠CAP = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AD是⊙O的切线,BC∥OD交⊙O于点C,若AB=2,OD=3,则BC的长为()
answer_cot: ∵OD∥BC,∴∠AOD=∠B；∵AD是⊙O的切线,∴BA⊥AD,AB为圆O的直径,∴∠OAD=∠ACB=90°,∴Rt△AOD∽Rt△CBA,∴\frac{BC}{OA}=\frac{AB}{OD},即\frac{BC}{1}=\frac{2}{3},∴BC=\frac{2}{3}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AD is the tangent of ⊙O, BC ∥ OD intersects ⊙O at point C. If AB = 2, OD = 3, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OD ∥ BC, therefore ∠AOD = ∠B. Since AD is a tangent to circle O, therefore BA ⊥ AD, and AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠OAD = ∠ACB = 90°. Thus, right triangle AOD is similar to right triangle CBA, therefore BC/OA = AB/OD, that is BC/1 = 2/3, therefore BC = 2/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点C,OA=OB,⊙O的半径为3cm,AB=8cm,则OA=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point C, OA = OB, the radius of ⊙O is 3 cm, AB = 8 cm, then OA = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC; because AB is tangent to circle O at point C, therefore OC ⊥ AB. Since OA = OB, therefore AC = BC = 4cm. In right triangle AOC, OA = √{AC² + OC²} = √{4² + 3²} = 5(cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,P为⊙O的直径AB的延长线上一点,PC切⊙O于点C,若∠P=26°,则∠A等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on the extension line of the diameter AB of ⊙O, PC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, if ∠P = 26°, then ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BC, because PC is tangent to circle O at C, therefore ∠PCB = ∠A. Since AB is a diameter, therefore ∠ACB = 90°, thus ∠ACP = 90° + ∠A. Because ∠A + ∠ACP + ∠P = 180°, therefore ∠A + ∠A + 90° + ∠P = 180°. Given that ∠P = 26°, therefore ∠A = 32°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点B,AO的延长线交⊙O于点C,连接BC．若∠A=36°,则∠C的度数为()
answer_cot: 连接OB,∵AB切圆O于B,∴OB⊥AB,∴∠OBA=90°,∵∠A=36°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠A-∠OBA=54°,∵∠C和∠AOB是同弧所对的圆周角和圆心角,∴∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=27°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, the extension line of AO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC. If ∠A = 36°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, because AB is tangent to circle O at B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, therefore ∠OBA = 90°. Since ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - ∠A - ∠OBA = 54°. Because ∠C and ∠AOB are angles on the same arc of the circle and central angles, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 27°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为1,点O到直线m的距离为2,点P是直线m上的一个动点,PB切⊙O于点B,则PB的最小值是()
answer_cot: 作OP⊥m于P点,则OP=2,∵OB为定值,是1,∴此时PB的值最小,根据题意,在Rt△OPB中,PB=√{OP^{2}-OB^{2}}=√{2^{2}-1^{2}}=√{3},即PB的最小值是√{3},故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 1, the distance from point O to line m is 2, point P is a moving point on line m, PB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, then the minimum value of PB is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct OP ⊥ m at point P, then OP = 2. Since OB is a constant value, which is 1, therefore the value of PB is minimized at this time. According to the problem, in right triangle △OPB, PB = √{OP² - OB²} = √{2² - 1²} = √{3}, that is, the minimum value of PB is √{3}. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,P是⊙O外一点,PA是⊙O的切线,A为切点,PO与⊙O相交于B点,已知∠P=28°,C为⊙O上一点,连接CA,CB,则∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, PO intersects ⊙O at point B. It is known that ∠P = 28°, C is a point on ⊙O, connect CA and CB, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect AO. Because PA is the tangent to circle O at point A, therefore ∠OAP = 90°. Also, because ∠P = 28°, therefore ∠O = 180° - 90° - 28° = 62°. Since ∠O and ∠C subtend the same chord, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠O = 1/2 × 62° = 31°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=3,BC=4．以A为圆心作圆与BC相切,则该圆的半径为()
answer_cot: ∵∠ACB=90°,即AC⊥BC,∴当圆的半径等于AC=3时,以A为圆心作圆与BC相切．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = 3, BC = 4. A circle is drawn with A as the center and tangent to BC, then the radius of the circle is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 90°, that is AC ⊥ BC, therefore when the radius of the circle is equal to AC = 3, a circle centered at A is tangent to BC. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,两个同心圆的半径分别为3cm和5cm,弦AB与小圆相切于点C,则AB=()
answer_cot: 连接OA,OC,∵AB与小圆相切,∴OC⊥AB,∴C为AB的中点,即AC=BC=\frac{1}{2}AB,在Rt△AOC中,OA=5cm,OC=3cm,根据勾股定理得:AC=√{OA^{2}-OC^{2}}=4cm,则AB=2AC=8cm．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radii of the two concentric circles are 3 cm and 5 cm respectively, chord AB is tangent to the smaller circle at point C, then AB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OC. Because AB is tangent to the smaller circle, therefore OC ⊥ AB, thus C is the midpoint of AB, which means AC = BC = 1/2 AB. In right triangle △AOC, OA = 5cm, OC = 3cm, according to the Pythagorean theorem, we get: AC = √{OA² - OC²} = 4cm, then AB = 2AC = 8cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径OC=5cm,直线l⊥OC,垂足为H,且l交⊙O于A、B两点,AB=8cm,则l沿OC所在直线向下平移与⊙O相切时,移动的距离应等于()
answer_cot: 连接OB,∵l⊥OC,∴BH=AH=4,在Rt△OBH中,根据勾股定理,得OH=3,∴CH=2cm．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius OC of ⊙O is 5 cm, the straight line l is perpendicular to OC at the foot H, and l intersects ⊙O at points A and B, AB = 8 cm, then the distance l should move downward along the straight line where OC is located to be tangent to ⊙O is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, because l ⊥ OC, therefore BH = AH = 4. In right triangle △OBH, according to the Pythagorean theorem, we get OH = 3, therefore CH = 2 cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别切⊙O于点A,B,∠P=70°,∠C=()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OA,OB,∵PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=110°,由圆周角定理知,∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=55°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B, ∠P = 70°, then ∠C = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA and OB. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°. Thus, ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 110°. By the inscribed angle theorem, ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O切于点B,AO=10cm,AB=8cm,则⊙O的半径为()
answer_cot: 连接OB,如图,∵AB与⊙O切于点B,∴OB⊥AB,∴∠ABO=90°,在Rt△ABO中,∵AO=10cm,AB=8cm,∴OB=√{OA^{2}-AB^{2}}=6cm,∴⊙O的半径为6cm．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, AO = 10 cm, AB = 8 cm, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB, as shown in the figure, because AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, thus ∠ABO = 90°. In right triangle ABO, since AO = 10cm, AB = 8cm, therefore OB = √{OA² - AB²} = 6cm, thus the radius of circle O is 6cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在Rt△AOB中,OA=OB=5,⊙O的半径为3,点P是AB边上的动点,过点P作⊙O的一条切线PQ(点Q为切点),则切线PQ的最小值为()
answer_cot: 连结OQ、OP,如图,在Rt△AOB中,∵OA=OB=5,∴AB=√{2}OB=10,∵PQ为切线,∴OQ⊥PQ,在Rt△POQ中,PQ=√{OP^{2}-OQ^{2}}=√{OP^{2}-3^{2}},当OP最小时,PQ最小,而当OP⊥AB时,OP最小,此时OP=\frac{1}{2}AB=5,∴PQ的最小值为√{5^{2}-3^{2}}=4．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△AOB, OA = OB = 5, the radius of ⊙O is 3, point P is a moving point on side AB, passing point P is a tangent PQ of ⊙O (Point Q is the tangent point), then the minimum value of the tangent PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OQ and OP, as shown in the diagram. In right triangle △AOB, because OA = OB = 5, therefore AB = √2 × OB = 10. Since PQ is a tangent, therefore OQ ⊥ PQ. In right triangle △POQ, PQ = √{OP^2 - OQ^2} = √{OP^2 - 3^2}. When OP is at its minimum, PQ is also at its minimum, and when OP ⊥ AB, OP is at its minimum. At this time, OP = 1/2 AB = 5, therefore the minimum value of PQ is √{5^2 - 3^2} = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,切点分别为B、C,D是优弧⁀{BC}上的一点,已知∠BAC=80°,那么∠BDC=()度．
answer_cot: 连接BO,CO,∵AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,切点分别为B、C,∴∠ABO=∠ACO=90°,∵∠BAC=80°,∴∠BOC=100°,∴∠BDC=50°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are two tangents of ⊙O, with the tangent points being B and C respectively. D is a point on the major arc BC. It is known that ∠BAC = 80°, then ∠BDC = () degrees.
answer_cot_en: Connect BO and CO. Because AB and AC are two tangents to circle O with the points of tangency at B and C respectively, therefore ∠ABO = ∠ACO = 90°. Since ∠BAC = 80°, therefore ∠BOC = 100°, thus ∠BDC = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,DC切⊙O于C,若∠A=25°,则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, DC is tangent to ⊙O at C, if ∠A = 25°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Join BC, because AB is the diameter, therefore ∠BCA = 90°. Also, because ∠A = 25°, therefore ∠CBA = 90° - 25° = 65°. Since DC is a tangent, therefore ∠BCD = ∠A = 25°. Thus, ∠D = ∠CBA - ∠BCD = 65° - 25° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA、PB、CD分别与⊙O相切于A、B、E,若∠COD=50°,则∠P=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA, PB, and CD are tangent to ⊙O at points A, B, and E, respectively. If ∠COD = 50°, then ∠P = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, OB, and OP. Since PA, PB, and CD are tangent to circle O respectively, therefore AC = CE, ED = BD, and OE ⊥ CD. Therefore, ∠AOC = ∠POC, ∠BOD = ∠POD, OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB. Since ∠COD = 50°, therefore ∠AOB = 100°. Thus, ∠P = 360° - ∠AOB - ∠PAO - ∠PBO = 360° - 100° - 90° - 90° = 80°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A,B两点,点C是劣弧AB上一动点(不与A,B重合),∠P=70°,则∠C=()
answer_cot: 连结OA、OB,∠ADB为弧AB所对的圆周角,如图,∵PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A,B两点,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB+∠P=180°,∴∠AOB=180°-70°=110°,∴∠D=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=55°,∴∠ACB=180°-∠D=125°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B respectively, point C is a moving point on the minor arc AB (not coinciding with A or B), ∠P = 70°, then ∠C = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB, ∠ADB is the angle subtended by arc AB on the circle, as shown in the diagram. Because PA and PB are tangent to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Thus ∠AOB + ∠P = 180°, therefore ∠AOB = 180° - 70° = 110°, therefore ∠D = 1/2 ∠AOB = 55°, therefore ∠ACB = 180° - ∠D = 125°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点A,AC为⊙O的直径,点D在圆上,且满足∠BAD=40°,则∠ACD的大小是()
answer_cot: ∵AB与⊙O相切于点A,∴AC⊥AB,则∠CAB=90°,∴∠CAD=90°-40°=50°,又∵AC是⊙O的直径,∴∠ADC=90°,∴∠ACD=90°-∠CAD=90°-50°=40°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point A, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, point D is on the circle, and ∠BAD = 40°, then the size of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore AC ⊥ AB, then ∠CAB = 90°, thus ∠CAD = 90° - 40° = 50°. And since AC is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ADC = 90°, thus ∠ACD = 90° - ∠CAD = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点B,AO的延长线交⊙O于点C,连接BC,若∠A=42°,则∠C等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, the extension line of AO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC, if ∠A = 42°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ AB, therefore ∠ABO = 90°, thus ∠AOB = 90° - ∠A = 90° - 42° = 48°. Since OC = OD, therefore ∠C = ∠OBC, and ∠AOB = ∠C + ∠OBC, therefore ∠C = 1/2 ∠AOB = 1/2 × 48° = 24°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB、AC切⊙O于B、C,DE切⊙O于F,DE交AB于点D,交AC于点E,连接DO,EO,若∠A=40°,则∠DOE的度数为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OA、OB、OC；∵AB、DE分别是⊙O的切线,∴OB⊥AB,OF⊥DE；在RT△ODB与RT△ODF中,\begin{cases}OB=OF\\OD=OD\end{cases},∴△ODB≌△ODF(HL),∴∠DOB=∠DOF；同理可证:∠FOE=∠COE,∴∠DOE=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC；∵∠A+∠BOC=360°-90°-90°=180°,∴∠BOC=180°-40°=140°,∴∠DOE=70°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are tangents to ⊙O at points B and C, DE is a tangent to ⊙O at point F, DE intersects AB at point D, intersects AC at point E. Connect DO and EO, if ∠A = 40°, then the degree of ∠DOE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA, OB, and OC; because AB and DE are tangents to circle O, therefore OB ⊥ AB, OF ⊥ DE; in right triangles △ODB and △ODF, we have \begin{cases}OB=OF\\OD=OD\end{cases}, therefore △ODB ≅ △ODF (HL), thus ∠DOB = ∠DOF; similarly, it can be proven that ∠FOE = ∠COE, therefore ∠DOE = 1/2 ∠BOC; because ∠A + ∠BOC = 360° - 90° - 90° = 180°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - 40° = 140°, thus ∠DOE = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,P是⊙O外的一点,PA是⊙O的切线,若PO=13,PA=12,则⊙O的面积和周长分别为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OA．∵PA是⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥AP,即∠OAP=90°．又∵PO=13,PA=12,∴根据勾股定理,得OA=√{PO^{2}-PA^{2}}=√{13^{2}-12^{2}}=5,∴⊙O的面积为:π•OA²=π•5²=25π,⊙O的周长为:2π•OA=2π×5=10π．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O. If PO = 13, PA = 12, then the area and circumference of ⊙O are respectively ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA. Because PA is a tangent to circle O, therefore OA ⊥ AP, which means ∠OAP = 90°. Also, since PO = 13 and PA = 12, according to the Pythagorean theorem, we get OA = √(PO² - PA²) = √(13² - 12²) = 5. Therefore, the area of circle O is: π•OA² = π•5² = 25π, and the circumference of circle O is: 2π•OA = 2π×5 = 10π. Hence, the answer is: C.
