question: 如图,P是圆O外的一点,PA、PB与圆O分别相切于点A、B,C是劣弧⁀{AB}上任一点,过点C的切线分别交PA、PB于点D、E．若∠P=38°,则∠DOE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside circle O, PA and PB are tangent to circle O at points A and B respectively, C is any point on the minor arc AB, and the tangent line through point C intersects PA and PB at points D and E. If ∠P = 38°, then ∠DOE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠P = 38°, therefore ∠PDE + ∠PED = 142°, thus ∠ADC + ∠BEC = (180° - ∠PDE) + (180° - ∠PED) = 360° - 142° = 218°. Since DA and DC are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠ODC = ∠ODA = 1/2 ∠ADC; similarly, ∠OEC = 1/2 ∠BEC, thus ∠ODC + ∠OEC = 1/2 (∠ADC + ∠BEC) = 109°, therefore ∠DOE = 180° - (∠ODC + ∠OEC) = 71°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC是⊙O的切线,连接OC交⊙O于点D,连接BD,∠C=40°．则∠ABD的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is the tangent of ⊙O. Connect OC and intersect ⊙O at point D, connect BD, ∠C = 40°. Then the degree of ∠ABD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since ∠C = 40°, therefore ∠AOC = 50°. Since OB = OD, therefore ∠ABD = ∠BDO. Because ∠ABD + ∠BDO = ∠AOC, therefore ∠ABD = 25°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AC是⊙O的切线,A为切点,BC经过圆心．若∠B=25°,则∠C的大小等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, AC is a tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, and BC passes through the center. If ∠B = 25°, then the size of ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA. Because AC is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAC = 90°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠B = ∠OAB = 25°, thus ∠AOC = 50°, therefore ∠C = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 圆O半径为5,AB是圆O的直径,D是AB延长线上一点,DC是圆O切线,∠CAB=30°,则BD长()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of circle O is 5, AB is the diameter of circle O, D is a point on the extension of AB, DC is a tangent of circle O, ∠CAB = 30°, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because DC is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠A = ∠OCA = 30°, thus ∠DOC = 60°, therefore ∠D = 30°. Since OD = 2OC = 10, therefore BD = OD - OB = 10 - 5 = 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,点B为切点,AO的延长线交⊙O于C点,若∠A=45°,AB=√{2},则AC等于()
answer_cot: 连接OB．∵AB是⊙O的切线,B为切点,∴OB⊥AB,在直角△OAB中,OB=AB•tanA=√{2}×tan45°=√{2}；∴OA=√{2+2}=2,∴AC=2+√{2}；故选D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, point B is the tangent point, the extension of AO intersects ⊙O at point C. If ∠A = 45°, AB = √2, then AC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB. Because AB is the tangent to circle O at point B, therefore OB ⊥ AB. In the right-angled triangle OAB, OB = AB • tanA = √{2} × tan45° = √{2}; therefore OA = √{2+2} = 2, thus AC = 2 + √{2}; Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,D是⊙O上一点,过点D作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点C,若∠C=20°,则∠A等于()
answer_cot: 连接OD,如图所示:∵CD与圆相切,∴OD⊥DC,即∠ODC=90°,∵∠C=20°,∴∠DOC=70°,∵OA=OD,∴∠A=∠ADO=\frac{1}{2}∠DOC=35°故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, D is a point on ⊙O. A tangent line through point D intersects the extension of AB at point C. If ∠C = 20°, then ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD as shown: Because CD is tangent to the circle, therefore OD ⊥ DC, that is ∠ODC = 90°. Since ∠C = 20°, therefore ∠DOC = 70°. Because OA = OD, therefore ∠A = ∠ADO = 1/2 ∠DOC = 35°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于C,OA=OB,若⊙O的直径为4,AB=2,则OA的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵⊙O的直径为4,∴OC=2,∵AB与⊙O相切于C,∴OC⊥AB,∵OA=OB,AB=2,∴AC=BC=1,由勾股定理得:OA=√{2^{2}+1^{2}}=√{5},故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at C, OA = OB, if the diameter of ⊙O is 4, AB = 2, then the length of OA is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC. Because the diameter of circle O is 4, therefore OC = 2. Since AB is tangent to circle O at C, therefore OC ⊥ AB. Because OA = OB and AB = 2, therefore AC = BC = 1. By the Pythagorean theorem, OA = √(2² + 1²) = √5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PQ、PR、AB是⊙O的切线,切点分别为Q、R、S,若∠APB=40°,则∠A0B等于()
answer_cot: ∵PQ、PR是⊙O的切线,∴∠PRO=∠PQO=90°,∵∠APB=40°,∴∠ROQ=360°-2×90°-40°=140°,∵PR、AB是⊙O的切线,∴∠AOS=\frac{1}{2}∠ROS,同理:∠BOS=\frac{1}{2}QOS=\frac{1}{2}SOQ,∴∠AOB=∠AOS+∠BOS=\frac{1}{2}∠ROQ=70°,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PQ, PR, and AB are the tangents of ⊙O, with the tangent points being Q, R, and S respectively. If ∠APB = 40°, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because PQ and PR are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠PRO = ∠PQO = 90°. Since ∠APB = 40°, therefore ∠ROQ = 360° - 2×90° - 40° = 140°. Because PR and AB are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠AOS = 1/2 ∠ROS. Similarly, ∠BOS = 1/2 ∠QOS = 1/2 ∠SOQ. Thus, ∠AOB = ∠AOS + ∠BOS = 1/2 ∠ROQ = 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在半径为1的⊙O中,AP是⊙O的切线,A为切点,OP与弦AB交于点C,点C为AB中点,∠P=30°,则CP的长度为()
answer_cot: 连结OA,如图,∵AP是⊙O的切线,A为切点,∴OA⊥PA,∵∠P=30°,∴∠POA=60°,在Rt△POA中,PO=2OA=2,∵点C为AB中点,∴OC⊥AB,在Rt△OCA中,∠OAC=30°,OA=1,∴OC=\frac{1}{2}OA=\frac{1}{2},∴PC=PO-OC=2-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the circle ⊙O with a radius of 1, AP is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, OP intersects chord AB at point C, point C is the midpoint of AB, ∠P = 30°, then the length of CP is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA as shown in the diagram. Because AP is the tangent to circle O with A as the point of tangency, therefore OA ⊥ PA. Since ∠P = 30°, therefore ∠POA = 60°. In right triangle △POA, PO = 2OA = 2. Since point C is the midpoint of AB, therefore OC ⊥ AB. In right triangle △OCA, ∠OAC = 30°, OA = 1, therefore OC = 1/2 OA = 1/2. Thus, PC = PO - OC = 2 - 1/2 = 3/2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点B,AO的延长线交⊙O于点C,联结BC,若∠A=36°,则∠C等于()
answer_cot: ∵AB与⊙O相切于点B,∴∠ABO=90°,∵∠A=36°,∴∠BOA=54°,∴由圆周角定理得:∠C=\frac{1}{2}∠BOA=27°,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point B, the extension line of AO intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC, if ∠A = 36°, then ∠C is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is tangent to circle O at point B, therefore ∠ABO = 90°. Since ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠BOA = 54°. Thus, by the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠C = 1/2 ∠BOA = 27°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,PA切⊙O于点A,OP交⊙O于点C,连BC．若∠P=40°,则∠B的度数是()
answer_cot: ∵PA为圆O的切线,∴BA⊥AP,∴∠BAP=90°,在Rt△AOP中,∠P=40°,∴∠AOP=50°,∵OB=OC,∴∠B=∠OCB,∵∠AOP为△BOC的外角,∴∠B=\frac{1}{2}∠AOP=25°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, OP intersects ⊙O at point C, connect BC. If ∠P = 40°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is the tangent to circle O, therefore BA ⊥ AP, therefore ∠BAP = 90°. In right triangle AOP, ∠P = 40°, therefore ∠AOP = 50°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠B = ∠OCB. Because ∠AOP is the exterior angle of △BOC, therefore ∠B = 1/2 ∠AOP = 25°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知PA是⊙O的切线,切点为A,PO=2,∠APO=30°,那么⊙O的半径是()
answer_cot: 如图:连接OA,∵PA是⊙O的切线,切点为A,∴OA⊥PA在直角△OAP中,PO=2,∠APO=30°,∴OA=PO×sin∠P=1．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that PA is the tangent of ⊙O, the tangent point is A, PO = 2, ∠APO = 30°, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram: Connect OA. Because PA is the tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ PA. In the right-angled triangle OAP, PO = 2, ∠APO = 30°, therefore OA = PO × sin∠P = 1. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,C、D是⊙O上一点,∠CDB=25°,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点E,则∠E等于()
answer_cot: 连接OC,∵CE为圆O的切线,∴OC⊥CE,∴∠COE=90°,∵∠CDB与∠BAC都对⁀{BC},且∠CDB=25°,∴∠BAC=∠CDB=25°,∵OA=OC,∴∠OAC=∠OCA=25°,∵∠COE为△AOC的外角,∴∠COE=50°,则∠E=40°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are points on ⊙O, ∠CDB = 25°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn from point C and intersects the extended line of AB at point E, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CE is a tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CE, thus ∠COE = 90°. Since ∠CDB and ∠BAC both subtend arc BC, and ∠CDB = 25°, therefore ∠BAC = ∠CDB = 25°. Because OA = OC, therefore ∠OAC = ∠OCA = 25°. Since ∠COE is an exterior angle of △AOC, therefore ∠COE = 50°, then ∠E = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图AB是⊙O的直径,点D在AB的延长线上,DC切⊙O于点C,若∠A=35°,则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point D is on the extension of AB, DC is a tangent to ⊙O at point C, if ∠A = 35°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because ∠A = 35°, therefore ∠COD = 2∠A = 70°. Also, because DC is tangent to circle O at point C, therefore ∠OCD = 90°, thus ∠D = 90° - ∠COD = 20°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的切线,点B为切点,BC是⊙O的直径,∠A=20°,则∠ODC的度数为()
answer_cot: 如图,∵AB是⊙O的切线,点B为切点,BC是⊙O的直径,∴∠OBC=90°．又∠A=20°,∴∠BOA=70°．∴∠DOC=∠BOA=70°．又∵OD=OC,∴∠ODC=∠OCD=\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠DOC)=55°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the tangent of ⊙O, point B is the tangent point, BC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠A = 20°, then the degree of ∠ODC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because AB is a tangent to circle O at point B, and BC is a diameter of circle O, therefore ∠OBC = 90°. Also, ∠A = 20°, therefore ∠BOA = 70°. Thus, ∠DOC = ∠BOA = 70°. Since OD = OC, therefore ∠ODC = ∠OCD = (180° - ∠DOC) / 2 = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条弦,∠BAC=25°,过点C的切线与OB的延长线交于点D,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are two chords of ⊙O, ∠BAC = 25°, the tangent through point C intersects the extension of OB at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is the tangent to circle O at point C, therefore ∠OCD = 90°. Since ∠BAC = 25°, therefore ∠COD = 50°, thus ∠D = 180° - 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠A=50°,以BC为直径作⊙O,分别交AB、AC于D、E两点,分别过D、E两点作⊙O的切线,两条切线交于P点,则∠P=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 50°, with BC as the diameter, ⊙O intersects AB and AC at points D and E, respectively. Tangents to ⊙O are drawn through points D and E, and the two tangents intersect at point P, then ∠P = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OD and OE. Since PE and PD are tangents to the circle, therefore OD ⊥ PD, OE ⊥ PE, ∠PDO = ∠PEO = 90°, thus ∠P = 360° - 90° - 90° - ∠5 = 180° - ∠5. Since OD = OB, therefore ∠1 = ∠2. Similarly, ∠3 = ∠4. Because ∠A = 50°, therefore ∠2 + ∠4 = 180° - ∠A = 130°, thus ∠5 = 180° - ∠DOB - ∠EOC = 180° - [360° - 2(∠2 + ∠4)] = 80°, therefore ∠P = 180° - 80° = 100°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,点S是⊙O的直径AB延长线上的一点,SC与⊙O相切于点C．若∠S=30°,则∠A等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point S is a point on the extension line of the diameter AB of ⊙O, SC is tangent to ⊙O at point C. If ∠S = 30°, then ∠A is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC. Because SC is tangent to circle O at point C, therefore OC ⊥ CS. Since ∠S = 30°, therefore ∠COB = 60°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠A = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,圆周角∠BAC=55°,分别过B、C两点作⊙O的切线相交于P,则∠BPC为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the inscribed angle ∠BAC = 55°, tangents to ⊙O are drawn from points B and C and intersect at P, then ∠BPC is ()
answer_cot_en: Join OB and OC. Because PB and PC are tangents to circle O, therefore OB ⊥ PB and OC ⊥ PC, thus ∠PBO = ∠PCO = 90°. Since ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 2×55° = 110°, therefore ∠BPC = 360° - ∠PBO - ∠BOC - ∠PCO = 360° - 90° - 110° - 90° = 70°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=10,AC=8,BC=6,经过点C且与边AB相切的动圆与CB,CA分别相交于点M,N,则线段MN长度的最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,设MN的中点为P,⊙P与AB的切点为D,连接PD,连接CP,CD,则有PD⊥AB；∵AB=10,AC=8,BC=6,∴∠ACB=90°,PC+PD=MN,∴PC+PD＞CD,∵当点P在直角三角形ABC的斜边AB的高CD上时,MN=CD有最小值,∴CD=BC•AC÷AB=\frac{24}{5}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 10, AC = 8, BC = 6, a moving circle passing through point C and tangent to side AB intersects CB and CA at points M and N, respectively, then the minimum length of the line segment MN is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, let P be the midpoint of MN, and let D be the point of tangency of circle P with AB. Connect PD, CP, and CD, then PD ⊥ AB. Because AB = 10, AC = 8, BC = 6, therefore ∠ACB = 90°, PC + PD = MN, thus PC + PD > CD. Since point P is on the altitude CD of the right triangle ABC on the hypotenuse AB, MN has the minimum value when MN = CD, therefore CD = BC • AC ÷ AB = 24/5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,BD是⊙O的直径,点A在BD的延长线上,AC切⊙O于点C,∠A=30°,则∠B=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD is the diameter of ⊙O, point A is on the extension of BD, AC is a tangent to ⊙O at point C, ∠A = 30°, then ∠B = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CA is tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ AC. Since ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠COA = 60°. Since OB = OC, therefore ∠B = ∠OCB. Thus ∠COA = ∠B + ∠OCB, therefore ∠B = 1/2 ∠COA = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在两个同心圆中,大圆的弦AB切小圆于C,AB=8,则圆环部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 连接OA,OC,∵在两个同心圆中,大圆的弦AB切小圆于C,∴OC⊥AB,∴AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×8=4,∴圆环部分的面积为:π•OA²-π•OC²=π•(OA²-OC²)=π•AC²=16π．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the two concentric circles, the chord AB of the larger circle is tangent to the smaller circle at C, AB = 8, then the area of the annular part is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OC. Because in two concentric circles, the chord AB of the larger circle is tangent to the smaller circle at C, therefore OC ⊥ AB, thus AC = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 8 = 4. Therefore, the area of the annular part is: π•OA² - π•OC² = π•(OA² - OC²) = π•AC² = 16π. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,同心圆中大⊙O的弦AB切小⊙O于P,且AB=6,则阴影部分圆环的面积为()
answer_cot: 连接OP,OA,设大圆半径为R,小圆半径为r,∵AB与小圆相切,∴OP⊥AB,∴P为AB中点,即AP=\frac{1}{2}AB=3,在Rt△AOP中,根据勾股定理得:OA²=AP²+OP²,即R²-r²=9,则阴影部分圆环的面积为πR²-πr²=π(R²-r²)=9π．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the concentric circles, the chord AB of the larger ⊙O is tangent to the smaller ⊙O at P, and AB = 6, then the area of the shaded annulus is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OP and OA, let the radius of the large circle be R, and the radius of the small circle be r. Because AB is tangent to the small circle, therefore OP ⊥ AB, thus P is the midpoint of AB, that is AP = 1/2 AB = 3. In right triangle △AOP, according to the Pythagorean theorem: OA² = AP² + OP², which means R² - r² = 9. Therefore, the area of the shaded annulus is πR² - πr² = π(R² - r²) = 9π. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,四边形OBCD中,∠BCD=90°,E为CD的中点,以OB为半径的⊙O切CD于E,交BC于M,若BM=CM=2,则OC的长为()
answer_cot: 连接OM、OE,过O作OF⊥BC于F,∵OF过O,∴BF=FM=1,∴FC=1+2=3,∵DC切⊙O于E,∠BCD=90°,OF⊥BC,∴∠OEC=∠ECF=∠OFC=90°,∴四边形OFCE是矩形,∴OE=FC=3,CE=OF,∴OB=OE=3,在Rt△OFB中,OB=3,BF=1,由勾股定理得:OF=2√{2}=CE,在Rt△OFC中,OF=2√{2},CF=3,由勾股定理得:OC=√{(2√{2})^{2}+3^{2}}=√{17},故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral OBCD, ∠BCD = 90°, E is the midpoint of CD, ⊙O with OB as the radius is tangent to CD at E, intersects BC at M, if BM = CM = 2, then the length of OC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OM and OE, draw OF ⊥ BC at F. Since OF passes through O, therefore BF = FM = 1, thus FC = 1 + 2 = 3. Since DC is tangent to circle O at E, ∠BCD = 90°, and OF ⊥ BC, therefore ∠OEC = ∠ECF = ∠OFC = 90°. Thus, quadrilateral OFCE is a rectangle, therefore OE = FC = 3, CE = OF. Hence, OB = OE = 3. In right triangle △OFB, OB = 3, BF = 1, by the Pythagorean theorem, OF = 2√2 = CE. In right triangle △OFC, OF = 2√2, CF = 3, by the Pythagorean theorem, OC = √{(2√2)^2 + 3^2} = √17. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别是⊙O的切线,A、B为切点,AC是⊙O的直径,∠BAC=35°,∠P的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵PA、PB分别是⊙O的切线,A、B为切点,AC是⊙O的直径,∴∠CAP=90°,PA=PB,又∵∠BAC=35°,∴∠PAB=55°,∴∠PBA=∠PAB=55°,∴∠P=180°-55°-55°=70°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠BAC = 35°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B respectively, and AC is a diameter of circle O, therefore ∠CAP = 90°, PA = PB. Also, since ∠BAC = 35°, therefore ∠PAB = 55°, thus ∠PBA = ∠PAB = 55°, therefore ∠P = 180° - 55° - 55° = 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,PA切⊙O于点A,PO交⊙O于C,连结BC．若∠P=36°,则∠BCO等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, PO intersects ⊙O at C, connect BC. If ∠P = 36°, then ∠BCO is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, PA is tangent to circle O at point A, therefore OA ⊥ PA, which means ∠PAO = 90°. Since ∠P = 36°, therefore ∠POA = 90° - ∠P = 54°, thus ∠B = 1/2 ∠POA = 27°. Since OC = OB, therefore ∠BCO = ∠B = 27°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 为了测量一个圆形铁环的半径,某同学采用了如下办法:将铁环平放在水平桌面上,用一个锐角为30°的三角板和一个刻度尺,按如图所示的方法得到相关数据,进而可求得铁环的半径,若测得PA=5cm,则铁环的半径是()cm．
answer_cot: 过O作OQ⊥AB于Q设铁环的圆心为O,连接OP、OA,∵AP为⊙O的切线,AQ也为⊙O的切线,∴AO为∠PAQ的平分线,即∠PAO=∠QAO,又∠BAC=60°,∠PAO+∠QAO+∠BAC=180°,∴∠PAO=∠QAO=60°,在Rt△OPA中,PA=5,∠POA=30°,∴OP=5√{3},故选:C．
question_en: To measure the radius of a circular iron ring, a student used the following method: the iron ring was placed flat on a horizontal table, and with a 30° set square and a ruler, the relevant data were obtained as shown in the figure, from which the radius of the iron ring could be calculated. If PA is measured to be 5 cm, then the radius of the iron ring is () cm.
answer_cot_en: Draw OQ ⊥ AB at Q, with the center of the iron ring being O, connect OP and OA. Because AP is a tangent to circle O, and AQ is also a tangent to circle O, therefore AO bisects ∠PAQ, that is ∠PAO = ∠QAO. Also, ∠BAC = 60°, ∠PAO + ∠QAO + ∠BAC = 180°, therefore ∠PAO = ∠QAO = 60°. In right triangle △OPA, PA = 5, ∠POA = 30°, therefore OP = 5√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知PA,PB为⊙O的切线,A,B为切点,C为⊙O上一点,∠ACB=70°,则∠P的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that PA and PB are the tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, C is a point on ⊙O, ∠ACB = 70°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Since ∠ACB = 70°, therefore ∠AOB = 2∠ACB = 140°. Thus ∠P = 360° - ∠OAP - ∠OBP - ∠AOB = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,圆O与正方形ABCD的两边AB、AD相切,且DE与圆O相切于E点．若圆O的半径为5,且AB=11,则DE的长度为何？()
answer_cot: 连接OM、ON,∵四边形ABCD是正方形,∴AD=AB=11,∠A=90°,∵圆O与正方形ABCD的两边AB、AD相切,∴∠OMA=∠ONA=90°=∠A,∵OM=ON,∴四边形ANOM是正方形,∴AM=OM=5,∵AD和DE与圆O相切,圆O的半径为5,∴AM=5,DM=DE,∴DE=11-5=6,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, circle O is tangent to two sides AB and AD of the square ABCD, and DE is tangent to circle O at point E. If the radius of circle O is 5 and AB = 11, then what is the length of DE? ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OM and ON. Because quadrilateral ABCD is a square, therefore AD = AB = 11, and ∠A = 90°. Since circle O is tangent to the sides AB and AD of square ABCD, therefore ∠OMA = ∠ONA = 90° = ∠A. Since OM = ON, therefore quadrilateral ANOM is a square, thus AM = OM = 5. Since AD and DE are tangent to circle O, and the radius of circle O is 5, therefore AM = 5, DM = DE, thus DE = 11 - 5 = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD是⊙O的直径,BC与⊙O相切于点B,连结AB、OB、BD,若∠ABC=65°,∠ADB等于()
answer_cot: ∵BC为圆O的切线,∴OB⊥BC,即∠OBC=90°,∵∠ABC=65°,∴∠ABO=25°,∵OA=OB,∴∠BAO=∠ABO=25°,∵AD为圆O的直径,∴∠ABD=90°,则∠ADB=65°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD is the diameter of ⊙O, BC is tangent to ⊙O at point B. Connect AB, OB, and BD. If ∠ABC = 65°, then ∠ADB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC is the tangent to circle O, therefore OB ⊥ BC, that is ∠OBC = 90°. Since ∠ABC = 65°, therefore ∠ABO = 25°. Since OA = OB, therefore ∠BAO = ∠ABO = 25°. Since AD is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ABD = 90°, then ∠ADB = 65°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 一个边长为4的等边三角形ABC的高与⊙O的直径相等,如图放置,⊙O与BC相切于点C,⊙O与AC相交于点E,则CE的长是()
answer_cot: 连接OC,并过点O作OF⊥CE于F,∵△ABC为等边三角形,边长为4,∴△ABC的高为2√{3},∴OC=√{3},又∵∠ACB=60°,∴∠OCF=30°,在Rt△OFC中,可得FC=\frac{3}{2},即CE=2FC=3．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the height of an equilateral triangle ABC with a side length of 4 is equal to the diameter of ⊙O. When placed as shown, ⊙O is tangent to BC at point C, and ⊙O intersects AC at point E, then the length of CE is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, and draw OF ⊥ CE at point F. Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle with side length 4, the height of △ABC is 2√{3}, therefore OC = √{3}. Also, because ∠ACB = 60°, therefore ∠OCF = 30°. In the right triangle △OFC, we can find FC = 3/2, which means CE = 2FC = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,PA切⊙O于点A,直线PBC经过点圆心O,若∠P=30°,则∠ACB的度数为()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OA,AC．∵PA切⊙O于点A,直线PBC经过点圆心O,∴OA⊥PA,即∠PAO=90°．又∵∠P=30°,∴∠AOP=60°,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=30°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is tangent to ⊙O at point A, straight line PBC passes through the center O, if ∠P = 30°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OA and AC. Because PA is tangent to circle O at point A, and line PBC passes through the center O, therefore OA ⊥ PA, which means ∠PAO = 90°. Also, because ∠P = 30°, therefore ∠AOP = 60°, thus ∠ACB = 1/2 ∠AOB = 30°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 已知,如图:⊙I内切于△ABC,切点分别为D、E、F,若∠C=70°,则∠FDE=()
question_en: As known, as shown in the figure: ⊙I is inscribed in △ABC, with the tangent points being D, E, and F. If ∠C = 70°, then ∠FDE = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect IF and IE, by the property of tangents, ∠IFC = ∠IEC = 90°, therefore ∠FIE = 180° - ∠C = 110°, thus ∠FDE = 1/2 ∠FIE = 1/2 × 110° = 55°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,经过⊙O上的点A的切线和弦BC的延长线相交于点P,若∠CAP=40°,∠ACP=100°,则∠BAC所对的弧的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵PA为圆O的切线,故∠CAP=∠B=40°,又∵∠ACP=100°,∴∠BAC=60°则∠BAC所对的弧的度数为120°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the tangent through point A on ⊙O and the extension of chord BC intersect at point P. If ∠CAP = 40°, ∠ACP = 100°, then the degree measure of the arc corresponding to ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠CAP = ∠B = 40°. Given that ∠ACP = 100°, therefore ∠BAC = 60°, then the degree measure of the arc opposite ∠BAC is 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的切线,C为切点,∠B=25°,则∠D等于()
answer_cot: 如右图,连接OC,∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的切线,∴CD⊥OC,∵∠B=25°,∴∠AOC=50°,∴∠D=40°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is the tangent of ⊙O, C is the tangent point, ∠B = 25°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the right figure, connect OC. Because AB is the diameter of circle O, and CD is the tangent to circle O, therefore CD ⊥ OC. Since ∠B = 25°, therefore ∠AOC = 50°, thus ∠D = 40°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在⊙O中,AB为直径,PC为⊙O的切线,且∠A=30°,则∠P的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, PC is the tangent of ⊙O, and ∠A = 30°, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because PC is a tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OCP = 90°. Also, because ∠COP = 2∠A = 60°, therefore ∠P = 180° - ∠OCP - ∠COP = 180° - 90° - 60° = 30°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别切圆O于A、B两点,C为劣弧AB上一点,∠APB=30°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 如图,连接AO,OB,∵PA、PB分别切圆O于A、B两点,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=150°,设点E是优弧AB上一点,由圆周角定理知,∠E=75°,由圆内接四边形的对角互补知,∠ACB=180°-∠E=105°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B, respectively, C is a point on the minor arc AB, ∠APB = 30°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect AO and OB. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B respectively, ∠PAO = ∠PBO = 90°. Therefore, ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 150°. Let point E be a point on the major arc AB. By the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠E = 75°. Knowing that opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral are supplementary, ∠ACB = 180° - ∠E = 105°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,PA为⊙O的切线,A为切点,PO交⊙O于点B,PA=3,OA=4,则cos∠APO的值为()
answer_cot: ∵PA为⊙O的切线,A为切点,PO交⊙O于点B,∴OA⊥AP．∴OP=√{PA^{2}+OA^{2}}=√{3^{2}+4^{2}}=5．∴cos∠APO=\frac{AP}{OP}=\frac{3}{5}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, PO intersects ⊙O at point B, PA = 3, OA = 4, then the value of cos∠APO is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA is the tangent to circle O at point A, and PO intersects circle O at point B, therefore OA ⊥ AP. Thus, OP = √(PA² + OA²) = √(3² + 4²) = 5. Therefore, cos∠APO = AP / OP = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是圆O的直径,点D在AB的延长线上,DC切圆O于C,若∠A=25°．则∠D等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of circle O, point D is on the extension of AB, DC is a tangent to circle O at C, if ∠A = 25°, then ∠D is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because CD is the tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CD, that is ∠OCD = 90°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠OCA = ∠A = 25°, thus ∠DOC = 50°, therefore ∠D = 90° - 50° = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AM、AN分别切⊙O于M、N两点,点B在⊙O上,且∠MBN=60°,则∠A的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接OM、ON,如图,∵AM、AN分别切⊙O于M、N两点,∴OM⊥AM,ON⊥AN,∴∠AOM=∠ANO=90°,∴∠A+∠MON=180°,∵∠MON=2∠MBN=2×60°=120°,∴∠A=180°-120°=60°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AM and AN are tangents to ⊙O at points M and N respectively, point B is on ⊙O, and ∠MBN = 60°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OM and ON as shown in the diagram. Because AM and AN are tangents to circle O at points M and N respectively, therefore OM ⊥ AM, ON ⊥ AN, therefore ∠AOM = ∠ANO = 90°, thus ∠A + ∠MON = 180°. Since ∠MON = 2∠MBN = 2×60° = 120°, therefore ∠A = 180° - 120° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知直线BC切⊙O于点C,PD为⊙O的直径,BP的延长线与CD的延长线交于点A,∠A=28°,∠B=26°,则∠PDC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line BC is tangent to ⊙O at point C, PD is the diameter of ⊙O, the extension of BP intersects with the extension of CD at point A, ∠A = 28°, ∠B = 26°, then ∠PDC = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because line BC is tangent to circle O at point C, therefore ∠OCB = 90°. Since ∠A = 28° and ∠B = 26°, therefore ∠ACB = 180° - ∠B - ∠A = 126°, ∠OCD = ∠ACB - ∠OCB = 36°; since OC = OD, therefore ∠PDC = ∠OCD = 36°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,O是线段AB上的一点,∠CDB=20°,过点C作⊙O的切线交AB的延长线于点E,则∠E等于()
answer_cot: 连接OC,如图所示:∵圆心角∠BOC与圆周角∠CDB都对弧BC,∴∠BOC=2∠CDB,又∠CDB=20°,∴∠BOC=40°,又∵CE为圆O的切线,∴OC⊥CE,即∠OCE=90°,则∠E=90°-40°=50°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, O is a point on line segment AB, ∠CDB = 20°, a tangent to ⊙O is drawn passing through point C and intersects the extension of AB at point E, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, as shown in the diagram: Because the central angle ∠BOC and the inscribed angle ∠CDB both intercept arc BC, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠CDB. Given that ∠CDB = 20°, therefore ∠BOC = 40°. Since CE is a tangent to circle O, therefore OC ⊥ CE, which means ∠OCE = 90°. Thus, ∠E = 90° - 40° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC、BC是⊙O的弦,PC是⊙O的切线,切点为C,∠ACP=55°,那么∠BAC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC and BC are chords of ⊙O, PC is a tangent of ⊙O with the tangent point at C, ∠ACP = 55°, then ∠BAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC, because PC is the tangent of the circle, therefore ∠OCP = 90°, thus ∠OCA = ∠OCP - ∠ACP = 90° - 55° = 35°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠BAC = ∠OCA = 35°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,将长度为2的线段AB绕点A逆时针旋转45°至AB′,则扇形ABB′的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the line segment AB with a length of 2 is rotated 45° counterclockwise around point A to AB′, then the area of the sector ABB′ is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = 2, and ∠BAB′ = 45°, therefore the area of the sector ABB′ = (45π × 2^2) / 360 = π / 2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,四个圆相互外离,它们的半径都为1,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 四边形的内角和是360°,因此五个扇形面积之和是\frac{π}{360}×360=π．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the four circles are externally tangent to each other, and their radii are all 1, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: The sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral is 360°, therefore the sum of the areas of the five sectors is \(\frac{π}{360} \times 360 = π\). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,两个半圆中,长为4的弦AB与直径CD平行且与小半圆相切,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
answer_cot: 作OE⊥AB于E,则小圆的半径为OE=r,BE=AE=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×4=2．连接OB,则OB为大圆的半径R,在Rt△OEB中,由勾股定理得:R²-r²=BE²,图中阴影部分的面积是\frac{1}{2}π(R²-r²)=\frac{1}{2}πBE²=2π．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the chord AB with a length of 4 is parallel to the diameter CD and tangent to the smaller semicircle, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct OE ⊥ AB at E, then the radius of the smaller circle is OE = r, BE = AE = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 4 = 2. Connect OB, then OB is the radius R of the larger circle. In the right triangle △OEB, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: R² - r² = BE². The area of the shaded part in the diagram is 1/2 π(R² - r²) = 1/2 πBE² = 2π. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,某学生利用标杆测量一棵大树的高度,如果标杆EC的高为2m,并测得BC=3m,CA=1m,那么树DB的高度是()
answer_cot: 由题意可得,CE∥BD,在△ABD中,\frac{AC}{AB}=\frac{CE}{BD},即\frac{1}{4}=\frac{2}{BD},解得BD=8m．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a student uses a staff to measure the height of a large tree. If the height of the staff EC is 2 m, and it is measured that BC = 3 m, CA = 1 m, then the height of the tree DB is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, we can deduce that CE ∥ BD, and in △ABD, AC/AB = CE/BD, that is, 1/4 = 2/BD, solving this we get BD = 8m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线AC、DF这与三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．已知AB=1,BC=3,DE=2,则EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, straight lines AC and DF intersect the three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. Given that AB = 1, BC = 3, DE = 2, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF. Since AB = 1, BC = 3, DE = 2, therefore 1/3 = 2/EF. Solving this, EF = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC上,DE∥BC．若AD=6,DB=3,则\frac{AE}{AC}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC. If AD = 6, DB = 3, then the value of \(\frac{AE}{AC}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = 6, DB = 3, therefore AB = AD + DB = 9. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/EC = AD/DB = 6/9 = 2/3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,若AB:AC=1:3,DE=3,则EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines l1 and l2 intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F, respectively. If AB:AC = 1:3, and DE = 3, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB:AC = 1:3, therefore AB:BC = 1:2. Since a ∥ b ∥ c, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is, 1/2 = 3/EF. Solving this, we get EF = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,两条直线分别被三条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}所截,若AB=3,BC=6,DE=2,则DF的长为()
answer_cot: ∵两条直线分别被三条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}所截,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},∵AB=3,BC=6,DE=2,∴EF=4,∴DF=DE+EF=2+4=6,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines are intersected by three parallel lines l₁, l₂, l₃. If AB = 3, BC = 6, DE = 2, then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because two lines are intersected by three parallel lines l₁, l₂, l₃, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF. Given that AB = 3, BC = 6, DE = 2, therefore EF = 4, thus DF = DE + EF = 2 + 4 = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{1}{2}．如果AE=2,则EC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{BD} = \frac{1}{2}\). If AE = 2, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/AC, which means 1/2 = 2/EC, thus EC = 4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在边AB、BC边上,且BD=6cm,BA=9cm,BE=4cm,若DE平行于AC,则EC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and BC respectively, and BD = 6 cm, BA = 9 cm, BE = 4 cm. If DE is parallel to AC, then EC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC, therefore BD/BA = BE/BC, which means 6/9 = 4/BC. Solving this, BC = 6, then EC = BC - BE = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3}于点A、B、C,直线DF分别交l_{1}、l_{2}、l_{3}于点D、E、F,AC与DF相交于点H,如果AB=5,BH=1,CH=2,那么\frac{EF}{DE}的值等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃ at points A, B, C, line DF intersects l₁, l₂, l₃ at points D, E, F, AC intersects DF at point H. If AB = 5, BH = 1, CH = 2, then the value of \(\frac{EF}{DE}\) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because line l₁ is parallel to l₂ which is parallel to l₃, therefore DE/EF = AB/BC. Since AB = 5, BH = 1, CH = 2, therefore BC = BH + CH = 3, thus BC/AB = 3/5, therefore EF/DE = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线a,b与l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}分别相交于A,B,C和点D,E,F,若\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{3}{5},DE=6,则EF的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, straight lines a and b intersect l₁, l₂, and l₃ at points A, B, C, and points D, E, F, respectively. If \(\frac{AB}{BC} = \frac{3}{5}\), DE = 6, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF. Since AB/BC = 3/5 and DE = 6, therefore 6/EF = 3/5, thus EF = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知BE∥CF∥DG,AB:BC:CD=2:1:3,若AE=4,则EG的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that BE ∥ CF ∥ DG, AB:BC:CD = 2:1:3, if AE = 4, then the length of EG is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BE ∥ CF ∥ DG, and AB:BC:CD = 2:1:3, therefore AB/BD = AE/EG = 2/4 = 1/2. Since AE = 4, therefore EG = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,分别交AB,AC于点D,E．若AE=3,EC=6,则\frac{AD}{AB}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, intersecting AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AE = 3, EC = 6, then the value of \(\frac{AD}{AB}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC = AE/(AE + EC) = 3/(3 + 6) = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,DE∥BC,分别交△ABC的边AB、AC于点D、E,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3},若AE=1,则EC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE ∥ BC, intersecting the sides AB and AC of △ABC at points D and E, \(\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3}\), if AE = 1, then EC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, which means 1/(1 + EC) = 1/3, thus EC = 2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{2},AE=2cm,则AC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{1}{2}\), AE = 2 cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC = 1/2. Since AE = 2, therefore AC = 4 (cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点D,E分别在△ABC的边BA,CA的延长线上,DE∥BC．若EC=3EA,△AED的周长为3,则△ABC的周长为()
answer_cot: 证明:∵EC=3EA,∴\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{1}{3},∴\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{1}{2},∵DE∥BC,∴△AED∽△ACB,∴\frac{△AED的周长}{△ACB的周长}=\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{1}{2},∴△ABC的周长=2△AED的周长=2×3=6；故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points D and E are respectively on the extensions of side BA and CA of △ABC, DE ∥ BC. If EC = 3EA, the perimeter of △AED is 3, then the perimeter of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Proof: Because EC = 3EA, therefore AE/EC = 1/3, and thus AE/AC = 1/2. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore △AED ∼ △ACB, hence the perimeter of △AED over the perimeter of △ACB = AE/AC = 1/2. Therefore, the perimeter of △ABC = 2 times the perimeter of △AED = 2 × 3 = 6; Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,D、E分别是△ABC的边AB、BC上的点,且DE∥AC,连接AE、CD,相交于点O,若S△DOE:S△COA=1:9,△BDE的面积为3,则△ABC的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D and E are points on the sides AB and BC of △ABC, respectively, and DE ∥ AC. Connect AE and CD, intersecting at point O. If S△DOE : S△COA = 1 : 9, and the area of △BDE is 3, then the area of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC, therefore △DOE ∼ △COA, and the area ratio S△DOE : S△COA = 1 : 9, thus DE/AC = 1/3. Since DE ∥ AC, therefore △BDE ∼ △BAC, thus the area ratio S△BDE / S△BAC = (DE/AC)² = 1/9. Since the area of △BDE is 3, therefore S△BAC = 27. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB=3,AC=2,BC=4,AE=3,AD=4.5,DE=6,∠BAD=20°,则∠CAE的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB = 3, AC = 2, BC = 4, AE = 3, AD = 4.5, DE = 6, ∠BAD = 20°, then the degree of ∠CAE is ()
answer_cot_en: \(\frac{AC}{AE} = \frac{2}{3}\), \(\frac{AB}{AD} = \frac{3}{4.5} = \frac{2}{3}\), \(\frac{BC}{DE} = \frac{4}{6} = \frac{2}{3}\), therefore \(\frac{AC}{AE} = \frac{AB}{AD} = \frac{BC}{DE}\), therefore △ABC ∼ △ADE, therefore ∠BAC = ∠DAE, therefore ∠BAC - ∠DAC = ∠DAE - ∠DAC, therefore ∠CAE = ∠BAD = 20°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C为⊙O上一点,弦AD平分∠BAC,交弦BC于点E,CD=4,DE=2,则AE的长为()
answer_cot: ∵AD平分∠BAC,∴∠CAD=∠BAD,由圆周角定理得,∠DCB=∠BAD,∴∠CAD=∠DCB,又∠D=∠D,∴△DCE∽△DAC,∴\frac{DE}{DC}=\frac{DC}{DA},即\frac{2}{4}=\frac{4}{AD},解得,AD=8,∴AE=AD-DE=8-2=6,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O, chord AD bisects ∠BAC, and intersects chord BC at point E, CD = 4, DE = 2, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠CAD = ∠BAD. By the inscribed angle theorem, ∠DCB = ∠BAD, thus ∠CAD = ∠DCB. Also, ∠D = ∠D, therefore △DCE ∼ △DAC, hence \(\frac{DE}{DC} = \frac{DC}{DA}\), that is \(\frac{2}{4} = \frac{4}{AD}\), solving this, AD = 8, therefore AE = AD - DE = 8 - 2 = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点E是线段AC上一点,AE:CE=1:2,过点C作CD∥AB交BE的延长线于点D,若△ABE的面积等于4,则△CED的面积等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point E is a point on segment AC, AE:CE = 1:2, through point C draw CD ∥ AB intersecting the extension of BE at point D, if the area of △ABE is equal to 4, then the area of △CED is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram: Because CD ∥ AB, therefore ∠BAE = ∠DEC. Also, because ∠AEB = ∠CED, therefore △AEB ∼ △CED, thus the ratio of the areas \(\frac{S_{\triangle AEB}}{S_{\triangle CED}} = (\frac{AE}{EC})^{2}\). Given that \(\frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{1}{2}\), and the area of △AEB is 4, therefore the area of △CED is 16. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ADE中,BC∥DE,AB=3,BD=DE=6,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ADE, BC ∥ DE, AB = 3, BD = DE = 6, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC ∥ DE, AB = 3, BD = DE = 6, therefore \(\frac{AB}{AD} = \frac{BC}{DE}\), that is \(\frac{3}{3+6} = \frac{BC}{6}\), therefore BC = \(\frac{3 \times 6}{9} = 2\). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在等边△ABC中,点D、E分别在边BC、AC上,且∠ADE=60°,BD=1,CE=\frac{2}{3},则△ABC的边长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the equilateral △ABC, points D and E are on sides BC and AC respectively, and ∠ADE = 60°, BD = 1, CE = \(\frac{2}{3}\), then the side length of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore AB = BC, ∠ABC = 60° = ∠C. Since ∠ADC = ∠ABC + ∠BAD = ∠ADE + ∠CDE, therefore ∠BAD = ∠CDE, and ∠ABC = ∠C. Therefore, △ABD ∼ △DCE, thus AB/CD = BD/CE, therefore AB/(BC - 1) = 1/(2/3), therefore AB = 3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,BC=9,∠ABC的平分线BF交AC于点F,点D、点E分别是边AB、AC上的点,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{EF}{EC}=\frac{1}{3},则BD-DE的值为()
answer_cot: 如图,延长DE,BF交于点G,∵\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AE}{AC},∠DAE=∠BAC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴∠ADE=∠ABC,∴DE∥BC,∴∠CBG=∠DGB,∵∠ABC的平分线BF交AC于点F,∴∠DBG=∠CBG,∴∠DBG=∠DGB,∴BD=DG,∵EG∥BC,∴△EFG∽△CFB,∴\frac{EG}{BC}=\frac{EF}{CF},∵\frac{EF}{CE}=\frac{1}{3},∴EG=\frac{1}{2}BC=4.5,则BD-DE=DG-DE=EG=4.5．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BC = 9, the bisector of ∠ABC, BF, intersects AC at point F, points D and E are respectively on sides AB and AC. If \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{AE}{AC} = \frac{EF}{EC} = \frac{1}{3}\), then the value of BD - DE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, extend DE and BF to intersect at point G. Because \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{AE}{AC}\) and ∠DAE = ∠BAC, therefore △ADE ∼ △ABC, thus ∠ADE = ∠ABC. Therefore, DE ∥ BC, thus ∠CBG = ∠DGB. Since the bisector of ∠ABC, BF, intersects AC at point F, therefore ∠DBG = ∠CBG. Hence, ∠DBG = ∠DGB, therefore BD = DG. Because EG ∥ BC, therefore △EFG ∼ △CFB, thus \(\frac{EG}{BC} = \frac{EF}{CF}\). Given that \(\frac{EF}{CE} = \frac{1}{3}\), therefore EG = \(\frac{1}{2}\)BC = 4.5. So BD - DE = DG - DE = EG = 4.5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D,E分别是AB,AC边上的点,DE∥BC,若AD=2,AB=3,DE=4,则BC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, if AD = 2, AB = 3, DE = 4, then BC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{DE}{BC}\), that is \(\frac{2}{3} = \frac{4}{BC}\), solving this gives: BC = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知AB,CD相交于点O,AC∥BD,\frac{AO}{OB}=\frac{2}{5},CO=6,则DO=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB and CD intersect at point O, AC ∥ BD, \(\frac{AO}{OB} = \frac{2}{5}\), CO = 6, then DO = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC ∥ BD, therefore ∠C = ∠D, ∠A = ∠B, therefore △AOC ∼ △BOD, therefore AO/BO = CO/DO. Given that AO/OB = 2/5, and CO = 6, therefore DO = 15. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D是AB边上的一点,若∠ACD=∠B．AD=1,AC=2,△ADC的面积为S,则△BCD的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is a point on side AB. If ∠ACD = ∠B, AD = 1, AC = 2, the area of △ADC is S, then the area of △BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DAC = ∠CAB, and ∠ACD = ∠B, therefore △ACD ∼ △ABC, thus the ratio of the areas \(\frac{S_{\triangle ADC}}{S_{\triangle ABC}} = (\frac{AD}{AC})^{2} = (\frac{1}{2})^{2}\), therefore the area of △ABC = 4S, thus the area of △BCD = 4S - S = 3S. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知△ABC,AB=6,AC=5,D是边AB的中点,E是边AC上一点,∠ADE=∠C,∠BAC的平分线分别交DE、BC于点F、G,那么\frac{AF}{AG}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that △ABC, AB = 6, AC = 5, D is the midpoint of side AB, E is a point on side AC, ∠ADE = ∠C, the bisector of ∠BAC intersects DE and BC at points F and G, respectively, then the value of \(\frac{AF}{AG}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AG bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠DAF = ∠CAG. Since ∠ADF = ∠C, therefore △ADF ∼ △ACG, thus \(\frac{AD}{AC} = \frac{AF}{AG}\). Given that D is the midpoint of AB, therefore \(AD = \frac{1}{2}AB = 3\), thus \(\frac{AF}{AG} = \frac{3}{5}\). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,点E为AB的中点,连接DE交对角线AC于点F,若AF=3,则FC的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, point E is the midpoint of AB, connect DE and it intersects diagonal AC at point F, if AF = 3, then the value of FC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ CD, AB = CD, thus △AEF ∼ △CDF. Since AE = EB = 1/2 CD, therefore AF/CF = AE/CD = 1/2. Given that AF = 3, therefore CF = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,D,E为△ABC的边AB,AC上的点,DE∥BC,若AD:DB=1:3,DE=2,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, D and E are points on the sides AB and AC of △ABC, DE ∥ BC, if AD:DB = 1:3, DE = 2, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus DE/BC = AD/AB, that is, 2/BC = 1/(1+3), therefore BC = 8. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D、E、F分别是BC、AB、AC上的点,EF∥BC,\frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{1}{2},且△DEF的面积为4,则△ABC的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D, E, and F are points on BC, AB, and AC respectively, EF ∥ BC, \(\frac{AE}{EB} = \frac{1}{2}\), and the area of △DEF is 4, then the area of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: By connecting BF, because EF ∥ BC, therefore the area of △BEF = the area of △EFD = 4. Since AE/BE = 1/2, therefore the ratio of the area of △AEF to the area of △BEF is 1/2, thus the area of △AEF = 2. Because EF ∥ BC, therefore △AEF is similar to △ABC, thus the ratio of the area of △AEF to the area of △ABC is (AE/AB)^2 = 1/9, therefore the area of △ABC = 9 times the area of △AEF = 9 × 2 = 18. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD∥EF,AF与BE相交于点G,且AG=2,GD=1,DF=5,那么\frac{BC}{CE}的值等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AF intersects BE at point G, and AG = 2, GD = 1, DF = 5, then the value of \(\frac{BC}{CE}\) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore BC / CE = AD / DF = (AG + GD) / DF = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CD∥EF,AD:AF=3:5,BC=2.4,则CE的长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AD:AF = 3:5, BC = 2.4, then the length of CE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD:AF = 3:5, therefore AD:DF = 3:2. Since AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore AD/DF = BC/CE, that is, 3/2 = 2.4/CE. Solving this, CE = 1.6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC上,DE∥BC,已知AE=12,AD:DB=3:4,则EC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, it is known that AE = 12, AD:DB = 3:4, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC, which means 12/EC = 3/4, therefore EC = 16. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB∥CD∥EF,AD=4,BC=DF=3,则BE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AD = 4, BC = DF = 3, then the length of BE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore BC / CE = AD / DF. Given that AD = 4, BC = DF = 3, therefore 3 / CE = 4 / 3, thus CE = 9 / 4, therefore BE = BC + CE = 3 + 9 / 4 = 21 / 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=4,AC=3,DE∥BC交AB于点D,交AC于点E,若AD=3,则AE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 4, AC = 3, DE ∥ BC intersects AB at point D, intersects AC at point E, if AD = 3, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, that is, 3/4 = AE/3, therefore AE = 9/4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线AC和直线DF在l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}上的交点分别为:A,B,C,D,E,F．已知AB=6,BC=4,DF=9,则DE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, line AC and line DF intersect lines l₁, l₂, l₃ at points A, B, C, D, E, F respectively. Given that AB = 6, BC = 4, DF = 9, then DE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, therefore AB/AC = DE/DF. Since AB = 6, BC = 4, DF = 9, therefore 6/(6+4) = DE/9, therefore DE = 5.4. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D、E分别是AB和AC上的点且DE∥BC,若AD=6,BD=3,AE=4,则EC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on AB and AC respectively and DE ∥ BC, if AD = 6, BD = 3, AE = 4, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC, which means 6/3 = 4/EC. Solving this, EC = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=6,BD=3,AE=4,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 6, BD = 3, AE = 4, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, AD = 6, BD = 3, AE = 4, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC, therefore EC = 2, therefore AC = 2 + 4 = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,两条直线m,n被三条平行线a,b,c所截,交点分别为A,C,F和B,D,E,若AF=10,AC=4,BE=12,则DE的值为()
answer_cot: ∵两条直线m,n被三条平行线a,b,c所截,∴\frac{AC}{AF}=\frac{BD}{BE},即\frac{4}{10}=\frac{BD}{12},解得:BD=4.8,∴DE=BE-BD=12-4.8=7.2；故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines m and n are intersected by three parallel lines a, b, and c, with intersection points A, C, F and B, D, E, respectively. If AF = 10, AC = 4, BE = 12, then the value of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because two lines m and n are intersected by three parallel lines a, b, and c, therefore AC/AF = BD/BE, that is 4/10 = BD/12. Solving this, we get: BD = 4.8, therefore DE = BE - BD = 12 - 4.8 = 7.2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D在AB边上,且AD=2BD,过点D作DE∥BC交AC于点E．若AE=2,则AC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, point D is on side AB, and AD = 2BD. Draw DE ∥ BC intersecting AC at point E. If AE = 2, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, and AD = 2BD, therefore AE/CE = AD/BD = 2, thus CE = 1/2 AE = 1, therefore AC = AE + CE = 3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,两条直线被三条平行线所截,已知AB=3,DE=4,EF=7,则BC的长是()
answer_cot: ∵两条直线被三条平行线所截,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},即\frac{3}{BC}=\frac{4}{7},解得:BC=\frac{21}{4}；故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines are intersected by three parallel lines. It is known that AB = 3, DE = 4, EF = 7, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because two lines are intersected by three parallel lines, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is, 3/BC = 4/7, solving this gives: BC = 21/4. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AC、BD交于点O,若DO=3,BO=5,DC=4,则AB长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AC and BD intersect at point O. If DO = 3, BO = 5, DC = 4, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore DO:BO = CD:AB, that is, 3:5 = 4:AB, therefore AB = 20/3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,点D、E分别在边AB、BC上,DE∥AC,若DB=4,AB=6,BE=3,则EC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and BC respectively, DE ∥ AC, if DB = 4, AB = 6, BE = 3, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC, therefore DB:AB = BE:BC. Given that DB = 4, AB = 6, BE = 3, therefore 4:6 = 3:BC, solving this gives: BC = 9/2, thus EC = BC - BE = 3/2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知AD为△ABC的角平分线,DE∥AB交AC于E,如果\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{3}{5},那么\frac{AC}{AB}=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AD is the angle bisector of △ABC, DE ∥ AB intersects AC at E, if \(\frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{3}{5}\), then \(\frac{AC}{AB}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AB, therefore ∠ADE = ∠BAD. Since AD is the angle bisector of △ABC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠EAD, thus ∠EAD = ∠ADE, therefore AE = DE. Given that AE/EC = 3/5, therefore EC/DE = 5/3. Since DE ∥ AB, therefore △CDE ∼ △CBA, thus DE/AB = EC/AC, therefore AC/AB = EC/DE = 5/3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,BC上,DE∥AC．若BD=4,DA=2,BE=3,则BC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and BC respectively, DE ∥ AC. If BD = 4, DA = 2, BE = 3, then BC = ()
answer_cot_en: Since DE ∥ AC, therefore BD/DA = BE/CE. Given that BD = 4, DA = 2, BE = 3, therefore CE = 3/2, thus BC = 3/2 + 3 = 9/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AE=2,CE=3,DE=4,则BC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AE = 2, CE = 3, DE = 4, then BC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus AE/AC = DE/BC. Given AE = 2, CE = 3, DE = 4, therefore AC = AE + CE = 5, thus 2/5 = 4/BC, solving this gives: BC = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC交AB于点D,交AC于点E．若AB=4,AC=3,AD=3,则AE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC intersects AB at point D, intersects AC at point E. If AB = 4, AC = 3, AD = 3, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB, which means AE/3 = 3/4, solving this gives: AE = 9/4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CD∥EF,AD:AF=3:5,BE=12,那么CE的长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AD:AF = 3:5, BE = 12, then the length of CE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore AD/AF = BC/BE, which means 3/5 = BC/12, therefore BC = 36/5, thus CE = BE - BC = 12 - 36/5 = 24/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线m,n与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,已知AB=5,BC=10,DE=4,则EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, lines m and n intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. It is known that AB = 5, BC = 10, DE = 4, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is, 5/10 = 4/EF. Solving this, EF = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,BD=CD,AE:DE=1:2,延长BE交AC于F,且AF=4cm,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD = CD, AE:DE = 1:2, extend BE to intersect AC at F, and AF = 4 cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw DG parallel to BF intersecting AC at G, then △AEF is similar to △ADG. Since BD = CD, therefore CG = GF. AF:FG = AE:ED = 1:2. Given that AF = 4cm, therefore FG = 2AF = 8cm = CG, thus AC = AF + FG + CG = 20cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知D为△ABC边AB上一点,AD=2BD,DE∥BC交AC于E,AE=6,则EC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that D is a point on side AB of △ABC, AD = 2BD, DE ∥ BC intersects AC at E, AE = 6, then EC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/BD = AE/EC, which means 2BD/BD = 6/EC, therefore EC = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线l1∥l2∥l3,若AB=3,BC=4,则\frac{DE}{DF}的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line l1 ∥ l2 ∥ l3, if AB = 3, BC = 4, then the value of \(\frac{DE}{DF}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because l1 ∥ l2 ∥ l3, therefore DE/DF = AB/AC, and AC = AB + BC = 7, therefore DE/DF = 3/7. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC,EC=8,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{3}{4},则AE的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, EC = 8, \(\frac{AD}{BD} = \frac{3}{4}\), then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/CE = AD/BD = 3/4. Since EC = 8, therefore AE/8 = 3/4, thus AE = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,点D、E分别为AB、AC上的点,且满足DE∥BC,若AD=3,BD=2,AE=2,则EC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on AB and AC respectively, and satisfy DE ∥ BC. If AD = 3, BD = 2, AE = 2, then the length of EC is ()

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,分别交AB,AC于点D,E．若AD=2,DB=4,则\frac{AE}{AC}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, intersecting AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD = 2, DB = 4, then the value of \(\frac{AE}{AC}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB = 2/(2+4) = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1},l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C和点D,E,F,=,DE=6,则DF的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l₁ and l₂ intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F, respectively. If AE = DE = 6, then the value of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore DE / EF = AB / BC. Given that AB / BC = 2 / 3, therefore DE / EF = 2 / 3. Since DE = 6, therefore EF = 9, thus DF = DE + EF = 15. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{1}{2},DE=4cm,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{BD} = \frac{1}{2}\), DE = 4 cm, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus AD/AB = DE/BC. Since AD/BD = 1/2, therefore AD/AB = 1/3, which means DE/BC = 1/3. Given that DE = 4cm, therefore BC = 12cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,若\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{2}{3},则\frac{AE}{EC}=()

question: 已知△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=4,DB=6,AE=3,则AC的值是()
question_en: Given that in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 4, DB = 6, AE = 3, then the value of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC, thus 4/6 = 3/EC, solving this gives: EC = 4.5, hence AC = AE + EC = 4.5 + 3 = 7.5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,若DE∥BC,AD=5,BD=10,DE=4,则BC的值为()
answer_cot: 由DE∥BC可推出△ADE∽△ABC,所以\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{DE}{BC},因为AD=5,DE=4,BD=10,可求BC=12．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, if DE ∥ BC, AD = 5, BD = 10, DE = 4, then the value of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Since DE ∥ BC, it can be deduced that △ADE ∼ △ABC, so \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{DE}{BC}\). Given that AD = 5, DE = 4, and BD = 10, we can find BC = 12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=1,BC=2,DE=1.5,则EF的长为()
answer_cot: ∵AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},即:\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1.5}{EF}∴EF=3故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l₁ and l₂ intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If AB = 1, BC = 2, DE = 1.5, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, and lines l₁ and l₂ intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is: 1/2 = 1.5/EF. Therefore, EF = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{1}{2},AE=4cm,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{BD} = \frac{1}{2}\), AE = 4 cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/EC = AD/BD = 1/2, thus EC = 2AE = 8, therefore AC = AE + EC = 4 + 8 = 12(cm). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线m,n与a,b,c分别交于点A,C,E,B,D,F,若AC=4,CE=6,BD=3,则BF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m, n intersect a, b, c at points A, C, E, B, D, F respectively. If AC = 4, CE = 6, BD = 3, then the length of BF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a ∥ b ∥ c, therefore AC/CE = BD/DF, that is 4/6 = 3/DF. Solving this, DF = 9/2, then BF = BD + DF = 3 + 9/2 = 15/2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与a、b、c分别交于点A、C、E、B、D、F,AC=3,CE=6,BD=2,DF=()

answer_cot_en: Because a ∥ b ∥ c, therefore AC/CE = BD/DF, that is 3/6 = 2/DF, solving this, DF = 4. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m交直线a,b,c于点A,B,C,直线n交直线a,b,c于点D,E,F,若\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{1}{2},则\frac{DE}{EF}=()

answer_cot_en: Because a ∥ b ∥ c, therefore DE / EF = AB / BC = 1/2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 在△ABC中,D为AB边上一点,DE∥BC交AC于点E,若\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{3}{5},DE=6,则BC的长度为()
question_en: In △ABC, D is a point on side AB, DE ∥ BC intersects AC at point E, if \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{3}{5}\), DE = 6, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{3}{5}\), therefore \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{3}{8}\). Since DE ∥ BC, therefore \(\frac{DE}{BC} = \frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{3}{8}\). Given that DE = 6, therefore BC = 16. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l1、l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=4.5,BC=3,EF=2,则DE的长度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l1 and l2 intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If AB = 4.5, BC = 3, EF = 2, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is: 4.5/3 = DE/2, therefore DE = 3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C和点D,E,F,\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=4,则EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l1 and l2 intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F, respectively, \(\frac{AB}{BC} = \frac{2}{3}\), DE = 4, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF = 2/3. Since DE = 4, therefore EF = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图:△ABC中,DE∥BC,已知AE=6,AD:DB=3:4,则AC的长为()

answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC = 3/4, thus AE/AC = 6/AC = 3/7, solving this gives: AC = 14. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},如果AB=2,BC=3,DF=4,那么DE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, if AB = 2, BC = 3, DF = 4, then DE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because \( l_{1} \) is parallel to \( l_{2} \) which is parallel to \( l_{3} \), therefore \( \frac{AB}{AC} = \frac{DE}{DF} \). Given that AB = 2, BC = 3, DF = 4, therefore AC = AB + BC = 5, thus \( \frac{2}{5} = \frac{DE}{4} \), solving this gives: DE = \( \frac{8}{5} \). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3},l_{4}被直线l_{5},l_{6}所截,AB:BC:CD=1:2:3,若FG=3,则线段EF和线段GH的长度之和是()
answer_cot: ∵l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},∴\frac{EF}{FG}=\frac{AB}{BC},即\frac{EF}{3}=\frac{1}{2},解得,EF=,∵l_{2}∥l_{3}∥l_{4},∴\frac{FG}{GH}=\frac{BC}{CD},即\frac{3}{GH}=\frac{2}{3},解得GH=\frac{9}{2},则线段EF和线段GH的长度之和=\frac{3}{2}+\frac{9}{2}=6,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, four parallel lines l₁, l₂, l₃, l₄ are intersected by lines l₅, l₆, AB:BC:CD = 1:2:3, if FG = 3, then the sum of the lengths of line segments EF and GH is ()
answer_cot_en: Because \(l_{1}\) is parallel to \(l_{2}\) which is parallel to \(l_{3}\), therefore \(\frac{EF}{FG} = \frac{AB}{BC}\), that is \(\frac{EF}{3} = \frac{1}{2}\), solving this, we get \(EF = \frac{3}{2}\). Because \(l_{2}\) is parallel to \(l_{3}\) which is parallel to \(l_{4}\), therefore \(\frac{FG}{GH} = \frac{BC}{CD}\), that is \(\frac{3}{GH} = \frac{2}{3}\), solving this we get \(GH = \frac{9}{2}\), thus the sum of the lengths of line segments EF and GH is \(\frac{3}{2} + \frac{9}{2} = 6\). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知直线l∥m∥n,直线a分别与l,m,n交于点A,B,C,过点B作直线b交直线l,n于点D,E,若AB=2,BC=1,BD=3,则BE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line l ∥ m ∥ n, line a intersects l, m, n at points A, B, C, respectively. A line b is drawn through point B and intersects lines l, n at points D, E. If AB = 2, BC = 1, BD = 3, then the length of BE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because lines l, m, and n are parallel, AB = 2, BC = 1, BD = 3, therefore AB/BC = DB/BE, that is 2/1 = 3/BE, so BE = 1.5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线AD∥BE∥CF,直线m,n与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=2,AC=5,DE=1.4,则DF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines m and n intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If AB = 2, AC = 5, DE = 1.4, then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/AC = DE/DF, that is, 2/5 = 1.4/DF, therefore DF = 3.5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC边上,DE∥BC,若\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},AD=6,则AB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, if \(\frac{AE}{AC} = \frac{3}{4}\), AD = 6, then AB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Solution: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC. Given that AE/AC = 3/4 and AD = 6, therefore 6/AB = 3/4, thus AB = 8. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=6,DB=3,AE=4,则EC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 6, DB = 3, AE = 4, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/DB = AE/EC, which means 6/3 = 4/EC. Solving this, we get: EC = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D为AB边上一点,DE∥BC交AC于点E．若\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{2}{3},AE=6,则EC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is a point on side AB, DE ∥ BC intersects AC at point E. If \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{2}{3}\), AE = 6, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/BD = AE/EC. Since AD/DB = 2/3 and AE = 6, therefore EC = 9. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,DE∥BC,分别交△ABC的边AB、AC于点D、E,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{3},若AE=5,则EC的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, DE ∥ BC, intersecting the sides AB and AC of △ABC at points D and E, \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{1}{3}\), if AE = 5, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, therefore 5/AC = 1/3, therefore AC = 15. Thus, EC = AC - AE = 15 - 5 = 10. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,若AB=2,AC=6,DE=1.5,则DF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l₁ and l₂ intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F, respectively. If AB = 2, AC = 6, DE = 1.5, then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/AC = DE/DF, that is, 2/6 = 1.5/DF, therefore DF = 4.5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,已知l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},AB=3,AC=15,DE=2,EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, AB = 3, AC = 15, DE = 2, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because \(l_{1}\) is parallel to \(l_{2}\) which is parallel to \(l_{3}\), therefore \(\frac{AB}{AC} = \frac{DE}{DF}\). Since AB = 3, AC = 15, DE = 2, therefore DF = 10, thus EF = DF - DE = 10 - 2 = 8. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CD,AO=2,BO=3,CO=6,那么DO=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CD, AO = 2, BO = 3, CO = 6, then DO = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore AO/DO = BO/CO. Since AO = 2, BO = 3, CO = 6, therefore 2/DO = 3/6, thus DO = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AE=4,EC=2,则AD:DB的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E, respectively. If AE = 4, EC = 2, then the ratio of AD:DB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AB/DB = AE/EC. Since AE = 4, EC = 2, the ratio of AD:DB is 4:2 = 2:1. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知AD为△ABC的角平分线,DE∥AB交AC于点E,\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{3}{5},那么等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AD is the angle bisector of △ABC, DE ∥ AB intersects AC at point E, \(\frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{3}{5}\), then the value of () is
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AB, therefore BD/CD = AE/EC = 3/5. Since AD is the angle bisector of △ABC, therefore AB/AC = DE/DF = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DF∥AC,EG∥AB,且AE:EC=3:2,若BC=10,则FG的长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE∥BC,∴\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AE}{AC},∵AE:EC=3:2,BC=10,∴\frac{DE}{10}=\frac{3}{5},解得DE=6,∵DE∥FC,DF∥AC,∴四边形DECF为平行四边形,∴FC=DE=10,∵EG∥AB,∴=,即\frac{CG}{10}=\frac{2}{5},解得CG=4,∴FG=FC-CG=6-4=2．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DF ∥ AC, EG ∥ AB, and AE:EC = 3:2, if BC = 10, then the length of FG is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore DE/BC = AE/AC. Since AE:EC = 3:2 and BC = 10, therefore DE/10 = 3/5, solving this gives DE = 6. Because DE ∥ FC and DF ∥ AC, therefore quadrilateral DECF is a parallelogram, thus FC = DE = 6. Since EG ∥ AB, therefore CG/10 = 2/5, solving this gives CG = 4, therefore FG = FC - CG = 6 - 4 = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC边上,DE∥BC,若AE:AC=3:4,AD=6,则BD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, if AE:AC = 3:4, AD = 6, then BD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB, which means 3/4 = 6/AB. Solving this, we get: AB = 8, then BD = AB - AD = 8 - 6 = 2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线a、b与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,AB=4,BC=6,DE=3,则EF的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, lines a and b intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively, AB = 4, BC = 6, DE = 3, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF. Since AB = 4, BC = 6, DE = 3, therefore 4/6 = 3/EF, solving for EF gives EF = 4.5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,D在AB上,E在AC上,DF∥AC交BC于点F．若AE=5,EC=3,BF=1.5,则BC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, D is on AB, E is on AC, DF ∥ AC intersects BC at point F. If AE = 5, EC = 3, BF = 1.5, then BC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, which means AD/AB = 5/(5+3) = 5/8. Therefore, (AB - AD)/AB = (8 - 5)/8 = 3/8, which means BD/AB = 3/8. Since DF ∥ AC, therefore BF/BC = BD/BA, which means 1.5/BC = 3/8, therefore BC = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=2,AB=6,AE=3,则CE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 2, AB = 6, AE = 3, then the length of CE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/BD = AE/CE. Since AD = 2, AB = 6, AE = 3, therefore 2/(6 - 2) = 3/EC, thus EC = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,D,E两点分别在AB,AC边上,且DE∥BC,如果\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{2}{3},AC=6,那么AE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, and DE ∥ BC. If \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{2}{3}\), AC = 6, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/AC = AD/AB = 2/3, and since AC = 6, therefore AE = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．已知AB=1,BC=3,DE=2,则EF的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l₁ and l₂ intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. Given that AB = 1, BC = 3, DE = 2, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF. Since AB = 1, BC = 3, DE = 2, therefore 1/3 = 2/EF. Solving this, we get EF = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,D、F在AB边上,E、G在AC边上,DE∥FG∥BC,且AD:DF:FB=3:2:1,若AG=15,则CE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and F are on the side AB, E and G are on the side AC, DE ∥ FG ∥ BC, and AD:DF:FB = 3:2:1, if AG = 15, then the length of CE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ FG ∥ BC, therefore AF/DB = AG/EC, and AD:DF:FB = 3:2:1, therefore AF/DB = 5/3, thus 15/EC = 5/3, therefore EC = 9. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线a,b与l_{1}、l_{2}、l_{3}分别相交于A、B、C和点D、E、F．若\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=4,则EF的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, l₁ ∥ l₂ ∥ l₃, straight lines a and b intersect l₁, l₂, and l₃ at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If \(\frac{AB}{BC} = \frac{2}{3}\), DE = 4, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because \( l_{1} \) is parallel to \( l_{2} \) which is parallel to \( l_{3} \), therefore \( \frac{AB}{BC} = \frac{DE}{EF} \), that is \( \frac{2}{3} = \frac{4}{EF} \), solving this gives: EF = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AD平分∠BAC,按如下步骤作图:第一步,分别以点A、D为圆心,以大于\frac{1}{2}AD的长为半径在AD两侧作弧,交于两点M、N；第二步,连接MN分别交AB、AC于点E、F；第三步,连接DE、DF．若BD=6,AF=4,CD=3,则BE的长是()
answer_cot: ∵根据作法可知:MN是线段AD的垂直平分线,∴AE=DE,AF=DF,∴∠EAD=∠EDA,∵AD平分∠BAC,∴∠BAD=∠CAD,∴∠EDA=∠CAD,∴DE∥AC,同理DF∥AE,∴四边形AEDF是菱形,∴AE=DE=DF=AF,∵AF=4,∴AE=DE=DF=AF=4,∵DE∥AC,∴\frac{BD}{CD}=\frac{BE}{AE},∵BD=6,AE=4,CD=3,∴\frac{6}{3}=\frac{BE}{4},∴BE=8,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD bisects ∠BAC. Follow the steps to draw the figure: Step one, take points A and D as centers, with a radius longer than \(\frac{1}{2}\)AD, draw arcs on both sides of AD, intersecting at points M and N; Step two, connect MN and intersect AB and AC at points E and F respectively; Step three, connect DE and DF. If BD = 6, AF = 4, CD = 3, then the length of BE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because according to the construction, MN is the perpendicular bisector of line segment AD, therefore AE = DE, AF = DF, thus ∠EAD = ∠EDA. Since AD bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠BAD = ∠CAD, thus ∠EDA = ∠CAD, therefore DE ∥ AC. Similarly, DF ∥ AE, therefore quadrilateral AEDF is a rhombus, thus AE = DE = DF = AF. Since AF = 4, therefore AE = DE = DF = AF = 4. Because DE ∥ AC, therefore BD/CD = BE/AE. Given BD = 6, AE = 4, CD = 3, therefore 6/3 = BE/4, thus BE = 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC,已知AE=6,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{3}{7},则EC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, it is known that AE = 6, \(\frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{3}{7}\), then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE is similar to △ABC, thus AD/AB = AE/AC, therefore AE/AC = 6/(6+EC) = 3/7, solving gives: EC = 8. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AE=4,EC=2,则BD:AB的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E, respectively. If AE = 4, EC = 2, then the ratio of BD:AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, AE = 4, EC = 2, therefore AE/EC = AD/DB = 4/2 = 2, therefore AD = 2DB, therefore AB = 3BD, therefore BD:AB = BD:3BD = 1/3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D为AB边上一点,DE∥BC交AC于点E,若\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{3}{5},AE=6,则EC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is a point on side AB, DE ∥ BC intersects AC at point E, if \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{3}{5}\), AE = 6, then the length of EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/EC = AD/DB = 3/5. Since AE = 6, therefore EC = AE ÷ (3/5) = 6 × (5/3) = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=2,AB=6,DE=3,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 2, AB = 6, DE = 3, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD:AB = DE:BC. Since AD = 2, AB = 6, DE = 3, therefore 2:6 = 3:BC, thus BC = 9. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC上,AD=3,DB=2,DE∥BC,则DE:BC的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on AB and AC respectively, AD = 3, DB = 2, DE ∥ BC, then the ratio of DE to BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = 3, DB = 2, therefore AB = AD + BD = 3 + 2 = 5. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore DE:BC = AD:AB = 3:5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,AD=2,AE=3,BD=4,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AD = 2, AE = 3, BD = 4, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: AB = AD + BD = 2 + 4 = 6, because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, thus 2/6 = 3/AC, solving this gives: AC = 9. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC为等边三角形,点E在BA的延长线上,点D在BC边上,且ED=EC．若△ABC的边长为4,AE=2,则BD的长为()
answer_cot: 延长BC至F点,使得CF=BD,∵ED=EC,∴∠EDC=∠ECD,∴∠EDB=∠ECF,在△EBD和△EFC中≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{DB=CF}\\{∠BDE=∠FCE}\\{DE=CE}\end{array}\right.∴△EBD≌△EFC(SAS),∴∠B=∠F∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠B=∠ACB,∴∠ACB=∠F,∴AC∥EF,∴\frac{BA}{AE}=\frac{BC}{CF},∵BA=BC,∴AE=CF=2,∴BD=AE=CF=2故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an equilateral triangle, point E is on the extension of BA, point D is on side BC, and ED = EC. If the side length of △ABC is 4, and AE = 2, then the length of BD is ()

question: 如图:AB是斜靠在墙AC上的楼梯,梯脚B点距离墙1.6m,梯上D点距墙1.4m,BD=0.55m,则梯子长为()
answer_cot: 由图可得,\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AB-BD}{AB},又BC=1.6m,DE=1.4,BD=0.55m,代入可得\frac{1.4}{1.6}=\frac{AB-0.55}{AB},解得AB=4.40m,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a ladder leaning against wall AC, the foot of the ladder at point B is 1.6 m away from the wall, point D on the ladder is 1.4 m away from the wall, BD = 0.55 m, then the length of the ladder is ()
answer_cot_en: From the diagram, we can deduce that \(\frac{DE}{BC} = \frac{AB - BD}{AB}\). Given that BC = 1.6m, DE = 1.4, BD = 0.55m, substituting these values we get \(\frac{1.4}{1.6} = \frac{AB - 0.55}{AB}\). Solving this, we find AB = 4.40m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,DE∥BC,AQ⊥BC于Q,交DE于P,AD=3,BD=2,则\frac{AP}{AQ}等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, AQ ⊥ BC at Q, intersects DE at P, AD = 3, BD = 2, then \(\frac{AP}{AQ}\) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AP/AQ = AD/AB = AD/(AD + BD) = 3/(3 + 2) = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,E为AB的中点,F为AD上一点,EF交AC于G,AF=2cm,DF=4cm,AG=3cm,则AC的长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴BC=AD=6cm,BC∥AD．∴∠EAF=∠EBH,∠AFE=∠BHE,又AE=BE,∴△AFE≌△BHE,∴BH=AF=2cm．∵BC∥AD,∴\frac{AG}{GG}=\frac{AF}{CH},即\frac{3}{GG}=\frac{2}{8},则CG=12,则AC=AG+CG=15(cm)．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the midpoint of AB, F is a point on AD, EF intersects AC at G, AF = 2cm, DF = 4cm, AG = 3cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore BC = AD = 6cm, and BC ∥ AD. Therefore ∠EAF = ∠EBH, ∠AFE = ∠BHE, and since AE = BE, therefore △AFE is congruent to △BHE, thus BH = AF = 2cm. Since BC ∥ AD, therefore AG/GG = AF/CH, that is 3/GG = 2/8, then CG = 12, and AC = AG + CG = 15(cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与直线a、b、c分别交于点A、C、E、B、D、F,AC=4,CE=6,BD=3,则BF=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m and n intersect lines a, b, and c at points A, C, E, B, D, F respectively, AC = 4, CE = 6, BD = 3, then BF = ()
answer_cot_en: Because a is parallel to b which is parallel to c, therefore AC/CE = BD/DF. Since AC = 4, CE = 6, BD = 3, we have 4/6 = 3/DF. Solving this gives: DF = 9/2, therefore BF = BD + DF = 3 + 9/2 = 7.5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别交边AB、AC于D、E两点,若AD:DB=2:3,AE=4,则AC为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects sides AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD:DB = 2:3, AE = 4, then AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE:EC = AD:DB = 2:3. Since AE = 4, therefore 4:EC = 2:3, thus EC = 6, therefore AC = AE + EC = 4 + 6 = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 已知:如图在△ABC中,DE∥BC,\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{DE}{BC}=()
question_en: Given: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, \(\frac{AD}{DB} = \frac{1}{3}\), then \(\frac{DE}{BC} = ()\)
answer_cot_en: Because AD:BD = 1:3, therefore AD:AB = 1:4; Since DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE ∼ △ABC; thus DE:BC = AD:AB = 1:4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分AB、AC边上,DE∥BC,若AD:AB=3:4,AE=6,则AC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on sides AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, if AD:AB = 3:4, AE = 6, then AC equals ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore △ADE ∼ △ABC, thus AD:AB = AE:AC, and since AD:AB = 3:4, AE = 6, therefore 3:4 = 6:AC, thus AC = 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,如果DE∥BC,AD=3,AE=2,BD=5,则AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, if DE ∥ BC, AD = 3, AE = 2, BD = 5, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD = 3, BD = 5, therefore AD/BD = 3/5. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore AD/BD = AE/EC, thus 3/5 = AE/EC. Therefore, CE = 10/3, thus AC = AE + CE = 2 + 10/3 = 16/3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在三角形ABC中,E,F分别是AB,AC边上的点,且有EF∥BC,如果\frac{EB}{AB}=\frac{4}{5},则\frac{AC}{FC}=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in triangle ABC, E and F are points on sides AB and AC respectively, and EF ∥ BC. If \(\frac{EB}{AB} = \frac{4}{5}\), then \(\frac{AC}{FC}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because EF is parallel to BC, therefore EB/AB = FC/AC = 4/5, thus AC/FC = 5/4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示,△ABC中,AB=10cm,AC=8cm,∠ABC和∠ACB的角平分线交于点O,过点O作BC的平行线MN交AB于点M,交AC于点N,则△AMN的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵∠ABC和∠ACB的角平分线交于点O,∴∠ABO=∠CBO,∠ACO=∠BCO,∵BC∥MN,∴∠BOM=∠CBO,∠CON=∠BCO,∴∠BOM=∠ABO,∠CON=∠ACO,∴OM=BM,ON=CN,∴△AMN的周长=AM+AN+MN=AM+OM+AN+NC=AB+AC=18cm．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 10 cm, AC = 8 cm, the angle bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect at point O. A parallel line to BC through point O intersects AB at point M and intersects AC at point N, then the perimeter of △AMN is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the angle bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect at point O, therefore ∠ABO = ∠CBO, ∠ACO = ∠BCO. Since BC ∥ MN, therefore ∠BOM = ∠CBO, ∠CON = ∠BCO. Thus ∠BOM = ∠ABO, ∠CON = ∠ACO, therefore OM = BM, ON = CN. Hence, the perimeter of △AMN = AM + AN + MN = AM + OM + AN + NC = AB + AC = 18cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AD=4,DB=2,则AE:EC的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD = 4, DB = 2, then the ratio AE:EC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, therefore AD:DB = AE:EC, and AD = 4, DB = 2, therefore AE:EC = AD:DB = 4:2 = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 已知:如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},AB=4,BC=6,DE=3,则EF为()

question: 如图,△ABC中,D,E分别是AB,AC上的点,DE∥BC,DE=1,BC=3,AB=6,则AD的长为()

question: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,且AD=2,DB=4,则\frac{AE}{EC}的值为()
