question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, OB = 6, chord CD = 10, then the length of the chord distance OP is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Connect OD, then OD = OB = 6. Because AB ⊥ CD and AB passes through O, therefore DP = CP = 1/2 CD. Since CD = 10, therefore DP = 5. In right triangle DPO, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: OP = √{OD² - DP²} = √{6² - 5²} = √{11}.

question: 一条排水管的截面如图所示,已知排水管的半径OB=10,水面宽AB=16,则截面圆心O到水面的距离OC是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵OC⊥AB,OC过圆心O点,∴BC=AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×16=8,在Rt△OCB中,由勾股定理得:OC=√{OB²-BC²}=√{10²-8²}=6,
question_en: As shown in the figure, the cross-section of a drainage pipe is shown, it is known that the radius OB of the drainage pipe is 10, the width of the water surface AB is 16, then the distance OC from the center of the circle O to the water surface is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because OC ⊥ AB, and OC passes through the center O, therefore BC = AC = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 16 = 8. In the right triangle △OCB, by the Pythagorean theorem, we get: OC = √{OB² - BC²} = √{10² - 8²} = 6.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为2,弦AB=2√{3},那么弦心距OE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 2, chord AB = 2√3, then the length of the chord center distance OE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because OE is the perpendicular distance from the chord AB to the center, therefore OE ⊥ AB, therefore AE = BE = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 2√3 = √3. Since OA = 2, therefore in right triangle △AOE, OE = √(OA² - AE²) = 1.

question: 如图,图①是一个四边形纸条ABCD,其中AB∥CD,E,F分别为边AB,CD上的两个点,将纸条ABCD沿EF折叠得到图②,再将图②沿DF折叠得到图③,若在图③中,∠FEM=26°,则∠EFC的度数为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:如图①,由折叠得:∠BEF=2∠FEM=52°,如图②,∵AE∥DF,∴∠EFM=26°,∠BMF=∠DME=52°,∵BM∥CF,∴∠CFM+∠BMF=180°,∴∠CFM=180°-52°=128°,由折叠得:如图③,∠MFC=128°,∴∠EFC=∠MFC-∠EFM=128°-26°=102°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, Figure ① is a quadrilateral strip ABCD, where AB ∥ CD, E and F are two points on sides AB and CD, respectively. Fold the strip ABCD along EF to obtain Figure ②, then fold Figure ② along DF to obtain Figure ③. If in Figure ③, ∠FEM = 26°, then the degree of ∠EFC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】As shown in Figure 1, by folding, we have ∠BEF = 2∠FEM = 52°. As shown in Figure 2, because AE ∥ DF, therefore ∠EFM = 26°, ∠BMF = ∠DME = 52°. Since BM ∥ CF, therefore ∠CFM + ∠BMF = 180°, thus ∠CFM = 180° - 52° = 128°. By folding, as shown in Figure 3, ∠MFC = 128°, therefore ∠EFC = ∠MFC - ∠EFM = 128° - 26° = 102°.

question: 如图,C点在线段AB上,点D是AC的中点,若CD=4cm,AB=13cm,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is on line segment AB, point D is the midpoint of AC. If CD = 4 cm, AB = 13 cm, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Point D is the midpoint of AC. If CD = 4cm, then AC = 2CD = 2×4 = 8(cm), and BC = AB - AC = 13 - 8 = 5(cm).

question: 已知:如图,点C是线段AB的中点,点D是线段BC的中点,AB=20cm,那么线段AD等于()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵点C是线段AB的中点,AB=20cm,∴BC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×20cm=10cm,∵点D是线段BC的中点,∴BD=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}×10cm=5cm,∴AD=AB-BD=20cm-5cm=15cm．
question_en: Given: As shown in the figure, point C is the midpoint of segment AB, point D is the midpoint of segment BC, AB = 20 cm, then the length of segment AD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because point C is the midpoint of segment AB, and AB = 20cm, therefore BC = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 20cm = 10cm. Since point D is the midpoint of segment BC, therefore BD = 1/2 BC = 1/2 × 10cm = 5cm. Thus, AD = AB - BD = 20cm - 5cm = 15cm.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD的两个外角∠CBE,∠CDF的平分线交于点G,若∠A=52°,∠DGB=28°,则∠DCB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the bisectors of two exterior angles ∠CBE and ∠CDF of quadrilateral ABCD intersect at point G. If ∠A = 52°, ∠DGB = 28°, then the degree of ∠DCB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Connect AC and BD, therefore ∠FDC = ∠DAC + ∠DCA, ∠CBE = ∠BAC + ∠BCA. Since DG bisects ∠FDC and BG bisects ∠CBE, therefore ∠CBG + ∠CDG = 1/2(∠DAB + ∠DCB). In △BDG, ∠G + ∠CDG + ∠CBE + ∠CDB + ∠DBC = 180°, therefore ∠G + 1/2(∠DAB + ∠DCB) + ∠CDB + ∠DBC = 180°, thus ∠G + 1/2(∠DAB + ∠DCB) + (180° - ∠DCB) = 180°. Since ∠A = 52° and ∠DGB = 28°, therefore 28° + 1/2 × 52° + 1/2 × ∠DCB + 180° - ∠DCB = 180°, thus ∠DCB = 108°.

question: 如图,点O在直线AB上,若∠1=42°,则∠2的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point O is on the straight line AB, if ∠1 = 42°, then the size of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠1 = 42°, therefore ∠2 = 180° - ∠1 = 180° - 42° = 138°,

question: 如图,AD是△ABC的中线,AB=5,AC=3,△ABD的周长和△ACD的周长差为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵AD是△ABC中BC边上的中线,∴BD=DC=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴△ABD和△ADC的周长的差,=(AB+\frac{1}{2}BC+AD)-(AC+\frac{1}{2}BC+AD),=AB-AC,=5-3,=2,
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD is the median of △ABC, AB = 5, AC = 3, the difference in the perimeters of △ABD and △ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AD is the median of side BC in △ABC, therefore BD = DC = 1/2 BC. Thus, the difference in the perimeters of △ABD and △ADC is (AB + 1/2 BC + AD) - (AC + 1/2 BC + AD) = AB - AC = 5 - 3 = 2.

question: 如图,已知线段AB=9,BC=5,点D为线段AC的中点,则线段AD的长度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line segment AB = 9, BC = 5, point D is the midpoint of line segment AC, then the length of line segment AD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 9, BC = 5, therefore AC = AB + BC = 14. Since D is the midpoint of line segment AC, therefore AD = 1/2 AC = 7,

question: 如图,四边形ABCD沿直线EF折叠,已知∠A=110°,∠B=80°,则∠1+∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is folded along the straight line EF. It is known that ∠A = 110°, ∠B = 80°, then ∠1 + ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠A = 110° and ∠B = 80°, therefore ∠A + ∠B = 190°. Since the sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral is 360°, therefore ∠AEF + ∠BFE = 170°. According to the fold, it can be obtained that ∠A′EF + ∠B′FE = 170°, thus ∠1 + ∠2 = 20°.

question: 如图所示,第一个天平的两侧分别放2个球体和5个圆柱体,第二个天平的两侧分别放2个正方体和3个圆柱体,两个天平都平衡,则12个球体的质量等于个正方体的质量．()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:一个球等于2.5个圆柱体,十二个球等于三十个圆柱体；一个圆柱体等\frac{2}{3}正方体,十二个球体等于二十个正方体,
question_en: As shown in the figure, on the first scale, there are 2 spheres on one side and 5 cylinders on the other side. On the second scale, there are 2 cubes on one side and 3 cylinders on the other side. Both scales are balanced. Therefore, the mass of 12 spheres is equal to the mass of () cubes.
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: One sphere is equal to 2.5 cylinders, twelve spheres are equal to thirty cylinders; one cylinder is equal to \(\frac{2}{3}\) of a cube, twelve spheres are equal to twenty cubes.

question: 如图,点C是线段AB上一点,点M是AC的中点,点N是BC的中点,如果MC比NC长2cm,AC比BC长()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:点M是AC的中点,点N是BC的中点,如果MC比NC长2cm,AC=2MC,BC=2CN,由线段的和差得AC-BC=2MC-2NC=2(MC-NC)=2×2=4cm,
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on line segment AB, point M is the midpoint of AC, point N is the midpoint of BC, if MC is 2 cm longer than NC, AC is longer than BC by ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Point M is the midpoint of AC, and point N is the midpoint of BC. If MC is 2cm longer than NC, then AC = 2MC, BC = 2CN. By the segment addition and subtraction, we get AC - BC = 2MC - 2NC = 2(MC - NC) = 2×2 = 4cm.

question: 如图,A,B,C,D,E,F是平面上的6个点,则∠A+∠B+∠C+∠D+∠E+∠F的度数是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:如图所示,连接AD,设DE,AF交于点O,则∠AOD=∠EOF,∴∠E+∠F=∠OAD+∠ODA,又∵四边形ABCD中,∠DAB+∠B+∠C+∠ADC=360°,∴∠OAB+∠B+∠C+∠CDE+∠ODA+∠OAD=360°,即∠OAB+∠B+∠C+∠CDE+∠E+∠F=360°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, C, D, E, F are six points on a plane, then the sum of the degrees of ∠A + ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E + ∠F is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】As shown in the diagram, connect AD, and let DE and AF intersect at point O, then ∠AOD = ∠EOF, therefore ∠E + ∠F = ∠OAD + ∠ODA. Also, because in quadrilateral ABCD, ∠DAB + ∠B + ∠C + ∠ADC = 360°, therefore ∠OAB + ∠B + ∠C + ∠CDE + ∠ODA + ∠OAD = 360°, which means ∠OAB + ∠B + ∠C + ∠CDE + ∠E + ∠F = 360°.

question: 如图,C、D是线段AB上的两点,E是AC的中点,F是BD的中点,若EF=8,CD=4,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由题意得,EC+FD=EF-CD=8-4=4,∵E是AC的中点,F是BD的中点,∴AE+FB=EC+FD=4,∴AB=AE+FB+EF=4+8=12．
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the line segment AB, E is the midpoint of AC, F is the midpoint of BD, if EF = 8, CD = 4, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, EC + FD = EF - CD = 8 - 4 = 4. Since E is the midpoint of AC and F is the midpoint of BD, therefore AE + FB = EC + FD = 4. Therefore, AB = AE + FB + EF = 4 + 8 = 12.

question: 把一副直角三角板按如图所示的方式摆放在一起,其中∠C=90°,∠F=90°,∠D=30°,∠A=45°,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when two right-angle triangles are placed together as shown, where ∠C = 90°, ∠F = 90°, ∠D = 30°, ∠A = 45°, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】As shown in the diagram: Because ∠1 = ∠D + ∠DOA, and ∠2 = ∠F + ∠FPB, and since ∠DOA = ∠COP, and ∠EPB = ∠CPO, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = ∠D + ∠F + ∠COP + ∠CPO = ∠D + ∠F + 180° - ∠C = 30° + 90° + 180° - 90° = 210°.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠B=20°,以A为圆心,任意长为半径画弧分别交AB于点M和N,再分别以M、N为圆心,大于MN的长为半径画弧,两弧交于P,连接AP并延长交于点D,则∠ADB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠B = 20°, with A as the center, an arc of arbitrary length as the radius intersects AB at points M and N, then with M and N as centers, arcs with a radius greater than the length of MN are drawn, the two arcs intersect at P, connect AP and extend it to intersect at point D, then the degree of ∠ADB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, AD bisects ∠CAB. Since ∠C = 90° and ∠B = 20°, therefore ∠CAB = 70°, thus ∠CAD = ∠BAD = 35°, therefore ∠ADB = 180° - 20° - 35° = 125°.

question: 如图,CD是∠ACB的平分线,∠EDC=25°,∠DCE=25°,∠B=70°,则∠BDC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, CD is the bisector of ∠ACB, ∠EDC = 25°, ∠DCE = 25°, ∠B = 70°, then the degree of ∠BDC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because CD is the bisector of ∠ACB, ∠DCE = 25°, therefore ∠BCD = ∠DCE = 25°, thus ∠BDC = 180° - ∠B - ∠DCB = 85°,

question: 如图,在五边形ABCDE中,∠A+∠B+∠E=300°,DP,CP分别平分∠EDC,∠BCD,则∠P的度数是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵在五边形ABCDE中,∠A+∠B+∠E=300°,∴∠EDC+∠BCD=240°,又∵DP、CP分别平分∠EDC、∠BCD,∴∠PDC+∠PCD=120°,∴△CDP中,∠P=180°-(∠PDC+∠PCD)=180°-120°=60°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the pentagon ABCDE, ∠A + ∠B + ∠E = 300°, DP and CP bisect ∠EDC and ∠BCD respectively, then the degree of ∠P is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because in the pentagon ABCDE, ∠A + ∠B + ∠E = 300°, therefore ∠EDC + ∠BCD = 240°. Since DP and CP each bisect ∠EDC and ∠BCD respectively, therefore ∠PDC + ∠PCD = 120°. Thus, in △CDP, ∠P = 180° - (∠PDC + ∠PCD) = 180° - 120° = 60°.

question: 如图,△ABC≌△ADE,如果AB=5cm,BC=7cm,AC=6cm,那么DE的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ≅ △ADE, if AB = 5cm, BC = 7cm, AC = 6cm, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because △ABC is congruent to △ADE, therefore DE = BC. Since BC = 7cm, therefore DE = 7cm.

question: 如图,C岛在A岛的南偏东15°方向,C岛在B岛的北偏东70°方向,从C岛看A、B两岛的视角∠ACB的度数是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵C岛在A岛的南偏东15°方向,∴∠FAC=15°,∵C岛在B岛的北偏东70°方向,∴∠CBD=∠BCE=70°,∵FA∥CE,∴∠FAC+∠ACB+∠BCE=180°,∴15°+∠ACB+70°=180°,∴∠ACB=95°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, Island C is located 15° south by east from Island A, and Island C is located 70° north by east from Island B. The visual angle ∠ACB between Islands A and B as seen from Island C is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because Island C is 15° south by east of Island A, therefore ∠FAC = 15°. Because Island C is 70° north by east of Island B, therefore ∠CBD = ∠BCE = 70°. Since FA is parallel to CE, therefore ∠FAC + ∠ACB + ∠BCE = 180°, thus 15° + ∠ACB + 70° = 180°, therefore ∠ACB = 95°.

question: 如图,将△ABC沿MN折叠,使MN∥BC,点A的对应点为点A′,若∠A′=32°,∠B=112°,则∠A'NC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is folded along MN, making MN ∥ BC, the corresponding point of point A is point A′, if ∠A′ = 32°, ∠B = 112°, then the degree of ∠A'NC is ()
answer_cot_en: Solution: Because MN is parallel to BC, therefore ∠MNC + ∠C = 180°. Also, since ∠A + ∠B + ∠C = 180°, and ∠A = ∠A′ = 32°, ∠B = 112°, therefore ∠C = 36°, ∠MNC = 144°. By the property of folding, we know that ∠A′NM + ∠MNC = 180°, therefore ∠A′NM = 36°, thus ∠A′NC = ∠MNC - ∠A′NM = 144° - 36° = 108°.

question: 如图所示的四边形中,若去掉一个50°的角得到一个五边形,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: In the shown quadrilateral, if a 50° angle is removed to obtain a pentagon, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠1 = ∠A + ∠ACB, ∠2 = ∠A + ∠ABC, and ∠A + ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 180°, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = ∠A + ∠ACB + ∠A + ∠ABC = 180° + ∠A = 180° + 50° = 230°.

question: 如图,已知线段AB=10cm,M是AB中点,点N在AB上,NB=2cm,那么线段MN的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the line segment AB = 10 cm, M is the midpoint of AB, point N is on AB, NB = 2 cm, then the length of the line segment MN is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 10cm, and M is the midpoint of AB, therefore BM = 1/2 AB = 5cm. Also, since NB = 2cm, therefore MN = BM - BN = 5 - 2 = 3cm.

question: 如图,已知线段AB=16cm,点C为线段AB上的一个动点,点D、E分别是AC和BC的中点,则DE的长()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵点D、E分别是AC和BC的中点,∴DE=DC+CE=\frac{1}{2}AC+\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}AB而AB=16cm,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}×16=8(cm)．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the line segment AB = 16 cm, point C is a moving point on the line segment AB, points D and E are the midpoints of AC and BC, respectively, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because points D and E are the midpoints of AC and BC respectively, therefore DE = DC + CE = 1/2 AC + 1/2 BC = 1/2 AB. And since AB = 16cm, therefore DE = 1/2 × 16 = 8(cm).

question: 如图,点M是线段AB的中点,点N在线段MB上,若AB=12,AM:BN=3:1,则线段MN的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵AM:BN=3:1,而点M是线段AB的中点,且AB=12,∴AM=BM=6,BN=2而MN=BM-BN=6-2=4
question_en: As shown in the figure, point M is the midpoint of segment AB, point N is on segment MB. If AB = 12, AM:BN = 3:1, then the length of segment MN is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AM:BN = 3:1, and point M is the midpoint of segment AB, and AB = 12, therefore AM = BM = 6, BN = 2 and MN = BM - BN = 6 - 2 = 4.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD中,∠ABC=3∠CBD,∠ADC=3∠CDB,∠C=130°,则∠A的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, ∠ABC = 3∠CBD, ∠ADC = 3∠CDB, ∠C = 130°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠ABC = 3∠CBD, and ∠ADC = 3∠CDB, let's set ∠ABC = 3x, then ∠CBD = x, and ∠ADC = 3y, then ∠CDB = y. Since ∠C = 130°, we have x + y = 50°, therefore ∠A = 180° - 2(x + y) = 80°.

question: 如图,线段AB上有C、D两点,且AD=\frac{1}{3}AB,C是AD的中点,若AB=12,则线段AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, there are points C and D on line segment AB, and AD = \(\frac{1}{3}\)AB, C is the midpoint of AD, if AB = 12, then the length of line segment AC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AD = 1/3 AB, and AB = 12, therefore AD = 4. Since C is the midpoint of AD, therefore AC = 1/2 AD = 2.

question: 如图,将三角形纸板直角顶点放在直尺上,∠1=35°,∠2=69°,则∠3的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, placing the right-angle vertex of the triangular cardboard on the ruler, ∠1 = 35°, ∠2 = 69°, then the degree of ∠3 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠2 = ∠1 + ∠3, ∠1 = 35°, ∠2 = 69°, therefore 69° = 35° + ∠3, thus ∠3 = 34°.

question: 如图所示,四边形ABCD中残缺∠C,经测量得∠A=110°,∠D=75°,∠1=45°,则这个四边形残缺前的∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, ∠C is missing. After measuring, ∠A = 110°, ∠D = 75°, ∠1 = 45°, then the degree of ∠C before it was missing is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】As shown in the diagram: Because ∠1 = 45°, therefore ∠ABC = 180° - 45° = 135°. Thus, ∠C = 360° - ∠A - ∠D - ∠ABC = 360° - 110° - 75° - 135° = 40°.

question: 如图,∠AOB=20°,∠AOC=90°,点B、O、D在同一直线上,则∠COD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = 20°, ∠AOC = 90°, points B, O, and D are on the same straight line, then the degree of ∠COD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠AOB = 20°, ∠AOC = 90°, therefore ∠BOC = 90° - 20° = 70°, thus ∠COD = 180° - 70° = 110°.

question: 如图,点E、F分别在AB、CD上,∠B=40°,∠C=60°,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points E and F are on AB and CD respectively, ∠B = 40°, ∠C = 60°, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠B + ∠C + ∠CFE + ∠BEF = 360°, ∠1 + ∠BEF = 180°, ∠2 + ∠CFE = 180°, therefore ∠B + ∠C + ∠CFE + ∠BEF = ∠1 + ∠BEF + ∠2 + ∠CFE, thus ∠1 + ∠2 = ∠B + ∠C = 100°.

question: 将图1中五边形纸片ABCDE的A点以BE为折线向下翻折,点A恰好落在CD上,如图2所示；再分别以图2中的AB,AE为折线,将C,D两点向上翻折,使得A、B、C、D、E五点均在同一平面上,如图3所示．若图1中∠A=122°,则图3中∠CAD的度数为()
question_en: Fold point A of the pentagonal paper piece ABCDE in Figure 1 downward along the fold line BE, so that point A falls exactly on CD, as shown in Figure 2; then fold points C and D upward along the fold lines AB and AE in Figure 2, so that points A, B, C, D, and E are all on the same plane, as shown in Figure 3. If ∠A in Figure 1 is 122°, then the degree of ∠CAD in Figure 3 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: From Figure 2, we know that ∠BAC + ∠EAD = 180° - 122° = 58°, so in Figure 3, ∠CAD = 180° - 58° × 2 = 64°.

question: 如图,在直线l上顺次取A、B、C三点,使得AB=5cm,BC=3cm,如果O是线段AC的中点,那么线段OB长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are taken in sequence on straight line l, such that AB = 5 cm, BC = 3 cm. If O is the midpoint of segment AC, then the length of segment OB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the diagram shown, OB = 5cm - OA. Since OA = (AB + BC) ÷ 2 = 4cm, therefore OB = 1cm.

question: 如图,若∠A=70°,∠B=40°,∠C=32°．则∠BDC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if ∠A = 70°, ∠B = 40°, ∠C = 32°, then ∠BDC = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Connect AD and extend it, ∠BDE = ∠BAD + ∠B, ∠CDE = ∠CAD + ∠C, then ∠BDC = ∠BDE + ∠CDE = ∠BAD + ∠B + ∠CAD + ∠C = ∠BAC + ∠B + ∠C = 142°.

question: 如图在灯塔O处观测到轮船A位于北偏西56°的方向,同时轮船B在南偏东17°的方向,那么∠AOB的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, from the lighthouse O, the ship A is observed to be in the direction of 56° west of north, and at the same time, the ship B is in the direction of 17° east of south, then the size of ∠AOB is ()

question: 如图,已知点C是线段AD的中点,AB=10cm,BD=4cm,则BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point C is the midpoint of line segment AD, AB = 10 cm, BD = 4 cm, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 10cm, BD = 4cm, therefore AD = AB - BD = 10 - 4 = 6(cm). Since point C is the midpoint of AD, therefore CD = 1/2 AD = 3cm, then BC = CD + BD = 7cm.

question: 如图,一个人从A点出发沿北偏东30°方向走到B点,若这个人再从B点沿南偏东15°方向走到C点则∠ABC等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a person starts from point A and walks in the direction of 30° northeast to point B. If this person then walks from point B in the direction of 15° southeast to point C, then ∠ABC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, it is known that ∠ABC = 30° + 15° = 45°.

question: 如图,O是线段AB的中点,C在线段OB上,AC=6,CB=3,则OC的长等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, O is the midpoint of segment AB, C is on segment OB, AC = 6, CB = 3, then the length of OC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AC = 6, CB = 3, therefore AB = 6 + 3 = 9. Since O is the midpoint of line segment AB, therefore AO = 9 ÷ 2 = 4.5, thus OC = AC - AO = 6 - 4.5 = 1.5.

question: 如图,将一根绳子用线段AB表示,现从C处将绳子剪断,剪断后的两段绳子中较长的一段为60cm,若AC=\frac{3}{4}CB,则这条绳子的原长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵剪断后的两段绳子中较长的一段为60cm,AC=\frac{3}{4}CB,可得:CB=60cm,AC=45cm,∴AB=60+45=105cm,
question_en: As shown in the figure, a rope is represented by the line segment AB. Now the rope is cut at point C, and the longer segment of the two resulting pieces is 60 cm. If AC = \(\frac{3}{4}\)CB, then the original length of the rope is ().
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because after cutting, the longer segment of the rope is 60cm, and AC = 3/4 CB, we can get: CB = 60cm, AC = 45cm, therefore AB = 60 + 45 = 105cm.

question: 如图,若CD是△ABC的中线,AB=10,则AD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if CD is the median of △ABC, AB = 10, then AD = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because as shown in the diagram, if CD is the median of △ABC and AB = 10, then AD = BD = 1/2 AB = 5.

question: 如图,点O在直线AB上,OC为射线,∠2比∠1的3倍少20°,则∠1的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point O is on the straight line AB, OC is a ray, ∠2 is 20° less than 3 times ∠1, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, ∠2 = 3∠1 - 20°. Since ∠1 + ∠2 = 180°, therefore ∠1 + 3∠1 - 20° = 180°. Solving this, we get: ∠1 = 50°.

question: 如图所示,要把角钢弯成120°的钢架,则在角钢截取的缺口是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:因为缺口角为120°,在截取之前的角是平角180°,所以缺口角等于180°-120°=60度．
question_en: As shown in the figure, to bend the angle steel into a 120° steel frame, then the notch cut in the angle steel is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because the notch angle is 120°, and the angle before the cut is a straight angle of 180°, therefore the notch angle equals 180° - 120° = 60 degrees.

question: 如图,要修建一条公路,从A村沿北偏东75°方向到B村,从B村沿北偏西25°方向到C村．若要保持公路CE与从A村到B村的方向一致,则应顺时针转动的度数为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由题意可得:AN∥FB,DC∥BE,∴∠NAB=∠FBE=75°,∵∠CBF=25°,∴∠CBE=100°,则应顺时针转动的度数为100°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, to construct a road, it goes from Village A in a direction 75° northeast to Village B, and from Village B in a direction 25° northwest to Village C. If the direction of the road CE is to be consistent with the direction from Village A to Village B, then the degree of clockwise rotation should be ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, AN ∥ FB, DC ∥ BE, therefore ∠NAB = ∠FBE = 75°. Since ∠CBF = 25°, therefore ∠CBE = 100°, then the degree of clockwise rotation should be 100°.

question: 如图,已知点C将线段AB分成1:3的两部分,点D是AB的中点,若CD=2,则线段AB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point C divides the line segment AB into two parts in the ratio 1:3, point D is the midpoint of AB, if CD = 2, then the length of the line segment AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, AC = 1/4 AB, AD = 1/2 AB, and CD = AD - AC. Therefore, CD = 1/2 AB - 1/4 AB = 2. Hence, 1/4 AB = 2, therefore AB = 8.

question: 如图,C是线段AB上的一点,点D是线段BC的中点,若AB=10,AC=6,则AD等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on line segment AB, point D is the midpoint of line segment BC. If AB = 10, AC = 6, then AD is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BC = AB - AC = 4, and point D is the midpoint of segment BC, therefore CD = DB = 1/2 BC = 2, thus AD = AC + CD = 6 + 2 = 8;

question: 如图,C是线段AB上一点,AC=4,BC=6,点M、N分别是线段AC、BC的中点,则MN=()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:(1)由点M、N分别是线段AC、BC的中点,得MC=\frac{1}{2}AC=\frac{1}{2}×4=2,NC=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}×6=3．由线段的和差,得MN=MC+NC=2+3=5；
question_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on line segment AB, AC = 4, BC = 6, points M and N are the midpoints of line segments AC and BC, respectively, then MN = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: (1) Since points M and N are the midpoints of line segments AC and BC respectively, we get MC = 1/2 AC = 1/2 × 4 = 2, NC = 1/2 BC = 1/2 × 6 = 3. By the sum and difference of line segments, we get MN = MC + NC = 2 + 3 = 5;

question: 小明把一副直角三角尺按如图所示的方式摆放在一起,其中∠E=90°,∠C=90°,∠A=45°,∠D=30°,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: Xiaoming placed a set of right-angled triangle rulers together as shown in the figure, where ∠E = 90°, ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 45°, ∠D = 30°, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: As shown in the diagram: Because ∠1 = ∠D + ∠DOA, and ∠2 = ∠E + ∠EPB, and since ∠DOA = ∠COP, and ∠EPB = ∠CPO, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = ∠D + ∠E + ∠COP + ∠CPO = ∠D + ∠E + 180° - ∠C = 30° + 90° + 180° - 90° = 210°.

question: 如图,AB∥DF,AC⊥CE于C,BC与DF交于点E,若∠A=20°,则∠CEF等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ DF, AC ⊥ CE at C, BC intersects DF at point E, if ∠A = 20°, then ∠CEF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AC ⊥ BC at C, therefore △ABC is a right-angled triangle, thus ∠ABC = 180° - ∠A - ∠C = 180° - 20° - 90° = 70°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠1 = 70°. Since AB ∥ DF, therefore ∠1 + ∠CEF = 180°, that is ∠CEF = 180° - ∠1 = 180° - 70° = 110°.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠B=60°,∠A=80°．延长BC至点D,则∠ACD的大小为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由三角形的外角性质可知,∠ACD=∠B+∠A=140°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠B = 60°, ∠A = 80°. Extend BC to point D, then the size of ∠ACD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: By the exterior angle property of a triangle, it is known that ∠ACD = ∠B + ∠A = 140°,

question: 如图,若△ABC≌△DEF,∠A=45°,∠F=35°,则∠E等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if △ABC is congruent to △DEF, ∠A = 45°, ∠F = 35°, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because △ABC is congruent to △DEF, ∠A = 45°, ∠F = 35°, therefore ∠D = ∠A = 45°, thus ∠E = 180° - ∠D - ∠F = 100°.

question: 如图,BP是△ABC中∠ABC的平分线,CP是∠ACB的外角的平分线,如果∠ABP=20°,∠ACP=50°,则∠A=()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵BP是△ABC中∠ABC的平分线,CP是∠ACB的外角的平分线,∵∠ABP=20°,∠ACP=50°,∴∠ABC=2∠ABP=40°,∠ACM=2∠ACP=100°,∴∠A=∠ACM-∠ABC=60°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, BP is the bisector of ∠ABC in △ABC, CP is the bisector of the exterior angle of ∠ACB. If ∠ABP = 20°, ∠ACP = 50°, then ∠A = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BP is the bisector of ∠ABC in △ABC, and CP is the bisector of the exterior angle at ∠ACB, since ∠ABP = 20°, ∠ACP = 50°, therefore ∠ABC = 2∠ABP = 40°, ∠ACM = 2∠ACP = 100°, thus ∠A = ∠ACM - ∠ABC = 60°.

question: 如图,点C是长为10cm的线段AB上一点,D、E分别是AC、CB中点,则DE的长为()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:如图,∵点D、E分别是线段AC、CB的中点,∴DC=\frac{1}{2}AC,CE=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴DE=DC+CE=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=\frac{1}{2}AB．又∵AB=10cm,∴DE=5cm；
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on the line segment AB which is 10 cm long, D and E are the midpoints of AC and CB, respectively, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: As shown in the diagram, because points D and E are the midpoints of line segments AC and CB, respectively, therefore DC = 1/2 AC, CE = 1/2 BC, thus DE = DC + CE = 1/2 (AC + BC) = 1/2 AB. And because AB = 10cm, therefore DE = 5cm;

question: 如图,若∠1=125°,则∠1+∠2+∠M+∠N+∠P+∠Q=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, if ∠1 = 125°, then ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠M + ∠N + ∠P + ∠Q = ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠P + ∠Q = ∠ABP, and ∠M + ∠N = ∠MEA, since the sum of the exterior angles of quadrilateral ABDE is 360°, therefore ∠ABP + ∠2 + ∠1 + ∠MEA = 360°. Thus, ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠M + ∠N + ∠P + ∠Q = ∠ABP + ∠2 + ∠1 + ∠MEA = 360°.

question: 如图,是一块三角形木板的残余部分,量得∠A=110°,∠B=30°,这块三角形木板缺少的角是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:根据三角形的内角和定理第三个角=180°-110°-30°=40°,
question_en: As shown in the figure, this is the remaining part of a triangular wooden board, it is measured that ∠A = 110°, ∠B = 30°, the missing angle of this triangular wooden board is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the triangle angle sum theorem, the third angle = 180° - 110° - 30° = 40°,

question: 如图,C、D是线段AB上的两点,且D是线段AC的中点．若AB=10cm,BC=4cm,则AD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the line segment AB, and D is the midpoint of the line segment AC. If AB = 10 cm, BC = 4 cm, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 10cm, BC = 4cm, therefore AC = 6cm. Since D is the midpoint of segment AC, therefore AD = 3cm.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,∠B=∠D,延长BA至E,连接CE交AD于F,∠EAD和∠ECD的角平分线相交于点P．若∠E=60°,∠APC=70°,则∠D的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AD ∥ BC, ∠B = ∠D, extend BA to E, connect CE and intersect AD at F, the angle bisectors of ∠EAD and ∠ECD intersect at point P. If ∠E = 60°, ∠APC = 70°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, ∠1 = ∠2, ∠3 = ∠4, ∠E = 60°, ∠P = 70°. In triangles △AME and △PMC, by the triangle angle sum theorem, we have: ∠E + ∠1 = ∠P + ∠3, therefore ∠1 - ∠3 = ∠P - ∠E = 70° - 60° = 10° = ∠2 - ∠4. Similarly, ∠P + ∠2 = ∠D + ∠4, therefore ∠2 - ∠4 = ∠D - ∠P = 10°, thus ∠D = 80°.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,以点A为圆心,小于AC长为半径作圆弧,分别交AB、AC于E、F两点；再分别以E、F为圆心,大于\frac{1}{2}EF长为半径作圆弧,两条圆弧交于点G,作射线AG交CD于点H．若∠C=140°,则∠AHC的大小是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由题意可得:AH平分∠CAB,∵AB∥CD,∴∠C+∠CAB=180°,∵∠ACD=140°,∴∠CAB=40°,∵AH平分∠CAB,∴∠HAB=20°,∴∠AHC=20°．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, with point A as the center, an arc is drawn with a radius shorter than the length of AC, intersecting AB and AC at points E and F, respectively; then with E and F as centers, arcs are drawn with a radius greater than half the length of EF, the two arcs intersect at point G, and ray AG intersects CD at point H. If ∠C = 140°, then the size of ∠AHC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the problem, AH bisects ∠CAB. Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠C + ∠CAB = 180°. Since ∠ACD = 140°, therefore ∠CAB = 40°. Because AH bisects ∠CAB, therefore ∠HAB = 20°, thus ∠AHC = 20°.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠A=110°,若图中沿虚线剪去∠A,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 110°, if the figure is cut along the dotted line removing ∠A, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠A = 110°, therefore ∠B + ∠C = 70°. Since ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠B + ∠C = 360°, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 290°.

question: 如图,将纸片△ABC沿着DE折叠,若∠1+∠2=60°,则∠A的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when paper △ABC is folded along DE, if ∠1 + ∠2 = 60°, then the size of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Based on the properties of folding and adjacent supplementary angles, we get ∠1 = 180° - 2∠ADE, ∠2 = 180° - 2∠AED, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 360° - 2(∠ADE + ∠AED). Since ∠1 + ∠2 = 60°, therefore ∠ADE + ∠AED = 150°. Thus, in △ADE, by the interior angle sum theorem, we get ∠A = 180° - (∠ADE + ∠AED) = 30°.

question: 如图所示,已知△ABC中,∠A=80°,若沿图中虚线剪去∠A,则∠1+∠2等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that in △ABC, ∠A = 80°, if ∠A is cut along the dashed line, then ∠1 + ∠2 is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because ∠A = 80°, therefore ∠B + ∠C = 100°. Since ∠1 + ∠2 + ∠B + ∠C = 360°, therefore ∠1 + ∠2 = 260°.

question: 如图,已知BD是△ABC的中线,AB=5,BC=3,且△ABD的周长为11,则△BCD的周长是()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:∵BD是△ABC的中线,∴AD=CD,∵△ABD的周长为11,AB=5,BC=3,∴△BCD的周长是11-(5-3)=9,
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that BD is the median of △ABC, AB = 5, BC = 3, and the perimeter of △ABD is 11, then the perimeter of △BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BD is the median of △ABC, therefore AD = CD. Since the perimeter of △ABD is 11, AB = 5, BC = 3, therefore the perimeter of △BCD is 11 - (5 - 3) = 9.

question: 如图,点O在直线AB上,若∠BOC=60°,则∠AOC的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point O is on the straight line AB, if ∠BOC = 60°, then the size of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because point O is on line AB, therefore ∠AOB = 180°, and since ∠BOC = 60°, therefore ∠AOC = 120°.

question: 如图,C,D是线段AB上两点,CB=3cm,DB=5cm,D是AC的中点,则线段AB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, C and D are two points on the line segment AB, CB = 3 cm, DB = 5 cm, D is the midpoint of AC, then the length of the line segment AB is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because CB = 3cm, DB = 5cm, therefore CD = 5 - 3 = 2cm. Since D is the midpoint of AC, therefore AC = 2CD = 4cm. Thus AB = AC + CB = 4 + 3 = 7cm.

question: 如图,∠BOC=130°,∠ABO=∠CBE,∠ACO=∠BCD,∠CDE=45°,FA⊥BA交BC延长线于F,则∠FAC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠BOC = 130°, ∠ABO = ∠CBE, ∠ACO = ∠BCD, ∠CDE = 45°, FA ⊥ BA intersects the extended line of BC at F, then the degree of ∠FAC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Because ∠BOC = 130°, therefore ∠OBC + ∠OCB = 180° - ∠BOC = 50°. Since ∠CDE = 45°, therefore ∠CBE + ∠BCD = ∠CDE = 45°. Because ∠ABO = ∠CBE and ∠ACO = ∠BCD, therefore ∠ABO + ∠ACO = ∠CBE + ∠BCD = 45°. Thus, ∠ABC + ∠ACB = ∠ABO + ∠OBC + ∠OCB + ∠ACO = 45° + 50° = 95°. Therefore, ∠BAC = 180° - (∠ABC + ∠ACB) = 85°. Since FA ⊥ BA, therefore ∠FAB = 90°. Thus, ∠FAC = ∠FAB - ∠BAC = 5°.

question: 一艘轮船行驶在B处同时测得小岛A,C的方向分别为北偏西30°和西南方向,则∠ABC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ship sailing at point B measures the directions of islands A and C as 30° west of north and southwest, respectively, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: According to the given conditions, we have: ∠ABD = 60°, ∠DBC = 45°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ABD + ∠DBC = 60° + 45° = 105°.

question: 如图,AE是△ABC的中线,已知EC=4,DE=2,则BD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AE is the median of △ABC, it is known that EC = 4, DE = 2, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AE is the median of △ABC, and EC = 4, therefore BE = EC = 4. Since DE = 2, therefore BD = BE - DE = 4 - 2 = 2.

question: 如图,点D是线段AB的中点,C是线段AD的中点,若AB=16cm,则线段CD=cm．()
answer_cot: 【解答】解:由点D是线段AB的中点,得AD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×16=8cm,由C是线段AD的中点,得CD=\frac{1}{2}AD=\frac{1}{2}×8=4cm．
question_en: As shown in the figure, point D is the midpoint of segment AB, C is the midpoint of segment AD, if AB = 16 cm, then the length of segment CD = cm. (8)
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Since point D is the midpoint of segment AB, we get AD = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 16 = 8 cm. Since C is the midpoint of segment AD, we get CD = 1/2 AD = 1/2 × 8 = 4 cm.

question: 如图,线段AB=18cm,BC=6cm,D为BC的中点,则线段AD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line segment AB = 18 cm, BC = 6 cm, D is the midpoint of BC, then the length of line segment AD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because AB = 18cm, BC = 6cm, therefore AC = AB - BC = 12cm. Also, since D is the midpoint of BC, therefore CD = 1/2 BC = 3. Thus AD = AC + CD = 12 + 3 = 15.

question: 如图,点C在线段AB上,点D是AC的中点,如果CD=4,AB=14,那么BC长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is on line segment AB, point D is the midpoint of AC, if CD = 4, AB = 14, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because point D is the midpoint of AC, if CD = 4, then AC = 2CD = 8. Since AB = 14, therefore BC = AB - AC = 6.

question: 如图,点C是线段AB上的点,点D是线段BC的中点,AB=10,AC=6,则线段AD的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on segment AB, point D is the midpoint of segment BC, AB = 10, AC = 6, then the length of segment AD is ()
answer_cot_en: 【Solution】Solution: Because BC = AB - AC = 4, and point D is the midpoint of segment BC, therefore CD = DB = 1/2 BC = 2, thus AD = AC + CD = 6 + 2 = 8.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,若∠BCD=110°,则∠BOD的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,∴∠A=180°-∠BCD=70°,由圆周角定理得,∠BOD=2∠A=140°,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, if ∠BCD = 110°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in circle O, therefore ∠A = 180° - ∠BCD = 70°. By the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠BOD = 2∠A = 140°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,若∠ADC=110°,则∠AOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O. If ∠ADC = 110°, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠B + ∠ADC = 180°, therefore ∠B = 180° - 110° = 70°, thus ∠AOC = 2∠B = 140°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A,B,C,D是圆上的点,∠1=68°,∠A=40°,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, C, and D are points on the circle, ∠1 = 68°, ∠A = 40°, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: ∠B = ∠1 - ∠A = 68° - 40° = 28°, by the Inscribed Angle Theorem, ∠D = ∠B = 28°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,若它的一个外角∠DCE=65°,∠ABC=68°,则∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O. If one of its exterior angles ∠DCE = 65°, ∠ABC = 68°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in circle O, therefore ∠BAD + ∠BCD = 180°. Since ∠BCD + ∠DCE = 180°, therefore ∠A = ∠DCE = 65°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,AB=AD,若∠C=68°,则∠ABD的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,∴∠A=180°-∠C=112°,∵AB=AD,∴∠ABD=∠ADB,∴∠ABD=\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠A)=34°,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, AB = AD, if ∠C = 68°, then the degree of ∠ABD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in circle O, therefore ∠A = 180° - ∠C = 112°. Since AB = AD, therefore ∠ABD = ∠ADB, thus ∠ABD = 1/2(180° - ∠A) = 34°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 2018年4月12日上午,中央军委在南海海域隆重举行海上阅兵,展示人民海军崭新面貌,激发强国强军坚定信念．如图,一艘补给舰位于一艘综合登陆舰P的北偏东60°方向,与综合登陆舰P的距离为40海里的A处,补给舰沿正南方向航行一段时间后,到达位于综合登陆舰P的南偏东30°方向上的B处,则此时补给舰所在位置B处与综合登陆舰P之间的距离为()
answer_cot: 如图:过点P作PC⊥AB于点C,根据题意,正南方向与正北方向平行得∠A=60°,∠B=30°,又AP=40,在Rt△APC中,PC=AP•sin∠A=40×r\inV^{x}\\(\varphi)∥|e|=20√{3}在Rt△BPC中,PB=2PC=40√{3}．所以此时补给舰所在位置B处与综合登陆舰P之间的距离为40√{3}海里．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, on the morning of April 12, 2018, the Central Military Commission solemnly held a naval parade in the South China Sea, demonstrating the brand-new appearance of the People's Navy and inspiring firm beliefs in a strong country and military. In the figure, a supply ship is located at point A, 40 nautical miles away from a comprehensive landing ship P, in the direction of 60° north by east from the comprehensive landing ship P. After sailing southward for a period of time, the supply ship arrives at point B, which is in the direction of 30° south by east from the comprehensive landing ship P. The distance between the supply ship at position B and the comprehensive landing ship P is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram: Through point P, construct PC ⊥ AB at point C. According to the problem, the south direction is parallel to the north direction, so ∠A = 60°, ∠B = 30°. Also, AP = 40. In right triangle △APC, PC = AP • sin∠A = 40 × sin60° = 40 × √3/2 = 20√3. In right triangle △BPC, PB = 2PC = 40√3. Therefore, at this moment, the distance between the supply ship at position B and the amphibious assault ship P is 40√3 nautical miles. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,某轮船由东向西航行,在A处测得灯塔M在它的北偏西75°方向上,继续航行8海里到达B处,此时测得灯塔M在它的北偏西60°方向上,则BM=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ship sails from east to west. At point A, it is measured that lighthouse M is in the 75° direction northwest of it. After continuing to sail for 8 nautical miles to point B, it is measured that lighthouse M is in the 60° direction northwest of it, then BM = ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, ∠BAM = 90° - 75° = 15°, therefore ∠M = 180° - 90° - 60° - 15° = 15°, thus ∠BAM = ∠M, therefore BM = AB = 8 (nautical miles). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图4,从海岛B分别同时沿北偏西20°方向,北偏东40°驶出甲、乙两艘货船,若两艘货船的速度均为20海里/时,两小时后,两艘货船A、C之间的距离为()
answer_cot: 连接AC,由题意得,BA=BC=20×2=40(海里),∠CBA=60°,∴△ABC为等边三角形,∴AC=AB=40(海里),故选:B．
question_en: As shown in Figure 4, from island B, two cargo ships A and B set out simultaneously in the direction of 20° west of north and 40° east of north, respectively. If the speed of both cargo ships is 20 nautical miles per hour, after two hours, the distance between the two cargo ships A and C is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AC, according to the problem, BA = BC = 20 × 2 = 40 (nautical miles), ∠CBA = 60°, therefore △ABC is an equilateral triangle, thus AC = AB = 40 (nautical miles). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C,D是圆上两点,若∠AOC=126°,则∠CDB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are two points on the circle. If ∠AOC = 126°, then ∠CDB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOC = 126°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - ∠AOC = 54°. Since ∠CDB = 1/2 ∠BOC = 27°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C,D为⊙O上的两点,且C为⌒{AD}的中点,若∠BAD=20°,则∠ACO的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C and D are two points on ⊙O, and C is the midpoint of arc {AD}. If ∠BAD = 20°, then the degree of ∠ACO is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, and C is the midpoint of arc AD, therefore OC ⊥ AD. Since ∠BAD = 20°, therefore ∠AOC = 90° - ∠BAD = 70°. Since OA = OC, therefore ∠ACO = ∠CAO = (180° - ∠AOC) / 2 = (180° - 70°) / 2 = 55°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知点A、B、C、D都在⊙O上,且∠BOD=110°,则∠BCD为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that points A, B, C, and D are all on ⊙O, and ∠BOD = 110°, then ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A = 1/2 ∠BOD = 1/2 × 110° = 55°, and ∠A + ∠BCD = 180°, therefore ∠BCD = 180° - 55° = 125°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,BC是半圆O的直径,D,E是\hat{BC}上两点,连接BD,CE并延长交于点A,连接OD,OE,如果∠DOE=40°,那么∠A的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BC is the diameter of semicircle O, D and E are two points on the arc BC. Connect BD and CE and extend them to intersect at point A. Connect OD and OE. If ∠DOE = 40°, then the degree of ∠A is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DOE = 40°, therefore ∠BOD + ∠COE = 180° - ∠DOE = 140°. Since OD = OB and OE = OC, therefore ∠B = ∠BDO, ∠C = ∠OEC. Thus ∠B + ∠C + ∠BDO + ∠OEC = 180° - ∠BOD + 180° - ∠EOC. Therefore, ∠B + ∠C = (1/2)(360° - 140°) = 110°. Therefore, ∠A = 180° - (∠B + ∠C) = 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB于点H,若∠AOC=60°,OH=1,则弦AB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB at point H. If ∠AOC = 60°, OH = 1, then the length of chord AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because OC is perpendicular to AB at H, therefore AH = BH. In right triangle AOH, ∠AOC = 60°. Since OH = 1, therefore AH = √3 OH = √3. Thus, AB = 2AH = 2√3. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C、D在⊙O上．若∠ACD=25°,则∠BOD的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, points C and D are on ⊙O. If ∠ACD = 25°, then the degree of ∠BOD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠AOD = 2∠ACD, and ∠ACD = 25°, therefore ∠AOD = 50°, thus ∠BOD = 180° - ∠AOD = 180° - 50° = 130°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O直径,已知圆周角∠BCD=30°,则∠ABD为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, it is known that the circumferential angle ∠BCD = 30°, then ∠ABD is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AD. Because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ADB = 90°. Also, since ∠DAB = ∠BCD = 30°, therefore ∠ABD = 90° - ∠DAB = 90° - 30° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,A,B,C是⊙O上的三点,∠BAC=55°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, and C are three points on ⊙O, ∠BAC = 55°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠BAC = 55°, therefore ∠BOC = 2∠BAC = 110°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA,PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点．直线EF切⊙O于C点,分别交PA、PB于E、F,且PA=10．则△PEF的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于点A、B,⊙O的切线EF分别交PA、PB于点E、F,切点C在弧AB上,∴AE=CE,FB=CF,PA=PB=4,∴△PEF的周长=PE+EF+PF=PA+PB=20．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B, respectively. Line EF is tangent to ⊙O at point C, and intersects PA and PB at E and F, respectively, and PA = 10. Then the perimeter of △PEF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangent to circle O at points A and B, respectively, and the tangent line EF of circle O intersects PA and PB at points E and F, with the point of tangency C on arc AB, therefore AE = CE, FB = CF, PA = PB = 4, thus the perimeter of △PEF = PE + EF + PF = PA + PB = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB为⊙O直径,AD,BC,CD分别切⊙O于点A,B,E．若AD=1,BC=4,则AB的值为()
answer_cot: ∵AB为⊙O直径,AD,BC,CD分别切⊙O于点A,B,E,∴∠DAB=∠ABC=90°,AD=DE,CE=BC,∴CD=AD+BC=5,过D作DH⊥BC于H,则四边形ABHD是矩形,∴BH=AD=1,DH=AB,∴CH=3,∴DH=√{CD^{2}-CH^{2}}=√{5^{2}-3^{2}}=4,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AD, BC, and CD are tangents to ⊙O at points A, B, and E respectively. If AD = 1, BC = 4, then the value of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, and AD, BC, and CE are tangents to circle O at points A, B, and E respectively, therefore ∠DAB = ∠ABC = 90°, AD = DE, CE = BC. Thus, CD = AD + BC = 5. Construct DH ⊥ BC at point H, then quadrilateral ABHD is a rectangle, therefore BH = AD = 1, DH = AB. Hence, CH = 3, and DH = √{CD² - CH²} = √{5² - 3²} = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点P为O外一点,PA为⊙O的切线,A为切点,PO交⊙O于点B．若∠P=30°,OB=3,则线段AP的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a point outside of ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, A is the tangent point, PO intersects ⊙O at point B. If ∠P = 30°, OB = 3, then the length of the line segment AP is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA, because PA is the tangent to circle O, therefore ∠OAP = 90°. Since ∠P = 30° and OB = 3, therefore AO = 3, then OP = 6, AP = (√OP² - OA²) = √(6² - 3²) = 3√3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点,C是⊙O上一点,且C点在AB所在直线的右侧,若∠P=36°,则∠ACB=()
answer_cot: 连接OA、OB,∵PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=180°-36°=144°,∴∠ACB=p<(≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{f})<(√{2})c⊥|➝{ZX}|^{c}∠AOB=p<(≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{f})<(√{2})c⊥|➝{ZX}|^{c}×144°=72°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B respectively, C is a point on ⊙O, and point C is on the right side of the straight line where AB is located, if ∠P = 36°, then ∠ACB = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OA and OB. Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B respectively, therefore OA ⊥ PA, OB ⊥ PB, therefore ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°. Thus ∠AOB = 180° - ∠P = 180° - 36° = 144°. Therefore, ∠ACB = 1/2 × ∠AOB = 1/2 × 144° = 72°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图是一斜坡的横截面,某人沿斜坡从M出发,走了13米到达N处,此时在铅垂方向上上升了5米,那么该斜坡的坡度是()
answer_cot: 过点N作HG⊥地面AB于G再做MH⊥NG于H,由题意得,MN=13,NH=5,由勾股定理得,MH=√{MN^{2}-NH^{2}}=√{13^{2}-5^{2}}=12,∴该斜坡的坡度为5:12,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a person starts from M along the slope and walks 13 meters to reach N. At this point, the person has risen 5 meters in the vertical direction, then the gradient of the slope is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct HG ⊥ ground AB at G, and construct MH ⊥ NG at H. According to the problem, MN = 13, NH = 5. By the Pythagorean theorem, MH = √{MN² - NH²} = √{13² - 5²} = 12. Therefore, the slope of the incline is 5:12. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,一辆小车沿斜坡向上行驶13米,斜坡的坡度是1:2.4,则小车上升的高度是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a car travels up a slope for 13 meters, the gradient of the slope is 1:2.4, then the height the car ascends is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct BC ⊥ AC. In right triangle ABC, because AB = 13m, and the ratio BC:AC = 1:2.4 = 5:12, we can assume: BC = 5k, AC = 12k. Since AB² = BC² + AC², therefore 13² = (5k)² + (12k)², thus k = 1, therefore BC = 5m. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在平地上种植树木时,要求株距(相邻两树间的水平距离)为4m．如果在坡度为1:2的山坡上种树,也要求株距为4m,那么相邻两树间的坡面距离为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, when planting trees on flat ground, the spacing (the horizontal distance between two adjacent trees) is required to be 4 m. If trees are planted on a slope with a gradient of 1:2 and the spacing is also required to be 4 m, then the distance along the slope between two adjacent trees is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because the slope of AB is 1:2, therefore AC/BC = 1/2, that is, AC/4 = 1/2. Solving this, we get AC = 2. By the Pythagorean theorem, AB = √(BC² + AC²) = √(4² + 2²) = 2√5 (m). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,一辆小车沿倾斜角为α的斜坡向上行驶13米,已知sinα=\frac{5}{13},则小车上升的高度是()
answer_cot: 如图AC=13,作CB⊥AB,∵sinα=\frac{z_{6}}{A}=√{|➝{JL}|^{2}-|➝{JL}|^{2}}=\frac{5}{13},∴BC=5,∴小车上升的高度是5m．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a car travels up a slope with an incline angle of α for 13 meters, it is known that sinα = \(\frac{5}{13}\), then the height the car ascends is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, AC = 13, construct CB ⊥ AB. Because sinα = \(\frac{z_{6}}{A}\) = √{|\(\overrightarrow{JL}\)|² - |\(\overrightarrow{JL}\)|²} = \(\frac{5}{13}\), therefore BC = 5, thus the height the car ascends is 5m. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,两条直线被三条平行线所截,若AC=4,CE=6,BD=3,则BF=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, two straight lines are intersected by three parallel lines. If AC = 4, CE = 6, BD = 3, then BF = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore AC/CE = BD/DF, that is, 4/6 = 3/DF. Solving this, we get DF = 9/2, therefore BF = BD + DF = 15/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图:已知AD∥BE∥CF,且AB=4,BC=5,EF=4,则DE=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, and AB = 4, BC = 5, EF = 4, then DE = ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, therefore AB/BC = DE/EF, that is, 4/5 = DE/4. Solving this, DE = 3.2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC上,且DE∥BC,AD=1,AB=3,那么\frac{AE}{EC}的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on AB and AC respectively, and DE ∥ BC, AD = 1, AB = 3, then the value of \(\frac{AE}{EC}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: DB = AB - AD = 2, because DE ∥ BC, therefore AE/EC = AD/DB = 1/2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知AB∥CD∥EF,AC=4,CE=1,BD=3,则DF的值()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, AC = 4, CE = 1, BD = 3, then the value of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD ∥ EF, therefore AC/CE = BD/DF, which means 4/1 = 3/DF. Solving this, we get DF = 3/4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=3．BC=5,DF=12,则DE的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m and n intersect these three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If AB = 3, BC = 5, DF = 12, then the value of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DF = 12, therefore EF = 12 - DE. Since a ∥ b ∥ c, therefore AB / BC = DE / EF, that is: 3/5 = DE / (12 - DE), solving this gives: DE = 9/2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与a、b、c分别交于点A、C、E、B、D、F,若AC=8,CE=12,BD=6,则BF的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that line a ∥ b ∥ c, lines m and n intersect a, b, and c at points A, C, E, B, D, F, respectively. If AC = 8, CE = 12, BD = 6, then the value of BF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because a ∥ b ∥ c, AC = 8, CE = 12, BD = 6, therefore AC / AE = BD / BF, that is 8 / 20 = 6 / BF, solving this gives BF = 15. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图是某货站传送货物的机器的侧面示意图．AD⊥DB,原传送带AB与地面DB的夹角为30°,为了缩短货物传送距离,工人师傅欲增大传送带与地面的夹角,使其由30°改为45°,原传送带AB长为8m．则新传送带AC的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, this is a side schematic diagram of a machine for conveying goods at a freight station. AD ⊥ DB, the original conveyor belt AB forms an angle of 30° with the ground DB. In order to shorten the distance of goods transportation, the worker master wishes to increase the angle between the conveyor belt and the ground from 30° to 45°. The original conveyor belt AB is 8 m long. Then the length of the new conveyor belt AC is ()
answer_cot_en: In right triangle △ABD, AD = AB•sin30° = 8×\frac{1}{2} = 4 (meters). In right triangle △ACD, because ∠ACD = 45°, therefore AC = √{2}AD = 4√{2}m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图①为我们常见的马扎,图②是马扎撑开后的侧面示意图,其中腿AB和CD的长度相等,O是它们的中点,为使马扎既舒适又牢固,匠工师傅将撑开后的马扎高度设计为32cm,∠DOB=100°,那么腿AB的长度大约为(结果精确到0.1cm,参考数据:sin50°=cos40°≈0.77,sin40°=cos50°≈0.64,tan40°≈0.84,tan50°≈1.19)()
answer_cot: 连接BD,作OH⊥BD于H,∵AB=CD,O是AB、CD的中点,∴OB=OD,∴∠BOH=50°,BH=\frac{1}{2}BD=16,在Rt△BOD中,sin∠BOH=\frac{BH}{OB},∴OB=\frac{BH}{sin∠BOD}≈\frac{16}{0.77}≈20.78,∴AB=2OB=41.56≈41.6(cm),故选:C．
question_en: As shown in Figure 1, it is a common stool, and Figure 2 is a side view of the stool when it is spread out, where the lengths of legs AB and CD are equal, O is their midpoint. To make the stool both comfortable and sturdy, the craftsman designed the height of the stool to be 32 cm after it is spread out, ∠DOB = 100°, then the approximate length of leg AB is (the result is accurate to 0.1 cm, reference data: sin50° = cos40° ≈ 0.77, sin40° = cos50° ≈ 0.64, tan40° ≈ 0.84, tan50° ≈ 1.19) ().
answer_cot_en: Connect BD and construct OH ⊥ BD at H. Because AB = CD and O is the midpoint of AB and CD, therefore OB = OD, thus ∠BOH = 50°. Since BH = 1/2 BD = 16, in right triangle △BOD, sin∠BOH = BH/OB. Therefore, OB = BH/sin∠BOD ≈ 16/0.77 ≈ 20.78, thus AB = 2OB = 41.56 ≈ 41.6 (cm). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 为出行方便,近日来越来越多的重庆市民使用起了共享单车,图1为单车实物图,图2为单车示意图,AB与地面平行,点A、B、D共线,点D、F、G共线,坐垫C可沿射线BE方向调节．已知,∠ABE=70°,∠EAB=45°,车轮半径为30cm,BE=40cm．小明体验后觉得当坐垫C离地面高度为0.9m时骑着比较舒适,此时CE的长约为()(结果精确到1cm,参考数据:sin70°≈0.94,cos70°≈0.34,tan70°≈1.41)
answer_cot: 过点C作CN⊥AB,交AB于M,交地面于N由题意可知MN=30cm,当CN=0.9m,即CN=90cm时,CM=60cm∴在Rt△BCM中,∠ABE=70°,∴sin∠ABE=sin70°=(-\lambda)(x_{3})^{′}∥|\hat{x}|=0.94∴BC≈64cm∴CE=BC-BE=64-40=24(cm)故选:B．
question_en: For the convenience of travel, more and more citizens of Chongqing have recently started using shared bicycles. Figure 1 is a photo of the actual bicycle, and Figure 2 is a schematic diagram of the bicycle. AB is parallel to the ground, points A, B, and D are collinear, points D, F, and G are collinear, and the seat C can be adjusted along the direction of ray BE. It is known that ∠ABE = 70°, ∠EAB = 45°, the radius of the wheel is 30 cm, BE = 40 cm. After trying it out, Xiao Ming feels that it is more comfortable to ride when the height of the seat C from the ground is 0.9 m, at this time the length of CE is approximately () (The result is accurate to 1 cm, reference data: sin70° ≈ 0.94, cos70° ≈ 0.34, tan70° ≈ 1.41)
answer_cot_en: Construct CN ⊥ AB at point C, intersecting AB at M and the ground at N. According to the problem, MN = 30cm. When CN = 0.9m, that is CN = 90cm, then CM = 60cm. Therefore, in right triangle △BCM, ∠ABE = 70°, thus sin∠ABE = sin70° = (-λ)(x_{3})′ ∥ |\hat{x}| = 0.94. Therefore, BC ≈ 64cm. Hence, CE = BC - BE = 64 - 40 = 24(cm). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC=10,BC=12,则sinB等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC = 10, BC = 12, then sinB is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Construct AD ⊥ BC at D, as shown in the diagram: Because AB = AC and AD ⊥ BC, therefore BD = 1/2 BC = 6, therefore AD = √{AB^2 - BD^2} = √{10^2 - 6^2} = 8, therefore sinB = AD / AB = 8 / 10 = 4 / 5; Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,AB为直径,CD为弦,连接AD,若∠ADC=55°,则∠CAB的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, AB is the diameter, CD is a chord, connect AD, if ∠ADC = 55°, then the degree of ∠CAB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ACB = 90°. Since ∠B = ∠ADC = 55°, therefore ∠CAB = 90° - ∠B = 90° - 55° = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,D是等腰△ABC外接圆弧AC上的点,AB=AC且∠CAB=56°,则∠ADC的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵AB=AC,∴∠ABC=∠ACB,∵∠CAB=56°,∴∠ABC=\frac{180^{°}-56^{°}}{2}=62°,∵D是等腰△ABC外接圆弧AC上的点,∴∠ABC+∠ADC=180°,∴∠ADC=118°,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, D is a point on the arc AC of the circumcircle of isosceles △ABC, AB = AC and ∠CAB = 56°, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB. Since ∠CAB = 56°, therefore ∠ABC = (180° - 56°) / 2 = 62°. Since D is a point on the circumferential arc AC of the isosceles triangle ABC, therefore ∠ABC + ∠ADC = 180°, thus ∠ADC = 118°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,∠BAC=30°,BC=8,则⊙O半径为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, ∠BAC = 30°, BC = 8, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OB and OC. Because ∠BAC = 30°, therefore ∠BOC = 60°. Since OB = OC and BC = 8, therefore △OBC is an equilateral triangle, thus OB = BC = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,AD是⊙O的直径,∠ABC=45°,则∠CAD=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O, AD is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠ABC = 45°, then ∠CAD = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect CD, because AD is the diameter of circle O, therefore ∠ACD = 90°. Since ∠ADC = ∠ABC = 45°, therefore ∠CAD = 90° - ∠ADC = 45°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC内接于圆,D是BC上一点,将∠B沿AD翻折,B点正好落在圆点E处,若∠C=50°,则∠BAE的度数是()
answer_cot: 连接BE,如图所示:由折叠的性质可得:AB=AE,∴⌒{AB}=\hat{AE},∴∠ABE=∠AEB=∠C=50°,∴∠BAE=180°-50°-50°=80°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in the circle, D is a point on BC, folding ∠B along AD, point B exactly lands on the circular point E, if ∠C = 50°, then the degree of ∠BAE is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BE, as shown in the diagram: By the property of folding, we can deduce that AB = AE, therefore arc AB = arc AE, therefore ∠ABE = ∠AEB = ∠C = 50°, thus ∠BAE = 180° - 50° - 50° = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC的顶点都在⊙O上,已知∠BOC=120°,则∠BAC等于()
answer_cot: 如图,在优弧BC上取一点D,连接BD,CD,∵∠BOC=120°,∴∠D=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC=60^°,∴∠BAC=180°-∠D=120°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the vertices of △ABC are all on ⊙O, it is known that ∠BOC = 120°, then ∠BAC is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, take a point D on the major arc BC, connect BD and CD. Because ∠BOC = 120°, therefore ∠D = 1/2 ∠BOC = 60°, thus ∠BAC = 180° - ∠D = 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为5,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,连接OB、OC．若∠BAC与∠BOC互补,则弦BC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O, connect OB and OC. If ∠BAC and ∠BOC are complementary, then the length of chord BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct OH ⊥ BC at H. Because ∠BOC = 2∠BAC, and ∠BOC + ∠BAC = 180°, therefore ∠BOC = 120°. Since OH ⊥ BC and OB = OC, therefore BH = HC, ∠BOH = ∠HOC = 60°. In right triangle △BOH, BH = OB•sin60° = 5×(√3/2) = (5√3)/2, therefore BC = 2BH = 5√3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,⊙O的半径为5,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,过点C作CD垂直AB于点D．若CD=3,AC=6,则BC长为()
answer_cot: 连接OC,OB,∵CD垂直AB,∴∠ADC=90°,∵CD=3,AC=6,∴CD=\frac{1}{2}AC,∴∠A=30°,∴∠O=60°,∵OC=OB,∴△OBC是等边三角形,∴BC=OB,∵⊙O的半径为5,∴BC=5,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is 5, △ABC is an inscribed triangle of ⊙O, and CD is drawn perpendicular to AB at point D. If CD = 3, AC = 6, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect OC and OB. Because CD is perpendicular to AB, therefore ∠ADC = 90°. Since CD = 3 and AC = 6, therefore CD = 1/2 AC, thus ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠O = 60°. Since OC = OB, therefore △OBC is an equilateral triangle, thus BC = OB. Given that the radius of circle O is 5, therefore BC = 5. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的内切圆,切AB,AC于点D、E,∠DOE=110°,则∠BOC的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ⊙O is the inscribed circle of △ABC, tangent to AB and AC at points D and E, ∠DOE = 110°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ⊙O is the inscribed circle of △ABC, tangent to AB and AC at points D and E, therefore AD ⊥ OD, AC ⊥ OE, thus ∠ADO = ∠AEO = 90°. Since ∠DOE = 110°, therefore ∠A = 360° - 2×90° - 110° = 70°. Thus ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 180° - 70° = 110°. Since O is the incenter of △ABC, therefore ∠OBC = 1/2 ∠ABC, ∠OCB = 1/2 ∠ACB, thus ∠OBC + ∠OCB = 55°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - 55° = 125°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点I是△ABC的内心,∠BIC=130°,则∠BAC=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point I is the incenter of △ABC, ∠BIC = 130°, then ∠BAC = ()
answer_cot_en: Because point I is the incenter of △ABC, therefore ∠ABC = 2∠IBC, ∠ACB = 2∠ICB. Since ∠BIC = 130°, therefore ∠IBC + ∠ICB = 180° - ∠BIC = 50°, thus ∠ABC + ∠ACB = 2×50° = 100°, therefore ∠BAC = 180° - (∠ACB + ∠ABC) = 80°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,点O是△ABC的内心,若∠A=70°,则∠BOC的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point O is the incenter of △ABC, if ∠A = 70°, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because O is the incenter of △ABC, therefore OB bisects ∠ABC, OC bisects ∠ACB, therefore ∠OBC = 1/2 ∠ABC, ∠OCB = 1/2 ∠ACB, thus ∠OBC + ∠OCB = 1/2 (∠ABC + ∠ACB) = 1/2 (180° - ∠A) = 1/2 (180° - 70°) = 55°, therefore ∠BOC = 180° - (∠OBC + ∠OCB) = 180° - 55° = 125°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 顶角为36°的等腰三角形我们把这种三角形称为"黄金三角形",它的底与腰的比值为\frac{√{5}-1}{2}．如图,在△ABC中,∠A=36°,AB=AC,BD平分∠ABC交AC于点D,若CD=1,则AC的长为()
answer_cot: ∵在△ABC中,∠A=36°,AB=AC,∴∠ABC=∠ACB=72°,∵BD平分∠ABC,∴∠DBC=∠ABD=36°,∴AD=BD,∴∠BDC=72°,∴BD=BC,∴△ABC和△BDC都是顶角为36°的等腰三角形．∵顶角为36°的等腰三角形为"黄金三角形",它的底与腰的比值为\frac{√{5}-1}{2},∴\frac{DC}{BC}=\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{√{5}-1}{2}即\frac{1}{BC}=\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{√{5}-1}{2}∴BC=\frac{√{5}+1}{2},AC=\frac{√{5}+3}{2}．故选:D．
question_en: An isosceles triangle with a vertex angle of 36° is called a "golden triangle," and the ratio of its base to its legs is \(\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2}\). As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 36°, AB = AC, BD bisects ∠ABC and intersects AC at point D. If CD = 1, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, ∠A = 36°, and AB = AC, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 72°. Since BD bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠DBC = ∠ABD = 36°, thus AD = BD, therefore ∠BDC = 72°, thus BD = BC, therefore △ABC and △BDC are both isosceles triangles with a vertex angle of 36°. Since an isosceles triangle with a vertex angle of 36° is known as a "golden triangle," where the ratio of the base to the legs is (sqrt(5) - 1)/2, therefore DC/BC = BC/AC = (sqrt(5) - 1)/2, which implies 1/BC = BC/AC = (sqrt(5) - 1)/2, thus BC = (sqrt(5) + 1)/2, AC = (sqrt(5) + 3)/2. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知线段AB,过点B作AB的垂线,并在垂线上取BC=\frac{1}{2}AB；连接AC,以点C为圆心,CB为半径画弧,交AC于点D；再以点A为圆心,AD为半径画弧,交AB于点P,则\frac{AP}{AB}的值是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, given the line segment AB, draw a perpendicular line to AB at point B, and take BC = \(\frac{1}{2}\)AB on the perpendicular line; connect AC, with point C as the center and CB as the radius, draw an arc intersecting AC at point D; then with point A as the center and AD as the radius, draw an arc intersecting AB at point P, then the value of \(\frac{AP}{AB}\) is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BC ⊥ AB, therefore ∠ABC = 90°. Let AB = 2a, BC = a, then AC = √5a. Since CD = BC = a, therefore AD = AC - CD = (√5 - 1)a. Since AP = AD, therefore AP = (√5 - 1)a, thus AP/AB = (√5 - 1)/2. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,BC=3,AC=4,则sinA的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, BC = 3, AC = 4, then the value of sinA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in right triangle △ABC, ∠C = 90°, BC = 3, AC = 4, therefore AB = √{3^2 + 4^2} = 5, therefore sinA = BC / AB = 3/5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC与△DEF是位似图形,相似比为2:3,已知AB=3,则DE的长为()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC与△DEF是位似图形,相似比为2:3,∴△ABC∽△DEF,∴\frac{AB}{DE}=\frac{2}{3},即\frac{3}{DE}=\frac{2}{3},解得,DE=\frac{9}{2},故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC and △DEF are similar figures with a similarity ratio of 2:3, given that AB = 3, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC and △DEF are similar figures with a similarity ratio of 2:3, therefore △ABC ∼ △DEF, thus \(\frac{AB}{DE} = \frac{2}{3}\), which means \(\frac{3}{DE} = \frac{2}{3}\). Solving this, we get DE = \(\frac{9}{2}\). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD和四边形A′B′C′D′是以点O为位似中心的位似图形,若OA:OA′=2:3,四边形ABCD的面积等于4,则四边形A′B′C′D′的面积为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD和四边形A′B′C′D′是以点O为位似中心的位似图形,∴AD:A′D′=OA:OA′=2:3,∴四边形ABCD的面积:四边形A′B′C′D′的面积=4:9,而四边形ABCD的面积等于4,∴四边形A′B′C′D′的面积为9．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD and quadrilateral A′B′C′D′ are similar figures with point O as the center of similarity. If OA:OA′ = 2:3 and the area of quadrilateral ABCD is equal to 4, then the area of quadrilateral A′B′C′D′ is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD and quadrilateral A'B'C'D' are similar figures with point O as the center of similitude, therefore AD:A'D' = OA:OA' = 2:3. Thus, the area of quadrilateral ABCD: the area of quadrilateral A'B'C'D' = 4:9, and since the area of quadrilateral ABCD is equal to 4, therefore the area of quadrilateral A'B'C'D' is 9. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,△ABC和△AʹBʹCʹ位似,位似中心为点O,点A(-1,2)、点A′(2,-4),若△ABC的面积为4,则△AʹBʹCʹ的面积是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC and △A'B'C' are similar, with the center of similarity at point O. Point A(-1,2), point A'(2,-4), if the area of △ABC is 4, then the area of △A'B'C' is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point A(-1,2) and point A′(2,-4), therefore OA = √{(-1)^2 + 2^2} = √{5}, OA′ = √{2^2 + (-4)^2} = 2√{5}. Since △ABC and △A′B′C′ are similar, therefore the ratio of the areas S_{△ABC} to S_{△A′B′C′} = (OA/OA′)^2 = 1/4. Since the area of △ABC is 4, therefore the area of △A′B′C′ = 16. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在平面直角坐标系中,已知点A(4,2),过点A作AB⊥x轴,垂足为点B,将△AOB以坐标原点O为位似中心缩小为原图形的\frac{1}{2},得到△COD,则OC的长度是()
answer_cot: ∵点A(4,2),过点A作AB⊥x轴于点B．将△AOB以坐标原点O为位似中心缩小为原图形的 rac{1}{2},得到△COD,∴C(2,1),则OC的长度=√{2^{2}+1^{2}}=√{5}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the Cartesian coordinate system, it is known that point A(4,2), draw AB ⊥ x-axis with the foot of the perpendicular at point B, reduce △AOB with the coordinate origin O as the center of similarity to half of the original figure to get △COD, then the length of OC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point A(4,2), and line AB is perpendicular to the x-axis at point B. If △AOB is reduced by a factor of 1/2 with the origin O as the center of dilation, we get △COD, therefore C(2,1), and the length of OC = √(2^2 + 1^2) = √5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,是用一把直尺、含60°角的直角三角板和光盘摆放而成,点A为60°角与直尺交点,点B为光盘与直尺唯一交点,若AB=3,则光盘的直径是()
answer_cot: 设三角板与圆的切点为C,连接OA、OB,由切线长定理知AB=AC=3,OA平分∠BAC,∴∠OAB=60°,在Rt△ABO中,OB=ABtan∠OAB=3√{3},∴光盘的直径为6\frac{|\infty(\infty)}{\frac{1}{4}}(\frac{w}{A}),故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is arranged with a ruler, a right-angled triangle with a 60° angle, and a CD. Point A is the intersection of the 60° angle and the ruler, point B is the only intersection of the CD and the ruler. If AB = 3, then the diameter of the CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the point of tangency of the triangle board and the circle be C, connect OA and OB. By the tangent-secant theorem, we know AB = AC = 3, OA bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠OAB = 60°. In right triangle △ABO, OB = ABtan∠OAB = 3√{3}, thus the diameter of the disc is 6√{3}. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,PA、PB切⊙O于点A、B,PA=10,CD切⊙O于点E,交PA、PB于C、D两点,则△PCD的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵PA、PB切⊙O于点A、B,CD切⊙O于点E,∴PA=PB=10,CA=CE,DE=DB,∴△PCD的周长是PC+CD+PD=PC+AC+DB+PD=PA+PB=10+10=20．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangents to ⊙O at points A and B, PA = 10, CD is a tangent to ⊙O at point E, and intersects PA and PB at points C and D, then the perimeter of △PCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because PA and PB are tangents to circle O at points A and B, and CD is a tangent to circle O at point E, therefore PA = PB = 10, CA = CE, DE = DB, thus the perimeter of △PCD is PC + CD + PD = PC + AC + DB + PD = PA + PB = 10 + 10 = 20. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB、AC、BD是⊙O的切线,切点分别是P、C、D．若AB=5,AC=3,则BD的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB, AC, and BD are the tangents of ⊙O, with the tangent points being P, C, and D respectively. If AB = 5, AC = 3, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AC and AP are tangents to circle O, therefore AC = AP = 3. Since BP and BD are tangents to circle O, therefore BP = BD. Thus, BD = PB = AB - AP = 5 - 3 = 2. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,一把直尺,60°的直角三角板和光盘如图摆放,A为60°角与直尺交点,AB=3,则光盘的直径是()
answer_cot: 设三角板与圆的切点为C,连接OA、OB,由切线长定理知AB=AC=3,OA平分∠BAC,∴∠OAB=60°,在Rt△ABO中,OB=ABtan∠OAB=3\frac{|\infty(\infty)}{\frac{1}{4}}(\frac{w}{A}),∴光盘的直径为6\frac{|\infty(\infty)}{\frac{1}{4}}(\frac{w}{A}),故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ruler, a 60° set square, and a CD are placed as shown. A is the intersection point of the 60° angle and the ruler, AB = 3, then the diameter of the CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Let the point of tangency of the triangle board and the circle be C, connect OA and OB. By the tangent-secant theorem, AB = AC = 3, OA bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠OAB = 60°. In right triangle △ABO, OB = ABtan∠OAB = 3tan60° = 3√3. Therefore, the diameter of the disc is 6√3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 一条排水管的截面如图所示,已知排水管的截面圆的半径OB=10dm,水面宽AB是16dm,则截面水深CD是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the cross-section of a drainage pipe is shown. It is known that the radius OB of the cross-sectional circle of the drainage pipe is 10 dm, the width AB of the water surface is 16 dm, then the water depth CD is ()
answer_cot_en: From the problem, we know OD ⊥ AB, intersecting AB at point E. Because AB = 16, therefore BC = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 16 = 8. In right triangle OBC, because OB = 10, BC = 8, therefore OC = √{OB^2 - BC^2} = √{10^2 - 8^2} = 6. Thus, CD = OD - OC = 10 - 6 = 4. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,将半径为2,圆心角为120°的扇形OAB绕点A逆时针旋转一个角度,使点O的对应点D落在弧⌒{AB}上．点B的对应点为C．连接BC．则BC的长度是()
answer_cot: 如图,连接OD,BD．由题意:OA=OD=AD,∴△AOD是等边三角形,∴∠ADO=∠AOD=60°,∵∠ADC=∠AOB=120°,∴∠ADO+∠ADC=180°,∴O,D,C共线,∵∠AOD=∠DOB=60°,OD=OB,∴△OBD是等边三角形,∴∠BDO=60°,∵DC=DB,∴∠DCB=∠DBC=30°,∴∠OBC=90°,∴BC=(D)>gOB=2(D)>g,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a sector OAB with a radius of 2 and a central angle of 120° is rotated counterclockwise around point A, so that the corresponding point D of point O falls on the arc ⌒{AB}. The corresponding point for point B is C. Connect BC. Then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect OD and BD. According to the problem: OA = OD = AD, therefore △AOD is an equilateral triangle, thus ∠ADO = ∠AOD = 60°. Since ∠ADC = ∠AOB = 120°, therefore ∠ADO + ∠ADC = 180°, thus O, D, and C are collinear. Since ∠AOD = ∠DOB = 60°, and OD = OB, therefore △OBD is an equilateral triangle, thus ∠BDO = 60°. Since DC = DB, therefore ∠DCB = ∠DBC = 30°, thus ∠OBC = 90°, therefore BC = √OB = 2√g, hence the answer is: C.

question: 如图,P是△ABC的边AC上一点,若△ABP∽△ACB,∠A=45°,∠ABC=110°,则∠ABP的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point on the side AC of △ABC. If △ABP is similar to △ACB, ∠A = 45°, ∠ABC = 110°, then the degree of ∠ABP is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABP is similar to △ACB, therefore ∠ABC = ∠APB = 110°, thus ∠ABP = 180° - 45° - 110° = 25°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 若△ABC∽△ADE,若AB=6,AC=4,AD=3,则AE的长是()
question_en: If △ABC ∼ △ADE, and AB = 6, AC = 4, AD = 3, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AD/AB = AE/AC, therefore 3/6 = AE/4, therefore AE = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,已知△ADE∽△ABC,若AD:AB=1:3,△ABC的面积为9,则△ADE的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that △ADE is similar to △ABC, if AD:AB = 1:3, the area of △ABC is 9, then the area of △ADE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ADE is similar to △ABC, and AD:AB = 1:3, therefore the ratio of the areas S_{△ADE} to S_{△ABC} is (\frac{1}{3})^2. Since the area of △ABC is 9, therefore \frac{S_{△ADE}}{9} = \frac{1}{9}, thus the area of △ADE is 1. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC∽△ADE,若AB=9,AD=3,DE=2,则BC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ∽ △ADE, if AB = 9, AD = 3, DE = 2, then the length of BC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ADE is similar to △ABC, therefore AD/AB = DE/BC, that is, 3/9 = 2/BC, solving this gives: BC = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC∽△ACP,若∠A=75°,∠APC=65°,则∠B的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC ∽ △ACP, if ∠A = 75°, ∠APC = 65°, then the size of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠A = 75° and ∠APC = 65°, therefore ∠ACP = 40°. Since △ABC ∽ △ACP, therefore ∠B = ∠ACP = 40°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABO∽△CDO,若BO=6,DO=3,CD=2,则AB的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABO is similar to △CDO, if BO = 6, DO = 3, CD = 2, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABO is similar to △CDO, therefore BO/DO = AB/DC. Since BO = 6, DO = 3, CD = 2, therefore 6/3 = AB/2, solving gives: AB = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,点C、D在线段AB的同侧,CA=4,AB=12,BD=9,M是AB的中点,∠CMD=120°,则CD长的最大值是()
answer_cot: 如图,作点A关于CM的对称点A′,点B关于DM的对称点B′．∵∠CMD=120°,∴∠AMC+∠DMB=60°,∴∠CMA′+∠DMB′=60°,∴∠A′MB′=60°,∵MA′=MB′,∴△A′MB′为等边三角形∵CD≤CA′+A′B′+B′D=CA+AM+BD=4+6+9=19,∴CD的最大值为19,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, points C and D are on the same side of line segment AB, CA = 4, AB = 12, BD = 9, M is the midpoint of AB, ∠CMD = 120°, then the maximum length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, construct point A' as the symmetric point of A with respect to CM, and point B' as the symmetric point of B with respect to DM. Because ∠CMD = 120°, therefore ∠AMC + ∠DMB = 60°, thus ∠CMA' + ∠DMB' = 60°, therefore ∠A'MB' = 60°. Since MA' = MB', therefore △A'MB' is an equilateral triangle. Because CD ≤ CA' + A'B' + B'D = CA + AM + BD = 4 + 6 + 9 = 19, therefore the maximum value of CD is 19. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC与△ADC关于AC所在的直线对称,∠BCA=35°,∠D=80°,则∠BAD的度数为()
answer_cot: 根据题意,阴影部分的面积为三角形面积的一半,∵S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}×BC•AD=\frac{1}{2}×4×5=10,∴阴影部分面积=\frac{1}{2}×10=5．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC and △ADC are symmetrical about the line where AC is located, ∠BCA = 35°, ∠D = 80°, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, the area of the shaded part is half of the area of the triangle. Because the area of △ABC = 1/2 × BC × AD = 1/2 × 4 × 5 = 10, therefore the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 10 = 5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,正方形ABCD的边长为4cm,则图中阴影部分的面积为()cm^2^．
answer_cot: 根据正方形的轴对称性可得,阴影部分的面积=\frac{1}{2}S~正方形~,∵正方形ABCD的边长为4cm,∴阴影部分的面积=\frac{1}{2}×4^2^=8cm^2^．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side length of the square ABCD is 4 cm, then the area of the shaded part is () cm².
answer_cot_en: Based on the axial symmetry of the square, the area of the shaded part = 1/2 of the area of the square. Since the side length of square ABCD is 4cm, therefore the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 4^2 = 8cm². Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ACD与△ABD关于AD所在的直线成轴对称,B、D、C三点共线,若AC=3,BD=2,则△ABC的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵△ACD与△ABD关于AD所在的直线成轴对称,B、D、C三点共线,∴AB=AC=3,BD=CD=2,∴BC=4,∴△ABC的周长=3+3+4=10,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ACD and △ABD are axially symmetrical about the straight line AD, points B, D, and C are collinear. If AC = 3, BD = 2, then the perimeter of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ACD and △ABD are axially symmetrical with respect to the line where AD lies, and points B, D, C are collinear, therefore AB = AC = 3, BD = CD = 2, thus BC = 4. Therefore, the perimeter of △ABC = 3 + 3 + 4 = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点P是∠AOB外的一点,点M,N分别是∠AOB两边上的点,点P关于OA的对称点Q恰好落在线段MN上,点P关于OB的对称点R落在MN的延长线上．若PM=3cm,PN=4cm,MN=4.5cm,则线段QR的长为()
answer_cot: ∵点P关于OA的对称点Q恰好落在线段MN上,∴OA垂直平分PQ,∴QM=PM=3cm,∴QN=MN-QM=4.5cm-3cm=1.5cm,∵点P关于OB的对称点R落在MN的延长线上,∴OB垂直平分PR,∴RN=PN=4cm,∴QR=QN+RN=1.5cm+4cm=5.5cm．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a point outside of ∠AOB, points M and N are on the sides of ∠AOB respectively, the symmetric point Q of point P with respect to OA falls exactly on the line segment MN, the symmetric point R of point P with respect to OB falls on the extension of MN. If PM = 3 cm, PN = 4 cm, MN = 4.5 cm, then the length of line segment QR is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point P's symmetrical point Q with respect to OA falls exactly on the line segment MN, therefore OA perpendicularly bisects PQ, thus QM = PM = 3cm, therefore QN = MN - QM = 4.5cm - 3cm = 1.5cm. Because point P's symmetrical point R with respect to OB falls on the extension of MN, therefore OB perpendicularly bisects PR, thus RN = PN = 4cm, therefore QR = QN + RN = 1.5cm + 4cm = 5.5cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是轴对称图形,直线AC是它的对称轴,若∠BAD=150°,∠B=40°,则∠BCD的大小为()
answer_cot: 如图,∵四边形ABCD是轴对称图形,直线AC是它的对称轴,∠B=40°,∴∠D=∠B=40°．又∵∠BAD=150°,∴∠BCD=360°-150°-40°-40°=130°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is an axisymmetric figure, line AC is its axis of symmetry, if ∠BAD = 150°, ∠B = 40°, then the size of ∠BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because quadrilateral ABCD is an axisymmetric figure and line AC is its axis of symmetry, ∠B = 40°, therefore ∠D = ∠B = 40°. Also, because ∠BAD = 150°, therefore ∠BCD = 360° - 150° - 40° - 40° = 130°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知△APB和△APC是以AP所在的直线为对称轴的轴对称图形,若PA=PB,∠PAB=30°,则∠BPC的大小是()
answer_cot: ∵△APB和△APC是以AP所在的直线为对称轴的轴对称图形,∴∠BAP=∠CAP,∠ABP=∠ACP,∵PA=PB,∠PAB=30°,∴∠BAP=∠CAP=30°,∴∠BPC=30°+30°+30°+30°=120°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that △APB and △APC are axisymmetric figures with the line containing AP as the axis of symmetry. If PA = PB, ∠PAB = 30°, then the size of ∠BPC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △APB and △APC are axially symmetrical figures with the line containing AP as the axis of symmetry, therefore ∠BAP = ∠CAP, ∠ABP = ∠ACP. Since PA = PB and ∠PAB = 30°, therefore ∠BAP = ∠CAP = 30°, thus ∠BPC = 30° + 30° + 30° + 30° = 120°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,若▱ABCD与▱BCFE关于BC所在直线对称,∠ABE=86°,则∠E等于()
answer_cot: ∵▱ABCD与▱BCFE关于BC所在直线对称,∴∠ABC=∠EBC,∵∠ABE=86°,∴∠EBC=\frac{1}{2}×86°=43°,在▱BCFE中,∠E=180°-∠EBC=180°-43°=137°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, if ▱ABCD and ▱BCFE are symmetrical about the line where BC is located, ∠ABE = 86°, then ∠E is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is symmetrical to quadrilateral BCEF about the line where BC lies, therefore ∠ABC = ∠EBC. Since ∠ABE = 86°, therefore ∠EBC = 1/2 × 86° = 43°. In quadrilateral BCEF, ∠E = 180° - ∠EBC = 180° - 43° = 137°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D、E分别为边AB、AC上一点,点A关于DE的对称点恰好在BC边上的点A′处,且A′E=CE,∠ADE=70°,则∠B的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵点A关于DE的对称点恰好在BC边上的点A′,且A′E=CE,∴AE=A′E=CE,∠AED=∠DEA′,∠C=∠EA′C,∵∠C+∠EA′C=∠AED+∠DEA′,∴∠AED=∠DEA′=∠C=∠EA′C,∴DE∥BC,∵∠ADE=70°,∴∠B的度数为70°．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are points on sides AB and AC respectively, the symmetric point of point A with respect to DE is exactly at point A′ on side BC, and A′E = CE, ∠ADE = 70°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because point A is symmetric to point A' with respect to DE, and A'E = CE, therefore AE = A'E = CE, ∠AED = ∠DEA', ∠C = ∠EA'C. Since ∠C + ∠EA'C = ∠AED + ∠DEA', therefore ∠AED = ∠DEA' = ∠C = ∠EA'C, thus DE ∥ BC. Since ∠ADE = 70°, the measure of ∠B is 70°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,直线MN和EF相交于点O,∠EON=45°,AO=2,∠AOE=15°,设点A关于EF的对称点是B,点B关于MN的对称点是C,则AC的距离为()
answer_cot: ∵∠EON=45°,AO=2,∠AOE=15°,点A关于EF的对称点是B,点B关于MN的对称点是C,∴∠A0E=∠EOB,∠BON=∠NOC,AO=BO=CO=2,∴∠AOB=∠BON=∠NOC=30°,∴∠AOC=90°,则AC的距离为:√{2^{2}+2^{2}}=2√{2}．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, straight line MN and EF intersect at point O, ∠EON = 45°, AO = 2, ∠AOE = 15°, suppose the point symmetric to A with respect to EF is B, and the point symmetric to B with respect to MN is C, then the distance of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠EON = 45°, AO = 2, ∠AOE = 15°, point A is the reflection of point B across EF, and point B is the reflection of point C across MN, therefore ∠AOE = ∠EOB, ∠BON = ∠NOC, AO = BO = CO = 2, thus ∠AOB = ∠BON = ∠NOC = 30°, therefore ∠AOC = 90°. Then the distance AC is: √{2^2 + 2^2} = 2√{2}. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△PMN中,PM=PN,AB是线段PM的对称轴,分别交PM于A,PN于B,若△PMN的周长为60cm,△BMN的周长为36cm,则MA的长为()
answer_cot: ∵AB是线段PM的对称轴,∴PB=MB,PA=MA,∵△PMN的周长为60cm,△BMN的周长为36cm,∴PM=60-36=24cm,∴MA=\frac{1}{2}PM=\frac{1}{2}×24=12cm．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △PMN, PM = PN, AB is the axis of symmetry for the line segment PM, intersecting PM at A and PN at B. If the perimeter of △PMN is 60 cm, the perimeter of △BMN is 36 cm, then the length of MA is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB is the axis of symmetry for segment PM, therefore PB = MB, PA = MA. Since the perimeter of △PMN is 60cm, and the perimeter of △BMN is 36cm, therefore PM = 60 - 36 = 24cm, thus MA = 1/2 PM = 1/2 × 24 = 12cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,▱ABCD与▱EBCF关于边BC所在的直线对称,若∠ABE=110°,则∠F等于()
answer_cot: ∵▱ABCD与▱EBCF关于边BC所在的直线对称,∴∠ABC=∠EBF,∵∠ABE=110°,∴∠EBC=\frac{1}{2}∠ABE=\frac{1}{2}×110°=55°,在▱EBCF中,∠F=∠EBC=55°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ▱ABCD and ▱EBCF are symmetrical about the line where side BC is located. If ∠ABE = 110°, then ∠F is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is symmetrical to quadrilateral EBCF about the line containing side BC, therefore ∠ABC = ∠EBF. Since ∠ABE = 110°, therefore ∠EBC = 1/2 ∠ABE = 1/2 × 110° = 55°. In quadrilateral EBCF, ∠F = ∠EBC = 55°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AD垂直平分BC,BC=6,AD=4,点E,F是线段AD上的两点,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
answer_cot: 观察可知,图中阴影部分的面积等于△ABC面积的一半,∵AD垂直平分BC,BC=6,AD=4,∴阴影部分面积=\frac{1}{2}×\frac{1}{2}BC•AD=\frac{1}{2}×\frac{1}{2}×6×4=6．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD is the perpendicular bisector of BC, BC = 6, AD = 4, points E and F are two points on the line segment AD, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Observation shows that the area of the shaded part is equal to half of the area of △ABC. Because AD is the perpendicular bisector of BC, and BC = 6, AD = 4, therefore the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 1/2 BC • AD = 1/2 × 1/2 × 6 × 4 = 6. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,五边形ABCDE关于过点A的直线l轴对称,若∠DAE=40°,∠ADE=60°,则∠B的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵∠DAE=40°,∠ADE=60°,∴∠E=180°-∠DAE-∠ADE=180°-40°-60°=80°,∵五边形ABCDE关于过点A的直线l轴对称,∴∠B=∠E=80°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the pentagon ABCDE is symmetrical about the line l passing through point A. If ∠DAE = 40°, ∠ADE = 60°, then the degree of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DAE = 40°, ∠ADE = 60°, therefore ∠E = 180° - ∠DAE - ∠ADE = 180° - 40° - 60° = 80°. Since pentagon ABCDE is symmetrical about the line l passing through point A, therefore ∠B = ∠E = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AB=AD,点B关于AC的对称点B′恰好落在CD上,若∠BAD=110°,则∠ACB的度数为()
