answer_cot: 如图,连接AB′,BB′,过A作AE⊥CD于E,∠\beta=-2^°∵点B关于AC的对称点B′恰好落在CD上,∴AC垂直平分BB′,∴AB=AB′,∴∠BAC=∠B′AC,∵AB=AD,∴AD=AB′,又∵AE⊥CD,∴∠DAE=∠B′AE,∴∠CAE=\frac{1}{2}∠BAD=55°,又∵∠AEC=90°,∴∠ACB=∠ACB′=35°,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AB = AD, the point B symmetrical to AC falls exactly on CD, if ∠BAD = 110°, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, connect AB', BB', and draw AE ⊥ CD at E, with ∠β = -2°. Since point B' is the symmetric point of B with respect to AC and it lies exactly on CD, therefore AC perpendicularly bisects BB', thus AB = AB'. Therefore, ∠BAC = ∠B'AC. Since AB = AD, therefore AD = AB'. Also, since AE ⊥ CD, therefore ∠DAE = ∠B'AE. Therefore, ∠CAE = 1/2 ∠BAD = 55°. And since ∠AEC = 90°, therefore ∠ACB = ∠ACB' = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,矩形纸片ABCD中,AD=10cm,将纸片沿DE折叠,使点C落在边AD上(与点F重合),若BE=6cm,则CD等于()
answer_cot: 根据轴对称的性质可得可得出CD=DF=AD-AF=AD-BE,∴CD=4cm故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangular paper ABCD, AD = 10 cm, fold the paper along DE, making point C fall on side AD (coinciding with point F). If BE = 6 cm, then CD equals ()
answer_cot_en: Based on the properties of axial symmetry, it can be concluded that CD = DF = AD - AF = AD - BE, therefore CD = 4 cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC的内部有一点P,且D,E,F是P分别以AB,BC,AC为对称轴的对称点．若△ABC的内角∠A=70°,∠B=60°,∠C=50°,则∠ADB+∠BEC+∠CFA=()
answer_cot: 连接AP,BP,CP,∵D,E,F是P分别以AB,BC,AC为对称轴的对称点∴∠ADB=∠APB,∠BEC=∠BPC,∠CFA=∠APC,∴∠ADB+∠BEC+∠CFA=∠APB+∠BPC+∠APC=360°．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, inside △ABC there is a point P, and D, E, F are the symmetric points of P with AB, BC, AC as the axes of symmetry respectively. If the interior angles of △ABC are ∠A = 70°, ∠B = 60°, ∠C = 50°, then ∠ADB + ∠BEC + ∠CFA = ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AP, BP, CP, because D, E, F are the symmetric points of P with respect to AB, BC, AC respectively, therefore ∠ADB = ∠APB, ∠BEC = ∠BPC, ∠CFA = ∠APC, thus ∠ADB + ∠BEC + ∠CFA = ∠APB + ∠BPC + ∠APC = 360°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图所示的图案是一个轴对称图形,直线l是它的一条对称轴,如果最大圆的半径为2,那么阴影部分面积是()
answer_cot: 根据轴对称的性质可得:阴影部分面积为大圆面积的一半,∵S~圆~=4π,可得阴影部分的面积为2π．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the pattern is an axisymmetric figure, line l is one of its axes of symmetry. If the radius of the largest circle is 2, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: Based on the properties of axial symmetry, it can be concluded that the area of the shaded part is half of the area of the large circle. Since the area of the circle S = 4π, the area of the shaded part is 2π. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 已知:如图,∠AOB内一点P,P~1~,P~2~分别P是关于OA、OB的对称点,P~1~P~2~交OA于M,交OB于N,若P~1~P~2~=6cm,则△PMN的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵P与P~1~关于OA对称,∴OA为线段PP~1~的垂直平分线,∴MP=MP~1~,同理,P与P~2~关于OB对称,∴OB为线段PP~2~的垂直平分线,∴NP=NP~2~,∴P~1~P~2~=P~1~M+MN+NP~2~=MP+MN+NP=6cm,则△PMN的周长为6cm．故选:D．
question_en: Known: As shown in the figure, point P is inside ∠AOB, P₁ and P₂ are the symmetric points of P with respect to OA and OB respectively, P₁P₂ intersects OA at M, intersects OB at N, if P₁P₂ = 6 cm, then the perimeter of △PMN is ()
answer_cot_en: Because P is symmetrical to P₁ with respect to OA, therefore OA is the perpendicular bisector of the line segment PP₁, thus MP = MP₁. Similarly, P is symmetrical to P₂ with respect to OB, therefore OB is the perpendicular bisector of the line segment PP₂, thus NP = NP₂. Therefore, P₁P₂ = P₁M + MN + NP₂ = MP + MN + NP = 6cm, then the perimeter of △PMN is 6cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,△ABC中,AB+BC=10,A、C关于直线DE对称,则△BCD的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵A、C关于直线DE对称,∴DE垂直平分AC,∴AD=CD,∵AB+BC=10,∴△BCD的周长为:BC+BD+CD=BC+AD+CD=BC+AB=10．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB + BC = 10, A and C are symmetrical about line DE, then the perimeter of △BCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because A and C are symmetrical about line DE, therefore DE perpendicularly bisects AC, thus AD = CD. Since AB + BC = 10, therefore the perimeter of △BCD is: BC + BD + CD = BC + AD + CD = BC + AB = 10. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AD⊥BC于点D,BD=CD,若BC=5,AD=4,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 根据题意,阴影部分的面积为三角形面积的一半,∵S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}×BC•AD=\frac{1}{2}×4×5=10,∴阴影部分面积=\frac{1}{2}×10=5．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD ⊥ BC at point D, BD = CD, if BC = 5, AD = 4, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: According to the problem, the area of the shaded part is half of the triangle's area. Because the area of △ABC = 1/2 × BC × AD = 1/2 × 4 × 5 = 10, therefore the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 10 = 5. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点P是直线l外一个定点,点A为直线l上一个定点,点P关于直线l的对称点记为P~1~,将直线l绕点A顺时针旋转30°得到直线l′,此时点P~2~与点P关于直线l′对称,则∠P~1~AP~2~等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a fixed point outside line l, point A is a fixed point on line l, the symmetric point of point P with respect to line l is denoted as P₁, rotating line l clockwise 30° around point A to obtain line l′, at this time point P₂ is symmetric to point P with respect to line l′, then ∠P₁AP₂ is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because point P's symmetric point with respect to line l is denoted as P₁, and point P₂ is symmetric to point P with respect to line l', therefore ∠P₁AD = ∠PAD, ∠PAC = ∠P₁AC. Since ∠BAC = 30°, therefore ∠DAC = 150°, thus ∠DAP₁ + ∠P₂AC = 150°, ∠DAP₁ + ∠P₂AB = 150° - 30° = 120°, therefore ∠P₁AP₂ = 180° - 120° = 60°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,∠A=70°,OC=OE,则∠C的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, ∠A = 70°, OC = OE, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠DOE = ∠BAE = 70°. Since OC = OE, therefore ∠C = ∠E. Also, ∠DOE = 2∠C, therefore ∠C = 35°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AC=BC,点D在BC的延长线上,AE∥BD,点ED在AC同侧,若∠CAE=118°,则∠B的大小为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AC = BC, point D is on the extension of BC, AE ∥ BD, point ED is on the same side as AC, if ∠CAE = 118°, then the size of ∠B is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, AC = BC, therefore ∠B = ∠CAB. Since AE ∥ BD, and ∠CAE = 118°, therefore ∠B + ∠CAB + ∠CAE = 180°, which means 2∠B = 180° - 118°. Solving this, we get: ∠B = 31°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,AB=AC,AF∥BC,∠FAC=75°,E为BC延长线上一点,∠ABC与∠ACE的平分线相交于点D,则∠D的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB = AC, AF ∥ BC, ∠FAC = 75°, E is a point on the extension line of BC, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACE intersect at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AF ∥ BC, ∠FAC = 75°, therefore ∠ACE = 105°. Since AB = AC, therefore ∠ACB = ∠ABC = 75°, thus ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠D = 1/2 ∠A = 15°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知O是四边形ABCD内一点,OA=OB=OC,∠ABC=∠ADC=70°,则∠DAO+∠DCO的大小是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that O is a point inside quadrilateral ABCD, OA = OB = OC, ∠ABC = ∠ADC = 70°, then the size of ∠DAO + ∠DCO is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because OA = OB = OC, and ∠ABC = ∠ADC = 70°, therefore ∠ABO = ∠BAO, and ∠OBC = ∠OCB. Thus, ∠AOB + ∠BOC = 360° - 2(∠ABO + ∠OBC) = 220°. Therefore, ∠AOC = 360° - 220° = 140°. Since ∠OAD + ∠ADC + ∠OCD + ∠AOC = 360°, therefore ∠DAO + ∠DCO = 150°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,AB∥CD,AD=CD,∠1=65°,则∠2的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, AD = CD, ∠1 = 65°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠1 = ∠ACD = 65°. Since AD = CD, therefore ∠DCA = ∠CAD = 65°, thus the measure of ∠2 is: 180° - 65° - 65° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,已知DE∥BC,AB=AC,∠1=125°,则∠C的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that DE ∥ BC, AB = AC, ∠1 = 125°, then the degree of ∠C is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠1 = 125°, therefore ∠ADE = 180° - 125° = 55°. Since DE ∥ BC and AB = AC, therefore AD = AE, and ∠C = ∠AED. Thus, ∠AED = ∠ADE = 55°. Given that ∠C = ∠AED, therefore ∠C = 55°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,△ABC中,CA=CB,AB=9cm,点D在AC上,AD=3cm．将线段AD沿着AB的方向平移5cm得到线段MN,点M落在边CB,点N落在边AB上,则△BMN的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵CA=CB,∴∠A=∠B,∵将线段AD沿着AB的方向平移5cm得到线段MN,∴MN=AD=3,MN∥AD,AN=5,∴∠A=∠MNB,∴∠MNB=∠B,∴BM=MN=3,∵BN=AB-AN=9-5=4,∴△BMN的周长为3+3+4=10cm,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, CA = CB, AB = 9 cm, point D is on AC, AD = 3 cm. Move the line segment AD along the direction of AB by 5 cm to get line segment MN, point M falls on side CB, point N falls on side AB, then the perimeter of △BMN is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CA = CB, therefore ∠A = ∠B. Because segment AD is translated 5cm along the direction of AB to obtain segment MN, therefore MN = AD = 3, MN ∥ AD, AN = 5, therefore ∠A = ∠MNB, thus ∠MNB = ∠B, therefore BM = MN = 3. Since BN = AB - AN = 9 - 5 = 4, therefore the perimeter of △BMN is 3 + 3 + 4 = 10cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示是跷跷板示意图,横板AB绕中点O上下移动,立柱OC与地面垂直,当横板AB的A端着地时,测得∠OAC=28°,则在玩跷跷板时,上下最大可以转动的角度为()
answer_cot: 当B端着地时,如图,∠A′OA即为上下转动的最大角度,∵O是AB的中点,∴OA=OB,∵OA=OB′,∴∠A=∠B′=28°∴∠A′OA=∠A+∠B′=56°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the seesaw schematic diagram, the horizontal board AB moves up and down around the midpoint O, the column OC is perpendicular to the ground. When the A end of the horizontal board AB touches the ground, it is measured that ∠OAC = 28°, then the maximum angle that can be rotated up and down when playing on the seesaw is ()
answer_cot_en: When end B is on the ground, as shown in the diagram, ∠A′OA is the maximum angle of rotation up and down. Because O is the midpoint of AB, therefore OA = OB. Since OA = OB′, therefore ∠A = ∠B′ = 28°. Thus ∠A′OA = ∠A + ∠B′ = 56°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在五边形ABCDE中,BA=BC=BD=BE,且AE∥BC,若∠A=60°,则∠CDE的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the pentagon ABCDE, BA = BC = BD = BE, and AE ∥ BC. If ∠A = 60°, then the degree of ∠CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = BE and ∠A = 60°, therefore ∠ABE = 60°. Since AE ∥ BC, therefore ∠A + ∠ABC = 180°, thus ∠ABC = 120°. Therefore, ∠CBE = ∠ABC - ∠ABE = 60°. Let ∠DBE = α and ∠CBD = β, thus α + β = 60°. Since BD = BE, therefore ∠BDE = (180° - ∠DBE) / 2 = 90° - α / 2. Since BD = BD, therefore ∠BDC = (180° - ∠CBD) / 2 = 90° - β / 2. Therefore, ∠CDE = ∠BDE + ∠BDC = 90° - α / 2 + 90° - β / 2 = 180° - (α + β) / 2 = 150°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC．过点A作AD∥BC．若∠1=65°,则∠BAC的大小()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC. Line AD is drawn through point A parallel to BC. If ∠1 = 65°, then the size of ∠BAC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, therefore ∠B = ∠C. Since AD ∥ BC, ∠1 = 65°, therefore ∠C = ∠1 = 65°, thus ∠B = 65°, therefore ∠BAC = 180° - ∠B - ∠C = 180° - 65° - 65° = 50°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,M、N分别是AB、AC的中点,D、E为BC上的点,连接DN、EM,若AB=13cm,BC=10cm,DE=5cm,则阴影部分的面积()
answer_cot: 连接MN,则MN是△ABC的中位线,因此MN=\frac{1}{2}BC=5cm；过点A作AF⊥BC于F,则AF=√{13^{2}-5^{2}}=12cm．∵图中阴影部分的三个三角形的底长都是5cm,且高的和为12cm；∴S~阴影~=\frac{1}{2}×5×12=30cm^2^．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, M and N are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, D and E are points on BC, connect DN and EM, if AB = 13 cm, BC = 10 cm, DE = 5 cm, then the area of the shaded part is ()
answer_cot_en: Connecting MN, then MN is the median of △ABC, therefore MN = 1/2 BC = 5cm; draw AF ⊥ BC at F, then AF = √{13^2 - 5^2} = 12cm. Because the bases of the three shaded triangles in the figure are all 5cm, and the sum of their heights is 12cm; therefore, the area of the shaded part = 1/2 × 5 × 12 = 30cm². Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,∠BAC=50°,∠BAC的角平分线AF与AB的垂直平分线DF交于点F,连接CF,BF,则∠BCF的度数为()
answer_cot: 延长∠BAC的角平分线AF交BC于点E,∵AF与AB的垂直平分线DF交于点F,∴FA=FB,∵AB=AC,∠BAC=50°,∴∠ABC=∠ACB=65°∴∠BAF=25°,∠FBE=40°,∴AE⊥BC,∴∠CFE=∠BFE=50°,∴∠BCF=∠FBE=40°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠BAC = 50°, the angle bisector of ∠BAC, AF, intersects the perpendicular bisector of AB, DF, at point F. Connect CF and BF, then the degree of ∠BCF is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend the angle bisector of ∠BAC, AF, to meet BC at point E. Since AF intersects the perpendicular bisector of AB, DF, at point F, therefore FA = FB. Given that AB = AC and ∠BAC = 50°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 65°. Thus ∠BAF = 25°, ∠FBE = 40°. Therefore, AE ⊥ BC, hence ∠CFE = ∠BFE = 50°, and ∠BCF = ∠FBE = 40°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,AB=AC=13,BC=10,AD平分∠BAC交BC于点D,AD的垂直平分线交AC于点E,连接DE,则△CDE的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC中,AB=AC=13,BC=10,AD平分∠BAC交BC于点D,∴CD=\frac{1}{2}BC=5．∵AD的垂直平分线交AC于点E,∴AE=DE,∴△CDE的周长=(CE+DE)+CD=(AE+CE)+CD=AC+CD=13+5=18．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC = 13, BC = 10, AD bisects ∠BAC and intersects BC at point D, the perpendicular bisector of AD intersects AC at point E, connect DE, then the perimeter of △CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in △ABC, AB = AC = 13, BC = 10, AD bisects ∠BAC and intersects BC at point D, therefore CD = 1/2 BC = 5. Since the perpendicular bisector of AD intersects AC at point E, therefore AE = DE, thus the perimeter of △CDE = (CE + DE) + CD = (AE + CE) + CD = AC + CD = 13 + 5 = 18. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,∠BAC=58°,∠BAC的平分线与AB的中垂线交于点O,连接OC,则∠AOC的度数为()
answer_cot: 连接BO,延长AO交BC于E,∵AB=AC,AO平分∠BAC,∴AO⊥BC,AO平分BC,∴OB=OC,∵O在AB的垂直平分线上,∴AO=BO,∴AO=CO,∴∠OAC=∠OCA=∠OAD=(media/image6.png)×58°=29°,∴∠AOC=180°-2×29°=122°,故选:B．(media/image8.png)
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, ∠BAC = 58°, the bisector of ∠BAC intersects the perpendicular bisector of AB at point O. Connect OC, then the degree of ∠AOC is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BO, extend AO to intersect BC at E. Because AB = AC and AO bisects ∠BAC, therefore AO ⊥ BC and AO bisects BC, thus OB = OC. Since O lies on the perpendicular bisector of AB, therefore AO = BO, thus AO = CO, therefore ∠OAC = ∠OCA = ∠OAD = (1/2) × 58° = 29°, thus ∠AOC = 180° - 2 × 29° = 122°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,BC=9,点D在边AB上,且BD=5将线段BD沿着BC的方向平移得到线段EF,若平移的距离为6时点F恰好落在AC边上,则△CEF的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵将线段BD沿着BC的方向平移得到线段EF,∴EF=DB=5,BE=6,∵AB=AC,BC=9,∴∠B=∠C,EC=3,∴∠B=∠FEC,∴CF=EF=5,∴△EBF的周长为:5+5+3=13．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, BC = 9, point D is on side AB, and BD = 5. Segment BD is translated in the direction of BC to obtain segment EF. If the translation distance is 6, point F falls exactly on side AC, then the perimeter of △CEF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because segment BD is translated in the direction of BC to obtain segment EF, therefore EF = DB = 5, BE = 6. Since AB = AC and BC = 9, therefore ∠B = ∠C, EC = 3, therefore ∠B = ∠FEC, thus CF = EF = 5. Therefore, the perimeter of △EBF is: 5 + 5 + 3 = 13. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图所示,在▱ABCD中,∠C=120°,延长BA至点E,延长DA至点F,连结EF,则∠E+∠F的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠C = 120°, extend BA to point E, extend DA to point F, connect EF, then the sum of the degrees of ∠E and ∠F is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC and AB ∥ CD, thus ∠FAD = ∠B = 180° - ∠C = 180° - 120° = 60°, therefore ∠E + ∠F = ∠FAD = 60°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知▱OABC的顶点A,C分别在直线x=1和x=4上,O是坐标原点,则对角线OB长的最小值为()
answer_cot: 过点B作BD⊥直线x=4,交直线x=4于点D,过点B作BE⊥x轴,交x轴于点E,直线x=1与OC交于点M,与x轴交于点F,直线x=4与AB交于点N,如图:∵四边形OABC是平行四边形,∴∠OAB=∠BCO,OC∥AB,OA=BC,∵直线x=1与直线x=4均垂直于x轴,∴AM∥CN,∴四边形ANCM是平行四边形,∴∠MAN=∠NCM,∴∠OAF=∠BCD,∵∠OFA=∠BDC=90°,∴∠FOA=∠DBC,在△OAF和△BCD中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠FOA=∠DBC}\\{QA=BC}\\{∠0AF=∠BCD}\end{array}\right.,∴△OAF≌△BCD．∴BD=OF=1,∴OE=4+1=5,∴OB=√{0E^{2}+BE^{2}}．由于OE的长不变,所以当BE最小时(即B点在x轴上),OB取得最小值,最小值为OB=OE=5．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the vertices A and C of rectangle OABC are respectively on the lines x = 1 and x = 4, O is the coordinate origin, then the minimum value of the diagonal OB is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct line BD perpendicular to the line x=4 at point D, and construct line BE perpendicular to the x-axis at point E. The line x=1 intersects OC at point M and intersects the x-axis at point F. The line x=4 intersects AB at point N, as shown in the diagram. Because quadrilateral OABC is a parallelogram, ∠OAB = ∠BCO, OC ∥ AB, and OA = BC. Since the line x=1 and the line x=4 are both perpendicular to the x-axis, AM ∥ CN. Therefore, quadrilateral ANCM is a parallelogram, ∠MAN = ∠NCM, and ∠OAF = ∠BCD. Given that ∠OFA = ∠BDC = 90°, ∠FOA = ∠DBC. In triangles OAF and BCD, we have that ∠FOA = ∠DBC, OA = BC, and ∠OAF = ∠BCD. Therefore, △OAF is congruent to △BCD. Thus, BD = OF = 1, and OE = 4 + 1 = 5. Therefore, OB = √(OE² + BE²). Since the length of OE is constant, when BE is at its minimum (i.e., point B is on the x-axis), OB reaches its minimum value, which is OB = OE = 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图．在▱ABCD中,点E是BC的中点．延长BA到点F,使BA=AF,连接EF,FC、AE．若AD=12,▱ABCD的周长为34．FE⊥AD,则AE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, point E is the midpoint of BC. Extend BA to point F, such that BA = AF, connect EF, FC, and AE. If AD = 12, the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 34. FE ⊥ AD, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 34, therefore AD ∥ BC, AB = CD, AD = BC, AB + AD = 17. Since AD = 12, therefore AB = 5. Since BA = AF, therefore AF = 5. Thus BF = 2AB = 10. Since FE ⊥ AD, therefore EF ⊥ BC, therefore ∠BEF = 90°. Since BA = AF, therefore AE = 1/2 AF = 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,∠ABC=45°,E、F分别在CD和BC的延长线上,AE∥BD,EF⊥BC,AB=1,则EF的长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥DC,AB=CD,∵AE∥BD,∴四边形ABDE是平行四边形,∴AB=DE=CD,即D为CE中点,∵EF⊥BC,∴∠EFC=90°,∵AB∥CD,∴∠DCF=∠ABC=45°,∵AB=1,∴CE=2,∴EF=\frac{√{2}}{2}CE=√{2},故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, ∠ABC = 45°, E and F are respectively on the extensions of CD and BC, AE ∥ BD, EF ⊥ BC, AB = 1, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ DC, AB = CD. Since AE ∥ BD, therefore quadrilateral ABDE is a parallelogram, thus AB = DE = CD, which means D is the midpoint of CE. Since EF ⊥ BC, therefore ∠EFC = 90°. Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠DCF = ∠ABC = 45°. Since AB = 1, therefore CE = 2, thus EF = (√2 / 2) CE = √2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,∠BAD的平分线交BC于点E,∠ABC的平分线交AD于点F,若BF=12,AB=10,则AE的长为()
answer_cot: 如图所示:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,∴∠DAE=∠AEB,∵∠BAD的平分线交BC于点E,∴∠DAE=∠BAE,∴∠BAE=∠BEA,∴AB=BE,同理可得AB=AF,∴AF=BE,∴四边形ABEF是平行四边形,∵AB=AF,∴四边形ABEF是菱形,∴AE⊥BF,OA=OE,OB=OF=\frac{1}{2}BF=6,∴OA=√{AB^{2}-0B^{2}}=√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8,∴AE=2OA=16；故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, the bisector of ∠BAD intersects BC at point E, the bisector of ∠ABC intersects AD at point F, if BF = 12, AB = 10, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, thus ∠DAE = ∠AEB. Since the bisector of ∠BAD intersects BC at point E, therefore ∠DAE = ∠BAE, thus ∠BAE = ∠BEA, therefore AB = BE. Similarly, it can be deduced that AB = AF, therefore AF = BE, thus quadrilateral ABEF is a parallelogram. Since AB = AF, therefore quadrilateral ABEF is a rhombus, thus AE ⊥ BF, OA = OE, OB = OF = 1/2 BF = 6, therefore OA = √(AB² - OB²) = √(10² - 6²) = 8, thus AE = 2OA = 16; Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知△ABC的面积为12,点D在线段AC上,点F在线段BC的延长线上,且BC=4CF,四边形DCFE是平行四边形,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: 连接AF、EC．∵BC=4CF,S~△ABC~=12,∴S~△ACF~=\frac{1}{4}×12=3,∵四边形CDEF是平行四边形,∴DE∥CF,EF∥AC,∴S~△DEB~=S~△DEC~,∴S~阴~=S~△ADE~+S~△DEC~=S~△AEC~,∵EF∥AC,∴S~△AEC~=S~△ACF~=3,∴S~阴~=3．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the area of △ABC is 12, point D is on the line segment AC, point F is on the extension line of BC, and BC = 4CF, quadrilateral DCFE is a parallelogram, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AF and EC. Because BC = 4CF and the area of △ABC is 12, therefore the area of △ACF is 1/4 × 12 = 3. Since quadrilateral CDEF is a parallelogram, therefore DE ∥ CF and EF ∥ AC, thus the area of △DEB is equal to the area of △DEC. Therefore, the shaded area equals the area of △ADE plus the area of △DEC, which is equal to the area of △AEC. Because EF ∥ AC, the area of △AEC equals the area of △ACF, which is 3. Hence, the shaded area is 3. Therefore, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,O是AC、BD的交点,过点O作AC的垂线交边AD于点E,连结CE,若▱ABCD周长为20cm,则△CDE的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形∴AB=CD,AD=BC,AO=CO,又∵EO⊥AC,∴AE=CE,∵▱ABCD的周长为20cm,∴2(AD+CD)=20cm∴AD+CD=10cm,∴△CDE的周长=CE+DE+CD=AE+DE+CD=AD+CD=10cm,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, O is the intersection point of AC and BD. A perpendicular from point O to side AD intersects at point E. Connect CE. If the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 20 cm, then the perimeter of △CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, AD = BC, AO = CO. Also, since EO ⊥ AC, therefore AE = CE. Since the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD is 20 cm, therefore 2(AD + CD) = 20 cm, thus AD + CD = 10 cm. Therefore, the perimeter of △CDE = CE + DE + CD = AE + DE + CD = AD + CD = 10 cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD是平行四边形,点E在BC的延长线上,且CE=BC,AE=AB,AE、DC相交于点O,连接DE．若∠AOD=120°,AC=4,则CD的大小为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC,AB=DC,∵CE=BC,∴AD=CE,AD∥CE,∴四边形ACED是平行四边形,∵AB=DC,AE=AB,∴AE=DC,∴四边形ACED是矩形；∴OA=\frac{1}{2}AE,OC=\frac{1}{2}CD,AE=CD,∴OA=OC,∵∠AOC=180°-∠AOD=180°-120°=60°,∴△AOC是等边三角形,∴OC=AC=4,∴CD=2OC=8；故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, point E is on the extension of BC, and CE = BC, AE = AB, AE and DC intersect at point O, connect DE. If ∠AOD = 120°, AC = 4, then the size of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, AD = BC, AB = DC. Since CE = BC, therefore AD = CE, AD ∥ CE, thus quadrilateral ACED is a parallelogram. Since AB = DC, AE = AB, therefore AE = DC, thus quadrilateral ACED is a rectangle; therefore OA = 1/2 AE, OC = 1/2 CD, AE = CD, therefore OA = OC. Since ∠AOC = 180° - ∠AOD = 180° - 120° = 60°, therefore △AOC is an equilateral triangle, therefore OC = AC = 4, thus CD = 2OC = 8; Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AB=7,AD=4,AE平分∠DAB交BC的延长线于点F,则CF的长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC=4,∴∠DAE=∠F,∵AE平分∠DAB,∴∠DAE=∠BAF,∴∠BAF=∠F,∴AB=BF=7,∴CF=BF-BC=7-4=3．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AB = 7, AD = 4, AE bisects ∠DAB and intersects the extension of BC at point F, then the length of CF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, AD = BC = 4, therefore ∠DAE = ∠F. Since AE bisects ∠DAB, therefore ∠DAE = ∠BAF, thus ∠BAF = ∠F, therefore AB = BF = 7, therefore CF = BF - BC = 7 - 4 = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠B=90°,AB=3,BC=4,点D在BC上,以AC为对角线的所有平行四边形ADCE中,DE的最小值是()
answer_cot: ∵在Rt△ABC中,∠B=90°,∴BC⊥AB．∵四边形ADCE是平行四边形,∴OD=OE,OA=OC．∴当OD取最小值时,DE线段最短,此时OD⊥BC．∴OD是△ABC的中位线,∴OD=\frac{1}{2}AB=1.5,∴ED=2OD=3．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠B = 90°, AB = 3, BC = 4, point D is on BC, among all parallelograms ADCE with AC as the diagonal, the minimum value of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in right triangle △ABC, ∠B = 90°, therefore BC ⊥ AB. Since quadrilateral ADCE is a parallelogram, therefore OD = OE, OA = OC. Thus, when OD is at its minimum value, the line segment DE is the shortest, at this time OD ⊥ BC. Therefore, OD is the median of △ABC, therefore OD = 1/2 AB = 1.5, therefore ED = 2OD = 3. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,过平行四边形ABCD对角线交点O的线段EF,分别交AD,BC于点E,F,当AE=ED时,△AOE的面积为4,则四边形EFCD的面积是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the line segment EF passing through the intersection point O of the diagonals of the parallelogram ABCD intersects AD and BC at points E and F, respectively. When AE = ED, the area of △AOE is 4, then the area of the quadrilateral EFCD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, AD = BC, AO = CO, and OB = OD, therefore ∠DAC = ∠ACB. Since ∠AOE = ∠COF, therefore △COF is congruent to △AOE (ASA). Since the area of △AOE is 4, and AE = ED, therefore the area of △COF = the area of △DOE = the area of △AOE = 4. Thus, the area of △AOD = 8. Since AO = CO, therefore the area of △COD = the area of △AOD = 8. Hence, the area of quadrilateral EFCD = the area of △DOE + the area of △COD + the area of △COF = 4 + 8 + 4 = 16. Therefore, the answer is: C.

question: 如图3,在▱ABCD中,连接AC,分别以点A,C为圆心,以大于AC长为半径作,两弧相交于点P,Q,作直线PQ交AD于点E,交BC于点F,连接CE,若△CED的周长为5,则▱ABCD的周长为()
answer_cot: 由已知作图过程可知PQ是AC的垂直平分线,所以EC=EA．∵△CED周长=DE+EC+CD=5,∴DE+AE+CD=5,即DA+DC=5．∴平行四边形ABCD周长为2(DA+DC)=10．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in Figure 3, in rectangle ABCD, connect AC, and with points A and C as centers, make arcs with radii greater than the length of AC. The arcs intersect at points P and Q. Draw line PQ intersecting AD at point E and BC at point F. Connect CE. If the perimeter of △CED is 5, then the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is ()
answer_cot_en: From the known construction process, it is evident that PQ is the perpendicular bisector of AC, hence EC = EA. Because the perimeter of △CED is DE + EC + CD = 5, therefore DE + AE + CD = 5, which means DA + DC = 5. Thus, the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD is 2(DA + DC) = 10. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,点E、F分别在CD、BC的延长线上,AE∥BD,EF⊥BF,∠ABC=60°,EF=3,则AB的长是()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥DC,AB=CD,∵AE∥BD,∴四边形ABDE是平行四边形,∴AB=DE=CD,即D为CE中点,∵EF⊥BC,∴∠EFC=90°,∵AB∥CD,∴∠DCF=∠ABC=60°,∴∠CEF=30°,∵EF=3,∴CE=\frac{EF}{cos30^{°}}=2√{3},∴AB=√{3},故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, points E and F are respectively on the extensions of CD and BC, AE ∥ BD, EF ⊥ BF, ∠ABC = 60°, EF = 3, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB ∥ DC, AB = CD. Since AE ∥ BD, therefore quadrilateral ABDE is a parallelogram, thus AB = DE = CD, which means D is the midpoint of CE. Since EF ⊥ BC, therefore ∠EFC = 90°. Because AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠DCF = ∠ABC = 60°, thus ∠CEF = 30°. Since EF = 3, therefore CE = EF / cos30° = 2√3, thus AB = √3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,l~1~∥l~2~,▱ABCD的顶点A在l~1~上,BC交l~2~于点E．若∠C=100°,则∠1+∠2=()
question_en: As shown in the figure, l₁ ∥ l₂, vertex A of ▱ABCD is on l₁, BC intersects l₂ at point E. If ∠C = 100°, then ∠1 + ∠2 = ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore ∠BAD = ∠C = 100°, AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠2 = ∠ADE. Since l₁ ∥ l₂, therefore ∠ADE + ∠BAD + ∠1 = 180°, thus ∠1 + ∠2 = 180° - ∠BAD = 80°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,BE=2,AD=8,DE平分∠ADC,则平行四边形的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE平分∠ADC,∴∠ADE=∠CDE,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,BC=AD=8,AB=CD,∴∠ADE=∠CED,∴∠CDE=∠CED,∴CE=CD,∵AD=8,BE=2,∴CE=BC-BE=8-2=6,∴CD=AB=6,∴▱ABCD的周长=6+6+8+8=28．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, BE = 2, AD = 8, DE bisects ∠ADC, then the perimeter of the parallelogram is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE bisects ∠ADC, therefore ∠ADE = ∠CDE. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AD ∥ BC, and BC = AD = 8, AB = CD. Therefore ∠ADE = ∠CED, thus ∠CDE = ∠CED, therefore CE = CD. Since AD = 8, BE = 2, therefore CE = BC - BE = 8 - 2 = 6, thus CD = AB = 6. Therefore, the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD = 6 + 6 + 8 + 8 = 28. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,对角线AC与BD相交于点O,E是边CD的中点,连结OE．若∠ABC=50°,∠BAC=80°,则∠1的度数为()
answer_cot: ∵∠ABC=50°,∠BAC=80°,∴∠BCA=180°-50°-80°=50°,∵对角线AC与BD相交于点O,E是边CD的中点,∴EO是△DBC的中位线,∴EO∥BC,∴∠1=∠ACB=50°．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, E is the midpoint of side CD, connect OE. If ∠ABC = 50°, ∠BAC = 80°, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ABC = 50°, ∠BAC = 80°, therefore ∠BCA = 180° - 50° - 80° = 50°. Since the diagonals AC and BD intersect at point O, and E is the midpoint of side CD, therefore EO is the median of △DBC, thus EO ∥ BC, therefore ∠1 = ∠ACB = 50°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=18,AD=12,∠ABC的平分线交CD于点F,交AD的延长线于点E,CG⊥BE,垂足为G,若EF=4,则线段CG的长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD=18,AE∥BC,AB∥CD,∴∠CFB=∠FBA,∵BE平分∠ABC,∴∠ABF=∠CBF,∴∠CFB=∠CBF,∴CB=CF=12,∴DF=18-12=6,∵DE∥CB,∴△DEF∽△CBF,∴\frac{EF}{BF}=\frac{DF}{CF},即\frac{4}{BF}=\frac{6}{12},∴BF=8,∵CF=CB,CG⊥BF,∴BG=FG=4,在Rt△BCG中,CG=√{BC^{2}-BG^{2}}=√{12^{2}-4^{2}}=8√{2},故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 18, AD = 12, the bisector of ∠ABC intersects CD at point F, and extends to intersect AD at point E, CG ⊥ BE at foot G, if EF = 4, then the length of the line segment CG is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD = 18, AE ∥ BC, AB ∥ CD, therefore ∠CFB = ∠FBA. Since BE bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABF = ∠CBF, thus ∠CFB = ∠CBF, therefore CB = CF = 12, therefore DF = 18 - 12 = 6. Since DE ∥ CB, therefore △DEF ∼ △CBF, therefore EF/BF = DF/CF, that is 4/BF = 6/12, therefore BF = 8. Since CF = CB, CG ⊥ BF, therefore BG = FG = 4. In Rt△BCG, CG = √{BC^2 - BG^2} = √{12^2 - 4^2} = 8√2, hence the answer is: D.

question: 如图,已知点M为▱ABCD边AB的中点,线段CM交BD于点E,S~△BEM~=1,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∵AM=BM,∴\frac{BM}{DC}=\frac{BE}{DE}=\frac{EM}{EC}=\frac{1}{2},∴S~△DEM~=2S~△EBM~,S~△EBC~=2S~△EBM~,∵S~△BEM~=1,∴S~△DEM~=S~△EBC~=2,∴S~阴~=2+2=4,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point M is the midpoint of side AB of ▱ABCD, line segment CM intersects BD at point E, S~△BEM~ = 1, then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, and AB ∥ CD. Since AM = BM, therefore BM / DC = BE / DE = EM / EC = 1/2. Thus, the area of △DEM is 2 times the area of △EBM, and the area of △EBC is 2 times the area of △EBM. Since the area of △BEM is 1, therefore the area of △DEM and the area of △EBC are both 2. Hence, the area of the shaded region is 2 + 2 = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,两个平行四边形的面积分别为18、12,两阴影部分的面积分别为a、b(a＞b),则(a-b)等于()
answer_cot: 设重叠部分面积为c,a-b=(a+c)-(b+c)=18-12=6．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the areas of the two parallelograms are 18 and 12, respectively, and the areas of the two shaded parts are a and b (a > b), then (a - b) is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Let the area of the overlapping part be c, a - b = (a + c) - (b + c) = 18 - 12 = 6. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=3,BC=5,AC的垂直平分线交AD于E,则△CDE的周长是()
answer_cot: ∵AC的垂直平分线交AD于E,∴AE=CE,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴CD=AB=3,AD=BC=5,∴△CDE的周长是:DE+DE+CE=DC+DE+AE=DC+AD=3+5=8．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 3, BC = 5, the perpendicular bisector of AC intersects AD at E, then the perimeter of △CDE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the perpendicular bisector of AC intersects AD at E, therefore AE = CE. Since quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore CD = AB = 3, AD = BC = 5. Thus, the perimeter of △CDE is: DE + DE + CE = DC + DE + AE = DC + AD = 3 + 5 = 8. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,▱ABCD的对角线AC与BD相交于点O,AC⊥BC,且AB=10,AD=6,则OB的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, the diagonals AC and BD of rectangle ABCD intersect at point O, AC ⊥ BC, and AB = 10, AD = 6, then the length of OB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore BC = AD = 6, OA = OC. Since AC ⊥ BC and AB = 10, therefore √{AB² - BC²} = √{10² - 6²} = 8, thus AO = CO = 1/2 AC = 4, therefore OB = √{BC² + OC²} = √{6² + 4²} = 2√{13}. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,▱ABCD的周长为60cm,AC,BD相交于点O,EO⊥BD交AD于点E,则△ABE的周长为()
answer_cot: ∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AD=BC,OB=OD,又∵OE⊥BD,∴OE是线段BD的中垂线,∴BE=DE,∴AE+ED=AE+BE,∵▱ABCD的周长为60cm,∴AB+AD=30cm,∴△ABE的周长=AB+AE+BE=AB+AD=30cm,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of rectangle ABCD is 60 cm, AC and BD intersect at point O, EO ⊥ BD intersects AD at point E, then the perimeter of △ABE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, therefore AB = CD, AD = BC, OB = OD. Also, since OE ⊥ BD, therefore OE is the perpendicular bisector of segment BD, thus BE = DE, therefore AE + ED = AE + BE. Since the perimeter of parallelogram ABCD is 60 cm, therefore AB + AD = 30 cm, thus the perimeter of △ABE = AB + AE + BE = AB + AD = 30 cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,点D是△ABC的边AB的延长线上一点,点F是边BC上的一个动点(不与点B重合)．以BD、BF为邻边作平行四边形BDEF,又APlBE(点P、E在直线AB的同侧),如果BD=\frac{1}{4}AB,那么△PBC的面积与△ABC面积之比为()
answer_cot: 过点P作PH∥BC交AB于H,连接CH,PF,∵APlBE,∴四边形APEB是平行四边形,∴PE∥AB,PE=AB,∵四边形BDEF是平行四边形,∴EF∥BD,EF=BD,即EF∥AB,∴P,E,F共线,设BD=a,∵BD=\frac{1}{4}AB,∴PE=AB=4a,则PF=PE-EF=3a,∵PH∥BC,∴S~△HBC~=S~△PBC~,∵PF∥AB,∴四边形BFPH是平行四边形,∴BH=PF=3a,∵S~△HBC~:S~△ABC~=BH:AB=3a:4a=3:4,∴S~△PBC~:S~△ABC~=3:4．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, point D is a point on the extension line of side AB of △ABC, point F is a moving point on side BC (not coinciding with point B). A parallelogram BDEF is constructed with BD and BF as adjacent sides, and APlBE (points P and E are on the same side of straight line AB). If BD = \(\frac{1}{4}\)AB, then the ratio of the area of △PBC to the area of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw PH parallel to BC intersecting AB at H, connect CH and PF. Because APlBE, therefore quadrilateral APEB is a parallelogram, thus PE ∥ AB, PE = AB. Since quadrilateral BDEF is a parallelogram, therefore EF ∥ BD, EF = BD, which means EF ∥ AB, thus P, E, F are collinear. Let BD = a, since BD = 1/4 AB, therefore PE = AB = 4a, then PF = PE - EF = 3a. Because PH ∥ BC, therefore the area of △HBC is equal to the area of △PBC. Since PF ∥ AB, therefore quadrilateral BFPH is a parallelogram, thus BH = PF = 3a. Since the area ratio of △HBC to △ABC is BH:AB = 3a:4a = 3:4, therefore the area ratio of △PBC to △ABC is 3:4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,ED∥BC,∠ABC和∠ACB的平分线分别交ED于点G、F,若FG=2,ED=6,则EB+DC的值为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ED ∥ BC, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect ED at points G and F, respectively. If FG = 2, ED = 6, then the value of EB + DC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ED ∥ BC, therefore ∠EGB = ∠GBC, ∠DFC = ∠FCB. Since ∠GBC = ∠GBE, ∠FCB = ∠FCD, therefore ∠EGB = ∠EBG, ∠DCF = ∠DFC, thus BE = EG, CD = DF. Given that FG = 2, ED = 6, therefore EB + CD = EG + DF = EF + FG + FG + DG = ED + FG = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知AE平分∠BAC,BE⊥AE于E,ED∥AC,∠BAE=36°,那么∠BED的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AE bisects ∠BAC, BE ⊥ AE at E, ED ∥ AC, ∠BAE = 36°, then the degree of ∠BED is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AE bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠BAE = ∠CAE = 36°. Since ED ∥ AC, therefore ∠CAE + ∠DEA = 180°, thus ∠DEA = 180° - 36° = 144°. Because ∠AED + ∠AEB + ∠BED = 360°, therefore ∠BED = 360° - 144° - 90° = 126°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,BC=4,BD平分∠ABC,过点A作AD⊥BD于点D,过点D作DE∥CB,分別交AB、AC于点E、F,若EF=2DF,则AB的长为()
answer_cot: 如图,延长AD,BC交于点G,∵BD平分∠ABC,∴∠ABD=∠GBD,∵AD⊥BD于点D,∴∠ADB=∠GDB=90°,又∵BD=BD,∴△ABD≌△GBD(ASA),∴AB=BG,∴D是AG的中点,又∵DE∥BG,∴E是AB的中点,F是AC的中点,∴DE是△ABG的中位线,EF是△ABC的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BC=2,又∵EF=2DF,∴DF=1,∴DE=3,∴BG=2DE=6,∴AB=6,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BC = 4, BD bisects ∠ABC, draw AD ⊥ BD at point D, draw DE ∥ CB, intersecting AB and AC at points E and F respectively, if EF = 2DF, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, extend AD and BC to intersect at point G. Because BD bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABD = ∠GBD. Since AD ⊥ BD at point D, therefore ∠ADB = ∠GDB = 90°. Also, since BD = BD, therefore △ABD ≅ △GBD (ASA), thus AB = BG. Hence, D is the midpoint of AG. Moreover, since DE ∥ BG, therefore E is the midpoint of AB, and F is the midpoint of AC. Thus, DE is the midline of △ABG, and EF is the midline of △ABC, therefore EF = 1/2 BC = 2. Given that EF = 2DF, therefore DF = 1, thus DE = 3. Therefore, BG = 2DE = 6, thus AB = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,D为△ABC内一点,CD平分∠ACB,BD⊥CD,∠A=∠ABD,若AC=5,BC=3,则CD的长是()
answer_cot: 延长BD,与AC交于点E,∵CD平分∠ACB,∴∠ACD=∠BCD,∵BD⊥CD,∴∠BDC=∠EDC=90°,在△BCD和△ECD中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠BCD=∠ECD}\\{CD=CD}\\{∠BDC=∠EDC=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△BCD≌△ECD(ASA),∴BC=EC=3,BD=DE,∵∠A=∠ABE,∴AE=BE=AC-EC=AC-BC=5-3=2,∴BD=1,在Rt△BDC中,BD=1,BC=3,根据勾股定理得:CD=√{3^{2}-1^{2}}=2√{2}．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, D is a point inside △ABC, CD bisects ∠ACB, BD ⊥ CD, ∠A = ∠ABD, if AC = 5, BC = 3, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend BD to intersect AC at point E. Since CD bisects ∠ACB, therefore ∠ACD = ∠BCD. Since BD ⊥ CD, therefore ∠BDC = ∠EDC = 90°. In △BCD and △ECD, we have {∠BCD = ∠ECD, CD = CD, ∠BDC = ∠EDC = 90°}, therefore △BCD ≅ △ECD (ASA), thus BC = EC = 3, BD = DE. Since ∠A = ∠ABE, therefore AE = BE = AC - EC = AC - BC = 5 - 3 = 2, thus BD = 1. In the right triangle △BDC, with BD = 1 and BC = 3, according to the Pythagorean theorem, we get: CD = √{3² - 1²} = 2√{2}. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,∠MON=30°,且OP平分∠MON,过点P作PQ∥OM交ON于点Q．若点P到OM的距离为2,则OQ的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠MON = 30°, and OP bisects ∠MON, draw PQ ∥ OM intersecting ON at point Q. If the distance from point P to OM is 2, then the length of OQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw PF ⊥ OM and PE ⊥ ON, because OP bisects ∠MON, therefore OE = OF, ∠1 = ∠2. Since PQ ∥ OM, therefore ∠1 = ∠3, thus ∠2 = ∠3 = (1/2)∠MON = 15°, therefore OQ = PQ, ∠4 = 30°, thus PQ = 2PE = 4, therefore OQ = PQ = 4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=8,AC=5,过点A的直线DE∥CB,∠ABC与∠ACB的平分线分别交DE于E,D两点,则DE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = 8, AC = 5, the straight line DE through point A is parallel to CB, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect DE at points E and D respectively, then the length of DE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BE bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABE = ∠EBC. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore ∠E = ∠EBC. Thus, ∠E = ∠ABE, therefore AB = AE. Similarly, it can be deduced: AD = AC. Therefore, DE = AD + AE = AC + AB = 5 + 8 = 13. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,D是BC上一点,且DE∥AC,交AB于E,DF∥AB,交AC于F,若四边形AEDF的周长为12cm,则等腰三角形ABC的腰长为()
answer_cot: ∵DE∥AC,DF∥AB,∴四边形AEDF为平行四边形,∴DE=AF,AE=DF,∴C~四边形AEDF~=AE+ED+DF+FA=2(AE+ED)=12cm,∴AE+ED=6cm．∵AB=AC,∴∠B=∠C．∵DE∥AC,∴∠EDB=∠C=∠B,∴EB=ED,∴AB=AE+EB=AE+ED=6cm．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, D is a point on BC, and DE ∥ AC, intersecting AB at E, DF ∥ AB, intersecting AC at F. If the perimeter of quadrilateral AEDF is 12 cm, then the length of the sides of the isosceles triangle ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC and DF ∥ AB, therefore quadrilateral AEDF is a parallelogram, thus DE = AF, AE = DF. Therefore, the perimeter of quadrilateral AEDF = AE + ED + DF + FA = 2(AE + ED) = 12 cm, thus AE + ED = 6 cm. Since AB = AC, therefore ∠B = ∠C. Because DE ∥ AC, therefore ∠EDB = ∠C = ∠B, thus EB = ED, therefore AB = AE + EB = AE + ED = 6 cm. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,O是△ABC的∠ABC,∠ACB的角平分线的交点,OD∥AB交BC于D,OE∥AC交BC于E,若BC=16,则△ODE的周长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, O is the intersection point of the angle bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB in △ABC, OD ∥ AB intersects BC at D, OE ∥ AC intersects BC at E, if BC = 16, then the perimeter of △ODE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BO bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABO = ∠DBO. Also, since OD ∥ AB, therefore ∠ABO = ∠DOB. Thus, ∠DBO = ∠DOB, therefore OD = BD. Similarly, OE = CE. Since BC = 16, then the perimeter c of △ODE is OD + DE + OE = BD + DE + EC = BC = 16. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图所示,BD平分∠ABC,DE∥BC,且∠D=30°,则∠AED的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, BD bisects ∠ABC, DE ∥ BC, and ∠D = 30°, then the degree of ∠AED is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ BC, and ∠D = 30°, therefore ∠BAC = ∠D = 30°, ∠AED = ∠ABC. Since BD bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABC = 60°, thus ∠AED = 60°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△PBC的面积为10cm^2^,AP垂直∠B的平分线BP于P,则△ABC的面积为()
answer_cot: 如图,延长AP交BC于点Q,∵AP垂直∠ABC的平分线BP于P,∴AP=QP,∴S~△ABP~=S~△BQP~,S~△APC~=S~△PQC~,∴S~△ABC~=2S~阴影~=20cm^2^,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the area of △PBC is 10 cm², AP is perpendicular to the bisector of ∠B at BP, then the area of △ABC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, extending AP to intersect BC at point Q, because AP is perpendicular to the bisector of ∠ABC at P, therefore AP = QP, therefore the area of △ABP is equal to the area of △BQP, and the area of △APC is equal to the area of △PQC, therefore the area of △ABC is twice the shaded area = 20 cm². Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AB∥CD,AD∥BC,且∠BAD、∠ADC的角平分线AE、DF分别交BC于点E、F．若EF=2,AB=5,则AD的长为()
answer_cot: ∵AD∥BC,∴∠ADF=∠DFC,∵DF平分∠ADC,∴∠ADF=∠CDF,∴∠DFC=∠FDC,∴CF=CD,同理BE=AB,∵AB∥CD,AD∥BC,∴四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AD=BC,∴AB=BE=CF=CD=5,∴BC=BE+CF-EF=8,∴AD=BC=8．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AB ∥ CD, AD ∥ BC, and the angle bisectors of ∠BAD and ∠ADC, AE and DF, intersect BC at points E and F respectively. If EF = 2, AB = 5, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AD ∥ BC, therefore ∠ADF = ∠DFC. Since DF bisects ∠ADC, therefore ∠ADF = ∠CDF, thus ∠DFC = ∠FDC, therefore CF = CD. Similarly, BE = AB. Because AB ∥ CD and AD ∥ BC, therefore quadrilateral ABCD is a parallelogram, thus AB = CD and AD = BC. Therefore, AB = BE = CF = CD = 5, thus BC = BE + CF - EF = 8, therefore AD = BC = 8. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图△ABC中,∠A=36°,AB=AC,BF平分∠ABC,E是AF的中点,DE⊥AC交AB于D,连接DC交BF于P,∠DPB的度数是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = 36°, AB = AC, BF bisects ∠ABC, E is the midpoint of AF, DE ⊥ AC intersects AB at D, connect DC and intersect BF at P, the degree of ∠DPB is ()
answer_cot_en: By connecting DF, because AB = AC and ∠A = 36°, therefore ∠ABC = ∠ACB = 72°. Since BF bisects ∠ABC, therefore ∠ABF = ∠FBC = 36°, thus ∠BFC = ∠BCF = 72°. Because AE = EF and DE ⊥ AF, therefore AD = DF, thus ∠DFE = 36°, and therefore ∠DFP = 72°. Hence, ∠DFB = ∠CFB. In triangles △DBF and △CBF, we have \(\left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠DFB=∠CFB}\\{BF=BF}\\{∠DBF=∠CBF}\end{array}\right.\), therefore △BDF is congruent to △CBF (ASA), thus BD = BC. Since BF bisects ∠ABC, therefore BP ⊥ CD, thus ∠BPD = 90°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,CE平分∠BCD且CE⊥BD于点E,∠DAB=∠ABD,AC=24,△BCD的周长为34,则BD的长为()
answer_cot: ∵CE平分∠BCD且CE⊥BD于点E,∴△DCB是等腰三角形,∴DC=CB,∵∠DAB=∠ABD,∴AD=DB,∵AC=AD+DC=DB+DC=24,∵△BCD的周长=DC+DB+CB=34,∴CB=34-24=10,∴DC=10,∴BD=24-10=14,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, CE bisects ∠BCD and CE ⊥ BD at point E, ∠DAB = ∠ABD, AC = 24, the perimeter of △BCD is 34, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because CE bisects ∠BCD and CE ⊥ BD at point E, therefore △DCB is an isosceles triangle, thus DC = CB. Since ∠DAB = ∠ABD, therefore AD = DB. Given that AC = AD + DC = DB + DC = 24, and the perimeter of △BCD = DC + DB + CB = 34, therefore CB = 34 - 24 = 10, thus DC = 10, therefore BD = 24 - 10 = 14. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,△ABC中,BI,CI平分∠ABC,∠ACF,过点I作ID∥BC分别交AC,AB于点E,D．若BD=9cm,CE=4cm,则DE等于()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BI and CI bisect ∠ABC and ∠ACF, respectively. Through point I, draw ID ∥ BC intersecting AC and AB at points E and D. If BD = 9 cm, CE = 4 cm, then DE is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because BI and CI each bisect ∠ABC and ∠ACF, respectively, therefore ∠ABI = ∠CBI, ∠ECI = ∠ICF. Since DE ∥ BC, therefore ∠DIB = ∠CBI, ∠EIC = ∠ICF. Thus ∠ABI = ∠DIB, ∠ECI = ∠EIC. Therefore, DI = BD = 9cm, EI = CE = 4cm, hence DE = DI - EI = 5(cm). Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在等腰直角三角形ABC中,∠BAC=90°,在BC上截取BD=BA,作∠ABC的平分线与AD相交于点P,连结PC,若△ABC的面积为4cm^2^,则△BPC的面积为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the isosceles right triangle ABC, ∠BAC = 90°, cut off BD = BA on BC, make the bisector of ∠ABC intersect AD at point P, connect PC, if the area of △ABC is 4 cm², then the area of △BPC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because BD = BA, and BP is the bisector of ∠ABC, therefore AP = PD. Thus, the area of △BPD = 1/2 the area of △ABD, and the area of △CPD = 1/2 the area of △ACD. Therefore, the area of △BPC = the area of △BPD + the area of △CPD = 1/2 the area of △ABD + 1/2 the area of △ACD = 1/2 the area of △ABC. Since the area of △ABC is 4 cm², therefore the area of △BPC = 1/2 × 4 = 2 cm². Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC和∠ACB的平分线交于点E,过点E作MN∥BC交AB于M,交AC于N,若BM+CN=8,则线段MN的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect at point E. Through point E, MN ∥ BC intersects AB at M, intersects AC at N. If BM + CN = 8, then the length of the line segment MN is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect at point E, therefore ∠MBE = ∠EBC, ∠ECN = ∠ECB. Since MN ∥ BC, therefore ∠EBC = ∠MEB, ∠NEC = ∠ECB. Thus ∠MBE = ∠MEB, ∠NEC = ∠ECN, therefore BM = ME, EN = CN. Hence, MN = ME + EN, which means MN = BM + CN. Since BM + CN = 8, therefore MN = 8. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC=10,BC=12,点D是BC上一点,DE∥AC,DF∥AB,则△BED与△DFC的周长的和为()
answer_cot: ∵DE∥AC,DF∥AB,∴四边形AEDF是平行四边形,∴DF=AE,又∵DE∥AC,∴∠C=∠EDB,又∵AB=AC,∴∠B=∠C,∴∠B=∠EDB,∴DE=BE,∴DF+DE=AE+BE,同理:BE+CF=AF+CF=AC∴△BED与△DFC的周长的和=△ABC的周长=10+10+12=32,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC = 10, BC = 12, point D is a point on BC, DE ∥ AC, DF ∥ AB, then the sum of the perimeters of △BED and △DFC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE ∥ AC and DF ∥ AB, therefore quadrilateral AEDF is a parallelogram, thus DF = AE. Also, because DE ∥ AC, therefore ∠C = ∠EDB. And since AB = AC, therefore ∠B = ∠C, thus ∠B = ∠EDB, therefore DE = BE. Hence, DF + DE = AE + BE. Similarly, BE + CF = AF + CF = AC. Therefore, the sum of the perimeters of △BED and △DFC is equal to the perimeter of △ABC = 10 + 10 + 12 = 32. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,△ABC是等边三角形,且BD=CE,∠1=15°,则∠2的度数为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an equilateral triangle, and BD = CE, ∠1 = 15°, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: In △ABD and △BCE, since △ABD is congruent to △BCE, therefore ∠1 = ∠CBE. Because ∠2 = ∠1 + ∠ABE, therefore ∠2 = ∠CBE + ∠ABE = ∠ABC = 60°. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,将边长为5个单位长度的等边△ABC沿边BC向右平移4个单位得到△A′B′C′,则线段B′C的长为()
answer_cot: 由平移得,BB′=4,又∵等边三角形ABC中,BC=5,∴B′C=BC-BB′=5-4=1,故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the equilateral △ABC with a side length of 5 units is translated 4 units to the right along side BC to obtain △A′B′C′, then the length of line segment B′C is ()
answer_cot_en: By translation, BB′ = 4, and since in the equilateral triangle ABC, BC = 5, therefore B′C = BC - BB′ = 5 - 4 = 1. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,将边长为6cm的等边△ABC沿边BC向右平移5cm,得到△A′B′C′,则四边形ABC′A′的周长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, an equilateral △ABC with a side length of 6 cm is translated 5 cm to the right along side BC to obtain △A′B′C′, then the perimeter of quadrilateral ABC′A′ is ()
answer_cot_en: Since BB′ = CC′ = AA′ = 5cm, then BC′ = BC + CC′ = 6 + 5 = 11cm. Therefore, the perimeter of quadrilateral ABC′A′ = 6 + 5 + 6 + 11 = 28cm. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,BD=\frac{9}{4}BC,等边△BEF的顶点F在BC上,边EF交AD于点P,若BE=10,BC=14,则PE的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, BD = \(\frac{9}{4}\)BC, the vertex F of the equilateral △BEF is on BC, side EF intersects AD at point P, if BE = 10, BC = 14, then the length of PE is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, BD = 1/2 BC = 7, therefore AD ⊥ BC. Since △BEF is an equilateral triangle, therefore ∠BFE = 60°, BF = BE = EF = 10, therefore DF = BF - BD = 10 - 7 = 3. In right triangle △PDF, because ∠PFD = 60°, therefore ∠DPF = 30°, therefore PF = 2DF = 6, therefore PE = EF - PF = 10 - 6 = 4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,两个等边△ABD,△CBD的边长均为1,将△ABD沿AC方向向右平移到△A′B′D′的位置,得到图2,则阴影部分的周长为()
answer_cot: 如图,∵两个等边△ABD,△CBD的边长均为1,将△ABD沿AC方向向右平移到△A′B′D′的位置,∴△DEG,△BFH,△D′EM,△B′NF是等边三角形,∴GE=DG,HF=BH,FN=B′N,EM=D′M,∴阴影部分的周长=GE+GH+HF+FN+MN+EM=DG+MN+BH+B′*N*+MN+D′M=BD+B′D′=1+1=2．故选:B．≥ft.\begin{array}{l}{\gamma^{′}<a}\\{z^{\varphi}>(}\\{z_{-5}^{\varphi});}\\{v^{′}≤q\frac{v}{m},}\\{v^{′}≤q\frac{v}{m},}{\hat{\infty}:}\\\end{array}\right.
question_en: As shown in the figure, the side lengths of the two equilateral triangles △ABD and △CBD are both 1. Triangle △ABD is moved to the right along the direction of AC to the position of △A′B′D′, resulting in figure 2, then the perimeter of the shaded area is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because the two equilateral triangles △ABD and △CBD each have a side length of 1, moving △ABD to the right along the direction of AC to position △A′B′D′, therefore △DEG, △BFH, △D′EM, and △B′NF are equilateral triangles. Thus, GE = DG, HF = BH, FN = B′N, EM = D′M, therefore the perimeter of the shaded area = GE + GH + HF + FN + MN + EM = DG + MN + BH + B′N + MN + D′M = BD + B′D′ = 1 + 1 = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 三个等边三角形的摆放位置如图,若∠3=60°,则∠1+∠2的度数为()
question_en: The placement of three equilateral triangles is as shown in the figure. If ∠3 = 60°, then the degree sum of ∠1 + ∠2 is ()
answer_cot_en: Because the figure consists of three equilateral triangles, ∠3 = 60°, therefore ∠ABC = 180° - 60° - 60° = 60°, ∠ACB = 180° - 60° - ∠2 = 120° - ∠2, ∠BAC = 180° - 60° - ∠1 = 120° - ∠1. Since ∠ABC + ∠ACB + ∠BAC = 180°, therefore 60° + (120° - ∠2) + (120° - ∠1) = 180°, thus ∠1 + ∠2 = 120°. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,一棵树在一次强台风中于离地面4米处折断倒下,倒下部分与地面成30°夹角,这棵树在折断前的高度为()米．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a tree broke down 4 meters above the ground during a strong typhoon, and the fallen part forms a 30° angle with the ground. The height of the tree before it broke was () meters.
answer_cot_en: Because ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 30°, therefore AB = 2BC = 8 (meters). Therefore, the height of the tree before it broke was 4 + 8 = 12 (meters). Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC=10,∠BAC=120°,AD是△ABC的中线,AE是∠BAD的角平分线,DF∥AB交AE的延长线于点F,则DF的长是()
answer_cot: ∵AB=AC,AD是△ABC的中线,∴AD⊥BC,∠BAD=∠CAD=\frac{1}{2}∠BAC=\frac{1}{2}×120°=60°,∵AE是∠BAD的角平分线,∴∠DAE=∠EAB=\frac{1}{2}∠BAD=\frac{1}{2}×60°=30°,∵DF∥AB,∴∠F=∠BAE=30°,∴∠DAE=∠F=30°,∴AD=DF,∵∠B=90°-60°=30°,∴AD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×10=5,∴DF=5,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC = 10, ∠BAC = 120°, AD is the median of △ABC, AE is the angle bisector of ∠BAD, DF ∥ AB intersects the extension of AE at point F, then the length of DF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because AB = AC, and AD is the median of △ABC, therefore AD ⊥ BC, ∠BAD = ∠CAD = 1/2 ∠BAC = 1/2 × 120° = 60°. Since AE is the angle bisector of ∠BAD, therefore ∠DAE = ∠EAB = 1/2 ∠BAD = 1/2 × 60° = 30°. Because DF ∥ AB, therefore ∠F = ∠BAE = 30°, thus ∠DAE = ∠F = 30°, therefore AD = DF. Since ∠B = 90° - 60° = 30°, therefore AD = 1/2 AB = 1/2 × 10 = 5, thus DF = 5. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知∠ACB=60°,PC=12,点M,N在边CB上,PM=PN．若MN=3,则CM的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠ACB = 60°, PC = 12, points M and N are on side CB, PM = PN. If MN = 3, then the length of CM is ()
answer_cot_en: Draw PD perpendicular to CB at point D. Because ∠ACB = 60°, PD ⊥ CB, and PC = 12, therefore DC = 6. Since PM = PN and MN = 3, and PD ⊥ OB, therefore MD = ND = 1.5. Thus, CM = 6 - 1.5 = 4.5. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别是边AB、AC上的点,DE垂直平分AB,∠C=90°,∠BAC=15°．若BC=3cm,则AE的长度为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are respectively on sides AB and AC, DE perpendicularly bisects AB, ∠C = 90°, ∠BAC = 15°. If BC = 3 cm, then the length of AE is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect BE. Because DE is the perpendicular bisector of AB, therefore AE = BE, thus ∠ABE = ∠A = 15°, therefore ∠BEC = 30°. Since ∠C = 90° and BC = 3cm, therefore BE = 2BC = 6cm, thus AE = BE = 6cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC是边长为5的等边三角形,点D,E分别在BC,AC上,DE∥AB,过点E作EF⊥DE,交BC的的延长线于点F,若BD=2,则DF等于()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠B=60°,∵DE∥AB,∴∠EDC=∠B=60°,∵EF⊥DE,∴∠DEF=90°,∴∠F=30°,∵∠ACB=∠EDC=60°,∴△DEC是等边三角形,∴ED=DC=BC-BD=5-2=3,∵∠DEF=90°,∠F=30°,∴DF=2DE=6．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an equilateral triangle with a side length of 5, points D and E are on BC and AC respectively, DE ∥ AB, draw EF ⊥ DE, and it intersects the extension of BC at point F. If BD = 2, then DF is equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore ∠B = 60°. Since DE ∥ AB, therefore ∠EDC = ∠B = 60°. Because EF ⊥ DE, therefore ∠DEF = 90°, thus ∠F = 30°. Since ∠ACB = ∠EDC = 60°, therefore △DEC is an equilateral triangle, thus ED = DC = BC - BD = 5 - 2 = 3. Given that ∠DEF = 90° and ∠F = 30°, therefore DF = 2DE = 6. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 某商场一楼与二楼之间的手扶电梯如图所示．其中AB、CD分别表示一楼、二楼地面的水平线,∠ABC=150°,BC的长是8m,则乘电梯从点B到点C上升的高度h是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AB and CD represent the horizontal lines of the first and second floors respectively, ∠ABC = 150°, the length of BC is 8 m, then the height h of the elevator ride from point B to point C is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct CE ⊥ AB and extend it to meet AB at E. Because ∠ABC = 150°, therefore ∠CBE = 30°, thus CE = 1/2 BC = 4cm. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,∠CBA=60°．△ABE是等边三角形,D是AB的中点,连接CD并延长,交AE于点F．若CD=2,则EF的长为()
answer_cot: ∵∠ACB=90°,∠CBA=60°,∴∠ABC=30°,∴AB=2CD=4,∵∠ACB=90°,D是AB的中点,∴CD=BD,又∠CBA=60°,∴△CDB是等边三角形,∵△ABE是等边三角形,∴DF∥BE,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}AE=2,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠CBA = 60°. △ABE is an equilateral triangle, D is the midpoint of AB, connect CD and extend it to intersect AE at point F. If CD = 2, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACB = 90° and ∠CBA = 60°, therefore ∠ABC = 30°, thus AB = 2CD = 4. Since ∠ACB = 90° and D is the midpoint of AB, therefore CD = BD. Also, ∠CBA = 60°, therefore △CDB is an equilateral triangle. Because △ABE is an equilateral triangle, therefore DF ∥ BE, thus EF = 1/2 AE = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图折叠直角三角形纸片的直角,使点C落在斜边AB上的点E处,已知CD=1,∠B=30°,则BD的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, fold the right-angled triangle paper such that point C falls on point E on the hypotenuse AB. Given that CD = 1, ∠B = 30°, then the length of BD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ADE is symmetrical to △ADC about AD, therefore △ADE is congruent to △ADC, thus DE = DC, ∠AED = ∠C = 90°, therefore ∠BED = 90°. Since ∠B = 30°, therefore BD = 2DE. Given that DC = 1, therefore BD = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC为等边三角形,点D为BC边上的中点,DF⊥AB于点F,点E在BA的延长线上,且ED=EC,若AE=2,则AF的长为()
answer_cot: 过点E作EH∥AC交BC的延长线于H,∴∠H=∠ACB=60°,又∠B=60°,∴△EBH是等边三角形,∴EB=EH=BH,∴CH=AE=2,∵ED=EC,∴∠EDC=∠ECD,又∠B=∠H,∴∠BED=∠HEC,在△BED和△HEC中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{EB=EH}\\{∠BED=∠HEC}\\{ED=EC}\end{array}\right.,∴△BED≌△HEC,∴BD=CH=2,∴BA=BC=4,BF=\frac{1}{2}BD=1,∴AF=3．故选:D．f(x):}\\{z≠q}\\{\hat{f}\sim3}{-n}\\{\hat{f}\sim3}{-x_{n}}\\\end{array}\right.
question_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is an equilateral triangle, point D is the midpoint of side BC, DF ⊥ AB at point F, point E is on the extension of BA, and ED = EC. If AE = 2, then the length of AF is ()
answer_cot_en: Through point E, construct line EH ∥ AC, intersecting the extension of BC at H, therefore ∠H = ∠ACB = 60°. Also, ∠B = 60°, therefore △EBH is an equilateral triangle, thus EB = EH = BH. Hence, CH = AE = 2. Since ED = EC, therefore ∠EDC = ∠ECD. Also, ∠B = ∠H, therefore ∠BED = ∠HEC. In △BED and △HEC, we have \left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{EB=EH}\\{∠BED=∠HEC}\\{ED=EC}\end{array}\right., therefore △BED ≅ △HEC, thus BD = CH = 2. Therefore, BA = BC = 4, BF = \frac{1}{2}BD = 1, hence AF = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,想测量旗杆AB的高,在C点测得∠ACB=30°,然后在地面上沿CD方向从C点到D点,使∠ACD=∠ACB,DA⊥AC于点A,此时测得CD=36m,则旗杆高()
answer_cot: ∵∠ACD=∠ACB,AB⊥AC,AD⊥AC,∴知△ABC和△ADC关于AC成轴对称,∴AD=AB,∵∠ACD=∠ACB=30°,∴AD=\frac{1}{2}CD=18m,∴则旗杆AB高=18m,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, to measure the height of the flagpole AB, the angle ∠ACB = 30° is measured at point C. Then, on the ground along the direction CD from point C to point D, make ∠ACD = ∠ACB, DA ⊥ AC at point A. At this time, CD = 36 m is measured, then the height of the flagpole is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠ACD = ∠ACB, AB ⊥ AC, and AD ⊥ AC, therefore it is known that △ABC and △ADC are axially symmetrical about AC, thus AD = AB. Since ∠ACD = ∠ACB = 30°, therefore AD = 1/2 CD = 18m, hence the flagpole AB's height = 18m. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,一架梯子斜靠在墙上,梯子与地面的夹角∠ABC=60°,梯子的长为5米,则梯子与墙角的距离BC为()米．
question_en: As shown in the figure, a ladder is leaning against a wall, the angle between the ladder and the ground ∠ABC = 60°, the length of the ladder is 5 meters, then the distance BC from the ladder to the corner of the wall is () meters.
answer_cot_en: Because in right triangle △ABC, ∠ABC = 60°, ∠ACB = 90°, therefore ∠BAC = 30°. Since AB = 5 meters, therefore BC = 1/2 AB = 2.5 meters. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 小亮为宣传2010年上海世博会,设计了形状如图所示的彩旗,图中∠ACB=90°,∠D=15°,点A在CD上,AD=AB=4cm,则AC的长为()
question_en: Xiao Liang designed a colorful flag to promote the 2010 Shanghai World Expo, as shown in the figure. In the figure, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠D = 15°, point A is on CD, AD = AB = 4 cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, because AD = AB = 4cm, and ∠D = 15°, therefore ∠ABD = ∠D = 15°, thus ∠BAC = ∠ABD + ∠D = 30°. Since ∠ACB = 90° and AB = 4cm, therefore BC = 1/2 AB = 2cm. In right triangle △ABC, AC = √(AB² - BC²) = √(4² - 2²) = 2√3 cm. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图所示,一条钢丝绳固定杆BC,钢丝绳与地面夹角为30°,BC高18米,则钢丝绳AC的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, a steel wire rope is fixed to pole BC, the angle between the steel wire rope and the ground is 30°, BC is 18 m high, then the length of the steel wire rope AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because in the right-angled triangle △ABC, ∠ABC = 90°, ∠CAB = 30°, therefore AC = 2BC = 36 meters. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠A=15°,∠DBC=60°,BC=1,则AD的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 15°, ∠DBC = 60°, BC = 1, then the length of AD is ()
answer_cot_en: Because ∠DBC = 60°, ∠C = 90°, therefore ∠BDC = 90° - 60° = 30°, thus BD = 2BC = 2×1 = 2. Since ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 15°, therefore ∠ABC = 90° - 15° = 75°, thus ∠ABD = ∠ABC - ∠DBC = 75° - 60° = 15°, therefore ∠ABD = ∠A, thus AD = BD = 2. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠A=30°,点D在线段AB的垂直平分线上,若AD=6,则CD的长为()
answer_cot: △ABC中,∠C=90°,∠A=30°,∴∠ABC=60°,∵点D在线段AB的垂直平分线上,∴DB=DA=6,∴∠DBA=∠A=30°,∴∠DBC=30°,∴CD=\frac{1}{2}BD=3,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 30°, point D is on the perpendicular bisector of segment AB, if AD = 6, then the length of CD is ()
answer_cot_en: In △ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠ABC = 60°. Since point D is on the perpendicular bisector of segment AB, therefore DB = DA = 6, thus ∠DBA = ∠A = 30°, therefore ∠DBC = 30°, hence CD = 1/2 BD = 3. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠B=15°,DE垂直平分AB,垂足是点E,若AD=8cm．则AC的长是()
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = 90°, ∠B = 15°, DE is the perpendicular bisector of AB, and the foot of the perpendicular is point E. If AD = 8 cm, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because DE is the perpendicular bisector of AB, therefore AD = BD = 8cm, therefore ∠BAD = ∠B = 15°, thus ∠ADC = ∠BAD + ∠B = 15° + 15° = 30°. Since ∠C = 90°, therefore in right triangle ACD, AC = 1/2 AD = 1/2 × 8 = 4(cm). Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,矩形ABCD中,AB=2,BC=3,以A为圆心,1为半径画⊙A,E是圆⊙A上一动点,P是BC上一动点,则PE+PD最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,以BC为轴作矩形ABCD的对称图形A′BCD′以及对称圆A′,连接A′D交BC于P,则DE′就是PE+PD最小值；∵矩形ABCD中,AB=2,BC=3,圆A的半径为1,∴A′D′=BC=3,DD′=2DC=4,AE′=1,∴A′D=5,∴DE′=5-1=4∴PE+PD=PE′+PD=DE′=4,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 2, BC = 3, with A as the center and 1 as the radius, draw ⊙A, E is a moving point on circle ⊙A, P is a moving point on BC, then the minimum value of PE + PD is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, the symmetrical figure A'BDC' of rectangle ABCD is constructed with BC as the axis, as well as the symmetrical circle A'. Line A'D intersects BC at point P, then DE' represents the minimum value of PE + PD; because in rectangle ABCD, AB = 2, BC = 3, and the radius of circle A is 1, therefore A'D' = BC = 3, DD' = 2DC = 4, AE' = 1, thus A'D = 5, therefore DE' = 5 - 1 = 4. Hence, PE + PD = PE' + PD = DE' = 4. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知梯形ABCD,AD∥BC,AD=DC=4,BC=8,点N在BC上,CN=2,E是AB中点,在AC上找一点M使EM+MN的值最小,此时其最小值一定等于()
answer_cot: 作N点关于AC的对称点N',连接N'E交AC于M．∴∠DAC=∠ACB,∠DAC=∠DCA,∴∠ACB=∠DCA,∴点N关于AC对称点N′在CD上,CN=CN′=2,又∵DC=4,∴EN'为梯形的中位线,∴EN′=\frac{1}{2}(AD+BC)=6,∴EM+MN最小值为:EN′=6．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that trapezoid ABCD, AD ∥ BC, AD = DC = 4, BC = 8, point N is on BC, CN = 2, E is the midpoint of AB, find a point M on AC such that the value of EM + MN is minimized, at this time its minimum value must be equal to ()
answer_cot_en: Construct the symmetric point N' of point N with respect to AC, and connect N'E intersecting AC at M. Therefore, ∠DAC = ∠ACB, ∠DAC = ∠DCA, thus ∠ACB = ∠DCA. Therefore, the symmetric point N' of point N with respect to AC lies on CD, CN = CN' = 2. Since DC = 4, therefore EN' is the midline of the trapezoid, thus EN' = (1/2)(AD + BC) = 6. Therefore, the minimum value of EM + MN is: EN' = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,长方体的长为5,宽为3,高为12,点B离点C的距离为2,一只蚂蚁如果要沿着长方体的表面从点A爬到点B,需要爬行的最短距离是()
answer_cot: 将长方体展开,连接A、B,根据两点之间线段最短,BD=2+3=5,AD=12,由勾股定理得:AB=√{AD^{2}+BD^{2}}=13．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the rectangular solid is 5, the width is 3, the height is 12, the distance from point B to point C is 2, if an ant wants to crawl from point A to point B along the surface of the rectangular solid, the shortest distance it needs to crawl is ()
answer_cot_en: After unfolding the rectangular prism and connecting points A and B, based on the principle that the shortest distance between two points is a straight line, BD = 2 + 3 = 5, AD = 12. By the Pythagorean theorem, AB = √(AD² + BD²) = 13. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,等腰△ABC的底边BC长为6,面积是36,腰AC的垂直平分线EF分别交AC,AB边于E,F点．若点D为BC边的中点,点M为线段EF上一动点,则△CDM周长的最小值为()
answer_cot: 如图:连接AD交EF于点M,∵等腰△ABC的底边BC长为6,点D为BC边的中点,∴AD⊥BC,BD=CD=3,∵EF是腰AC的垂直平分线,连接CM,∴AM=CM,此时△CDM的周长为:CM+DM+CD=AM+DM+CD=AD+CDCD的长为3固定,∴根据两点之间线段最短,△CDM的周长最小．∵S~△ABC~=4∠-\lambda(x)BC•AD,∴4∠-\lambda(x)×6•AD=36,∴AD=12,∴AD+CD=12+3=15．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in the isosceles △ABC, the base BC is 6 long, the area is 36, the perpendicular bisector EF of the waist AC intersects sides AC and AB at points E and F, respectively. If point D is the midpoint of side BC, and point M is a moving point on line segment EF, then the minimum perimeter of △CDM is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram: Connect AD intersecting EF at point M. Because in isosceles triangle ABC, the base BC is 6 in length, and point D is the midpoint of side BC, therefore AD ⊥ BC, BD = CD = 3. Since EF is the perpendicular bisector of the side AC, connect CM, therefore AM = CM. At this point, the perimeter of triangle CDM is: CM + DM + CD = AM + DM + CD = AD + CD (since the length of CD is fixed at 3). Therefore, based on the principle that the shortest distance between two points is a straight line, the perimeter of triangle CDM is minimized. Because the area of triangle ABC is 4 times the product of BC and AD, therefore 4 times the product of 6 and AD equals 36, therefore AD = 12, thus AD + CD = 12 + 3 = 15. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,∠AOB=20°,点M、N分别是边OA、OB上的定点,点P、Q分别是边OB、OA上的动点,记∠MPQ=α,∠PQN=β,当MP+PQ+QN最小时,则β-α的值为()
answer_cot: 如图,作M关于OB的对称点M′,N关于OA的对称点N′,连接M′N′交OA于Q,交OB于P,则MP+PQ+QN最小,∴∠OPM=∠OPM′=∠NPQ,∠OQP=∠AQN′=∠AQN,∴∠QPN=\frac{1}{2}(180°-α)=∠AOB+∠MQP=20°+\frac{1}{2}(180°-β),∴180°-α=40°+(180°-β),∴β-α=40°,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = 20°, points M and N are fixed points on sides OA and OB respectively, points P and Q are moving points on sides OB and OA respectively, let ∠MPQ = α, ∠PQN = β, when MP + PQ + QN is at its minimum, then the value of β - α is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, construct the symmetric point M' of M with respect to OB, and the symmetric point N' of N with respect to OA, connect M'N' intersecting OA at Q and OB at P, then MP + PQ + QN is minimized. Therefore, ∠OPM = ∠OPM' = ∠NPQ, ∠OQP = ∠AQN' = ∠AQN, thus ∠QPN = 1/2(180° - α) = ∠AOB + ∠MQP = 20° + 1/2(180° - β), therefore 180° - α = 40° + (180° - β), hence β - α = 40°. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,在学习了轴对称后,小明在课外研究三角板时发现"两块完全相同的含有30°的三角板可以拼成一个等边三角形",请你帮他解决以下问题:在直角△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,∠A=30°,AC=6,BC≈3.5,点E、P分别在斜边AB和直角边AC上,则EP+BP的最小值是()
answer_cot: 作点B关于AC的对称点B′,过B′作B′E⊥AB交AC于点P,则EP+BP的最小值为B′E；∵∠A=30°,AC=6,BC≈3.5,∴AB≈7,sin∠B=\frac{AC}{AB}≈\frac{6}{7},∵∠B=60°,BB′≈7,∴sin∠B=\frac{EB^{′}}{BB^{′}}≈\frac{6}{7},∴EB′=6,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, after learning about axial symmetry, Xiaoming discovered outside of class that "two completely identical 30° set squares can be put together to form an equilateral triangle." Please help him solve the following problem: In right-angled △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, ∠A = 30°, AC = 6, BC ≈ 3.5, points E and P are respectively on the hypotenuse AB and the right-angle side AC, then the minimum value of EP + BP is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct point B' as the symmetric point of B with respect to AC, and draw B'E ⊥ AB intersecting AC at point P, then the minimum value of EP + BP is B'E; Because ∠A = 30°, AC = 6, BC ≈ 3.5, therefore AB ≈ 7, sin∠B ≈ \frac{AC}{AB} ≈ \frac{6}{7}, Since ∠B = 60°, BB' ≈ 7, therefore sin∠B = \frac{EB'}{BB'} ≈ \frac{6}{7}, thus EB' = 6. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,∠AOB=60°,点P是∠AOB内的定点且OP=3,若点M、N分别是射线OA、OB上异于点O的动点,则△PMN周长的最小值是()
answer_cot: 作点P关于OB的对称点P′,点P关于OA的对称点P′′,连接P′P′′与OA,OB分别交于点M与N则P′P′′的长即为△PMN周长的最小值,连接OP′,OP′′,过点O作OC⊥P′P′′,由对称性可知OP=OP′=OP′′,∵OP=3,∠AOB=60°,∴∠P′=∠P′′=30°,OP=OP′′=3,∴P′C=\frac{3√{3}}{2},∴P′P′′=3√{3}；故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = 60°, point P is a fixed point inside ∠AOB and OP = 3. If points M and N are moving points on rays OA and OB, different from point O, then the minimum value of the perimeter of △PMN is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct point P' as the reflection of point P across OB, and point P'' as the reflection of point P across OA. Draw lines P'P'' intersecting OA and OB at points M and N, respectively. The length of P'P'' is then the minimum perimeter of △PMN. Connect OP', OP'', and draw OC ⊥ P'P'', where by symmetry we know OP = OP' = OP''. Since OP = 3 and ∠AOB = 60°, therefore ∠P' = ∠P'' = 30°, and OP = OP'' = 3, thus P'C = 3√3/2, and therefore P'P'' = 3√3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AB=5,AC=4,AD平分∠BAC,DE⊥AB于E,若点P是直线AD上的动点,则PE+PB的最小值是()
answer_cot: Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AB=5,AC=4,∴BC=3,∵∠C=90°,∴DC⊥AC,∵DE⊥AB,∴∠ACD=∠AED=90°,AC=AE=4,∠CAD=∠EAD,∴BE=1,AD垂直平分CE,即C和E关于AD对称,CD=DE,∴当P和D重合时,PE+BP的值最小,∴PE+PB的最小值=BC=3,故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = 90°, AB = 5, AC = 4, AD bisects ∠BAC, DE ⊥ AB at E. If point P is a moving point on line AD, then the minimum value of PE + PB is ()
answer_cot_en: In right triangle △ABC, ∠C = 90°, AB = 5, AC = 4, therefore BC = 3. Since ∠C = 90°, therefore DC ⊥ AC, and DE ⊥ AB, thus ∠ACD = ∠AED = 90°, AC = AE = 4, ∠CAD = ∠EAD, therefore BE = 1, AD perpendicularly bisects CE, meaning C and E are symmetrical about AD, CD = DE. Therefore, when P coincides with D, the sum of PE + BP is minimized, thus the minimum value of PE + PB = BC = 3. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,矩形ABCD中,AB=2,BC=3,分别以A、D为圆心,1为半径画圆,E、F分别是⊙A、⊙D上的一动点,P是BC上的一动点,则PE+PF的最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,以BC为轴作矩形ABCD的对称图形A′BCD′以及对称圆A′,连接A′D交BC于P,则DE′就是PE+PD最小值；∵矩形ABCD中,AB=2,BC=3,圆A的半径为1,∴A′D′=BC=3,AA′=2AB=4,AE=D′F′=1,∴AD′=5,EF′=5-2=3∴PE+PF=PF′+PE=EF′=3,故选:B．(\frac{A}{z})⊥(z_{1})
question_en: As shown in the figure, in rectangle ABCD, AB = 2, BC = 3. Circles with radius 1 are drawn with A and D as centers, E and F are moving points on ⊙A and ⊙D respectively, P is a moving point on BC, then the minimum value of PE + PF is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, the symmetrical figure A′BCD′ of rectangle ABCD with BC as the axis and the symmetrical circle A′ are constructed, and A′D is connected to intersect BC at P, then DE′ represents the minimum value of PE + PD; because in rectangle ABCD, AB = 2, BC = 3, and the radius of circle A is 1, therefore A′D′ = BC = 3, AA′ = 2AB = 4, AE = D′F′ = 1, thus AD′ = 5, EF′ = 5 - 2 = 3, therefore PE + PF = PF′ + PE = EF′ = 3. Hence, the answer is: B. (\frac{A}{z}) is perpendicular to (z_{1}).

question: 如图,∠AOB=30°,点P为∠AOB内一点,OP=10,点M、N分别在OA、OB上,求△PMN周长的最小值()
answer_cot: 分别作点P关于OA、OB的对称点P~1~、P~2~,连P~1~、P~2~,交OA于M,交OB于N,则OP~1~=OP=OP~2~,∠P~1~OA=∠POA,∠POB=∠P~2~OB,MP=P~1~M,PN=P~2~N,则△PMN的周长的最小值=P~1~P~2~∴∠P~1~OP~2~=2∠AOB=60°,∴△OP~1~P~2~是等边三角形．△PMN的周长=P~1~P~2~,∴P~1~P~2~=OP~1~=OP~2~=OP=10．故选:B．o*z^{z}=2x^{-2}+2➝{ZZ}^{-2}+2➝{ZZ}^{-2}
question_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = 30°, point P is a point inside ∠AOB, OP = 10, points M and N are on OA and OB respectively, find the minimum value of the perimeter of △PMN.
answer_cot_en: Construct the symmetric points P₁ and P₂ of point P with respect to OA and OB, respectively, and connect P₁ and P₂, intersecting OA at M and OB at N. Then OP₁ = OP = OP₂, ∠P₁OA = ∠POA, ∠POB = ∠P₂OB, MP = P₁M, PN = P₂N. Therefore, the minimum perimeter of △PMN is P₁P₂. Since ∠P₁OP₂ = 2∠AOB = 60°, △OP₁P₂ is an equilateral triangle. The perimeter of △PMN is P₁P₂. Thus, P₁P₂ = OP₁ = OP₂ = OP = 10. Hence, the answer is: B. o*zᶻ = 2x⁻² + 2➝{ZZ}⁻² + 2➝{ZZ}⁻².

question: 在⊙O中,AB是⊙O的直径,AB=8cm,≥ft.\begin{array}{l}{c}{z}>√{2}=⌒{AC}=\hat{CD},M是AB上一动点,CM+DM的最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,作点C关于AB的对称点C′,连接C′D与AB相交于点M,此时,点M为CM+DM的最小值时的位置,由垂径定理,➝{AC}^{′}=⌒{AC},∴⌒{AC}^{′}=⌒{AC},∵➝{AC}^{′}=\hat{BD}=⌒{AC}^{′},AB为直径,∴C′D为直径,∴CM+DM的最小值是8cm．故选:B．\hat{CD}
question_en: In ⊙O, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AB = 8 cm, the arc AC = the arc CD, M is a moving point on AB, the minimum value of CM + DM is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, construct point C' as the symmetric point of C with respect to AB, and connect C'D intersecting AB at point M. At this time, point M is the position where the sum of CM and DM is minimized. By the Perpendicular Diameter Theorem, vector AC' = arc AC, therefore arc AC' = arc AC. Since vector AC' = arc BD = arc AC', and AB is the diameter, therefore C'D is the diameter. Thus, the minimum value of CM + DM is 8cm. Hence, the answer is: B. arc CD.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=BC,点M在AC边上,且AM=2,MC=6,动点P在AB边上,连接PC,PM,则PC+PM的最小值是()
answer_cot: 如图,过点作CO⊥AB于O,延长BO到C′,使OC′=OC,连接MC′,交AB于P,此时MC′=PM+PC′=PM+PC的值最小,连接AC′,∵CO⊥AB,AC=BC,∠ACB=90°,∴∠ACO=√{17}×90°=45°,∵CO=OC′,CO⊥AB,∴AC′=CA=AM+MC=8,∴∠OC′A=∠OCA=45°,∴∠C′AC=90°,∴C′A⊥AC,∴MC′=\frac{1}{2}=√{AM^{2}+AC^{2}}=2√{2^{2}+8^{2}},∴PC+PM的最小值为2√{2^{2}+8^{2}}．故选:C．√{17}
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = BC, point M is on side AC, and AM = 2, MC = 6, moving point P is on side AB, connect PC, PM, then the minimum value of PC + PM is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, a line is drawn through point C to be perpendicular to AB at O, and BO is extended to C' such that OC' = OC. Connect MC' and intersect AB at P. At this time, the value of MC' = PM + PC' = PM + PC is minimized. Connect AC', because CO ⊥ AB, AC = BC, and ∠ACB = 90°, therefore ∠ACO = √{17} × 90° = 45°. Since CO = OC' and CO ⊥ AB, therefore AC' = CA = AM + MC = 8, thus ∠OC'A = ∠OCA = 45°, therefore ∠C'AC = 90°, hence C'A ⊥ AC, therefore MC' = \frac{1}{2} = √{AM^{2} + AC^{2}} = 2√{2^{2} + 8^{2}}, thus the minimum value of PC + PM is 2√{2^{2} + 8^{2}}. Hence, the answer is: C. √{17}

question: 如图,四边形ABCD中,∠BAD=121°,∠B=∠D=90°,在BC、CD上分别找到一点M、N,使△AMN周长最小时,则∠AMN+∠ANM的度数为()
answer_cot: 如下图,作A关于BC和CD的对称点A′,A″,连接A′A″,交BC于M,交CD于N,则A′A″即为△AMN的周长最小值．作DA延长线AH,∵∠DAB=121°,∴∠HAA′=59°,∴∠AA′M+∠A″=∠HAA′=59°,∵∠MA′A=∠MAA′,∠NAD=∠A″,且∠MA′A+∠MAA′=∠AMN,∠NAD+∠A″=∠ANM,∴∠AMN+∠ANM=∠MA′A+∠MAA′+∠NAD+∠A″=2(∠AA′M+∠A″)=2×59°=118°．故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, ∠BAD = 121°, ∠B = ∠D = 90°. Points M and N are found on BC and CD respectively such that the perimeter of △AMN is minimized, then the sum of the degrees of ∠AMN and ∠ANM is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, construct the symmetric points A′ and A″ of A with respect to BC and CD, respectively. Connect A′A″, intersecting BC at M and CD at N, then A′A″ represents the minimum perimeter of △AMN. Extend DA to form line AH. Because ∠DAB = 121°, therefore ∠HAA′ = 59°. Thus ∠AA′M + ∠A″ = ∠HAA′ = 59°. Since ∠MA′A = ∠MAA′, ∠NAD = ∠A″, and ∠MA′A + ∠MAA′ = ∠AMN, ∠NAD + ∠A″ = ∠ANM, therefore ∠AMN + ∠ANM = ∠MA′A + ∠MAA′ + ∠NAD + ∠A″ = 2(∠AA′M + ∠A″) = 2×59° = 118°. Hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=9,BC=12,AD是∠BAC的平分线,若点P,Q分别是AD和AC上的动点,则PC+PQ的最小值是()
answer_cot: 过点D作DE⊥AB于点E,过点E作EQ⊥AC于点Q,EQ交AD于点P,连接CP,此时PC+PQ=EQ取最小值,如图所示．在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=9,BC=12,∴AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=15．∵AD是∠BAC的平分线,∴∠CAD=∠EAD,在△ACD和△AED中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠CAD=∠EAD}\\{∠ACD=∠AED=90^{°}}\\{AD=AD}\end{array}\right.,∴△ACD≌△AED(AAS),∴AE=AC=9．∵EQ⊥AC,∠ACB=90°,∴EQ∥BC,∴\frac{AE}{AB}=\frac{QE}{BC},即\frac{9}{15}=\frac{QE}{12}∴EQ=\frac{36}{5}．故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = 9, BC = 12, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC. If points P and Q are moving points on AD and AC respectively, then the minimum value of PC + PQ is ()
answer_cot_en: Construct DE ⊥ AB at point E, and construct EQ ⊥ AC at point Q, where EQ intersects AD at point P. Connect CP. At this time, PC + PQ = EQ takes the minimum value, as shown in the diagram. In right triangle △ABC, ∠ACB = 90°, AC = 9, BC = 12, therefore AB = √{AC^2 + BC^2} = 15. Since AD bisects ∠BAC, therefore ∠CAD = ∠EAD. In triangles △ACD and △AED, we have {∠CAD = ∠EAD, ∠ACD = ∠AED = 90°, AD = AD}, therefore △ACD ≅ △AED (AAS), thus AE = AC = 9. Since EQ ⊥ AC and ∠ACB = 90°, therefore EQ ∥ BC, thus \(\frac{AE}{AB} = \frac{QE}{BC}\), that is \(\frac{9}{15} = \frac{QE}{12}\) therefore EQ = \(\frac{36}{5}\). Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,点E在等边△ABC的边BC上,BE=6,射线CD⊥BC于点C,点P是射线CD上一动点,点F是线段AB上一动点,当EP+PF的值最小时,BF=7,则AC为()
answer_cot: ∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴AC=BC,∠B=60°,作点E关于直线CD的对称点G,过G作GF⊥AB于F,交CD于P,则此时,EP+PF的值最小,∵∠B=60°,∠BFG=90°,∴∠G=30°,∵BF=7,∴BG=2BF=14,∴EG=8,∵CE=CG=4,∴AC=BC=10,故选:D．(media/image35.png)
question_en: As shown in the figure, point E is on the side BC of the equilateral △ABC, BE = 6, ray CD ⊥ BC at point C, point P is a moving point on ray CD, point F is a moving point on line segment AB, when the value of EP + PF is the smallest, BF = 7, then AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Because △ABC is an equilateral triangle, therefore AC = BC, ∠B = 60°. Construct point E's symmetrical point G with respect to line CD, draw GF ⊥ AB at F, intersecting CD at P. In this case, the value of EP + PF is minimized. Since ∠B = 60° and ∠BFG = 90°, therefore ∠G = 30°. Given BF = 7, therefore BG = 2BF = 14, thus EG = 8. Since CE = CG = 4, therefore AC = BC = 10. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,BC=6,E,F分别是AB,AC的中点,动点P在射线EF上,BP交CE于点D,∠CBP的平分线交CE于点Q,当CQ=\frac{1}{3}CE时,EP+BP的值为()
answer_cot: 如图,延长BQ交射线EF于M,∵E、F分别是AB、AC的中点,∴EF∥BC,∴∠M=∠CBM,∵BQ是∠CBP的平分线,∴∠PBM=∠CBM,∴∠M=∠PBM,∴BP=PM,∴EP+BP=EP+PM=EM,∵CQ=\frac{1}{3}CE,∴EQ=2CQ,由EF∥BC得,△MEQ∽△BCQ,∴\frac{EM}{BC}=\frac{EQ}{CQ}=2,∴EM=2BC=2×6=12,即EP+BP=12．故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BC = 6, E and F are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, moving point P is on ray EF, BP intersects CE at point D, the bisector of ∠CBP intersects CE at point Q, when CQ = 1/3 CE, the value of EP + BP is ()
answer_cot_en: As shown in the diagram, extending BQ to intersect ray EF at M, because E and F are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, therefore EF ∥ BC, thus ∠M = ∠CBM. Since BQ bisects ∠CBP, therefore ∠PBM = ∠CBM, thus ∠M = ∠PBM, therefore BP = PM, therefore EP + BP = EP + PM = EM. Given that CQ = 1/3 CE, therefore EQ = 2CQ. By EF ∥ BC, △MEQ is similar to △BCQ, thus EM/BC = EQ/CQ = 2, therefore EM = 2BC = 2×6 = 12, that is EP + BP = 12. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,已知△ABC中,点M是BC边上的中点,AN平分∠BAC,BN⊥AN于点N,若AB=7,MN=3,则AC的长为()
answer_cot: 延长BN交AC于D,在△ANB和△AND中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠NAB=∠NAD}\\{AN=AN}\\{∠ANB=∠AND=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△ANB≌△AND,∴AD=AB=8,BN=ND,∵M是△ABC的边BC的中点,∴DC=2MN=6,∴AC=AD+CD=13,故选:B．
question_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that in △ABC, point M is the midpoint of side BC, AN bisects ∠BAC, BN ⊥ AN at point N, if AB = 7, MN = 3, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend BN to intersect AC at D. In △ANB and △AND, we have $\left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠NAB=∠NAD}\\{AN=AN}\\{∠ANB=∠AND=90°}\end{array}\right.$, therefore △ANB is congruent to △AND, thus AD = AB = 8, BN = ND. Since M is the midpoint of side BC of △ABC, therefore DC = 2MN = 6, thus AC = AD + CD = 14. Hence, the answer is: B.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,AD是角平分线,AE是中线,CF⊥AD于点F,AC=5,AB=13,则EF的长为()
answer_cot: 延长CF交AB于G,如图所示:∵AD是△ABC的角平分线,∴∠GAF=∠CAF,在△AGF和△ACF中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠GAF=∠CAF}\\{AF=AF}\\{∠AFG=∠AFC=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△AGF≌△ACF(ASA),∴AG=AC=5,GF=CF,则BG=AB-AG=13-5=8．又∵AE是△ABC的中线,∴BE=CE,∴EF是△BCG的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BG=4．故选:D．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD is the angle bisector, AE is the median, CF ⊥ AD at point F, AC = 5, AB = 13, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend CF to intersect AB at G, as shown in the diagram: Because AD is the angle bisector of △ABC, therefore ∠GAF = ∠CAF. In △AGF and △ACF, we have $\left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠GAF=∠CAF}\\{AF=AF}\\{∠AFG=∠AFC=90°}\end{array}\right.$, therefore △AGF ≅ △ACF (ASA), thus AG = AC = 5, GF = CF. Then BG = AB - AG = 13 - 5 = 8. Also, because AE is the median of △ABC, therefore BE = CE, thus EF is the midline of △BCG, therefore EF = 1/2 BG = 4. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在△ABC中,D是BC边的中点,AE是∠BAC的角平分线,AE⊥CE于点E,连接DE．若AB=7,DE=1,则AC的长度是()
answer_cot: 延长CE,交AB于点F．∵AE平分∠BAC,AE⊥CE,∴∠EAF=∠EAC,∠AEF=∠AEC,在△EAF与△EAC中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠AEF=∠EAC}\\{AE=AE}\\{∠AEF=∠AEC}\end{array}\right.,∴△EAF≌△EAC(ASA),∴AF=AC,EF=EC,又∵D是BC中点,∴BD=CD,∴DE是△BCF的中位线,∴BF=2DE=2．∴AC=AF=AB-BF=7-2=5；故选:A．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D is the midpoint of side BC, AE is the angle bisector of ∠BAC, AE ⊥ CE at point E, connect DE. If AB = 7, DE = 1, then the length of AC is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend CE to intersect AB at point F. Because AE bisects ∠BAC and AE ⊥ CE, therefore ∠EAF = ∠EAC, ∠AEF = ∠AEC. In triangles EAF and EAC, we have {∠AEF = ∠EAC}, {AE = AE}, {∠AEF = ∠AEC}. Therefore, △EAF ≅ △EAC (ASA), thus AF = AC, EF = EC. Since D is the midpoint of BC, therefore BD = CD. Therefore, DE is the midline of △BCF, thus BF = 2DE = 2. Therefore, AC = AF = AB - BF = 7 - 2 = 5; hence, the answer is: A.

question: 如图,A、B两处被池塘隔开,为了测量A、B两处的距离,在AB外选一点C,连接AC、BC,并分别取线段AC、BC的中点E、F,测得EF=15m,则AB的长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, places A and B are separated by a pond. In order to measure the distance between A and B, a point C is chosen outside of AB, connecting AC and BC, and taking the midpoints E and F of line segments AC and BC respectively. It is measured that EF = 15 m, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Because E and F are the midpoints of AC and BC, respectively, therefore EF is the midsegment of △ABC, thus EF = 1/2 AB. Since EF = 15m, therefore AB = 30m. Hence, the answer is: C.

question: 如图,AD为△ABC中∠BAC的外角平分线,BD⊥AD于D,E为BC中点,DE=5,AC=3,则AB长为()
question_en: As shown in the figure, AD is the external angle bisector of ∠BAC in △ABC, BD ⊥ AD at D, E is the midpoint of BC, DE = 5, AC = 3, then the length of AB is ()
answer_cot_en: Extend BD and CA to meet at point H. In △ADH and △ADB, we have $\left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠HAD=∠BAD}\\{AD=AD}\\{∠ADH=∠ADB=90°}\end{array}\right.$, therefore △ADH is congruent to △ADB (ASA). Hence, BD = DH, AB = AH. Since BD = DH and BE = EC, therefore CH = 2DE = 10, thus AH = CH - AC = 7, therefore AB = AH = 7. Hence, the answer is: D.

question: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AB=3,BC=5,∠A=130°,∠D=100°,AD=CD．若点E,F分别是边AD,CD的中点,则EF的长是()
answer_cot: 连接AC,∵∠D=100°,AD=CD,∴∠DAC=∠DCA=40°,∴∠BAC=∠BAD-∠DAC=90°,∴AC=√{BC^{2}-AB^{2}}=4,∵点E,F分别是边AD,CD的中点,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}AC=2,故选:C．
question_en: As shown in the figure, in quadrilateral ABCD, AB = 3, BC = 5, ∠A = 130°, ∠D = 100°, AD = CD. If points E and F are the midpoints of sides AD and CD respectively, then the length of EF is ()
answer_cot_en: Connect AC, because ∠D = 100° and AD = CD, therefore ∠DAC = ∠DCA = 40°, thus ∠BAC = ∠BAD - ∠DAC = 90°. Therefore, AC = √{BC² - AB²} = 4. Since points E and F are the midpoints of sides AD and CD respectively, therefore EF = 1/2 AC = 2. Hence, the answer is: C.
